column2: During [From.GetHerHis] visit, [From.GetTitledName], the [From.GetJobTitle] sent from [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName], has died. While it is a tragedy, it also puts me in the awkward position of having to inform the [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle] about how the [From.GetJobTitle]'s diplomatic visit is canceled.

During [From.GetHerHis] visit, [From.GetTitledName], on a diplomatic mission from [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName], has been imprisoned! I am not sure how to phrase the letter to the Protector General, but this obviously means that [From.GetHerHis] visit is canceled.

During [From.GetHerHis] visit, [From.GetTitledName], the [From.GetJobTitle] sent from [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName], has gone missing! I am not sure how to phrase the letter to the Protector General, but this obviously means that [From.GetHerHis] visit is canceled.
I shall have my scribes compose a letter to the [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle].
The gender of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is culturally or religiously eligible\n
特殊§Y法律§!或§Y游戏规则§!已启用\n
特殊§Y法律§!或§Y游戏规则§!未启用\n
拥有一位信奉§Y日耳曼多神教§!信仰的§Y领主§!，§Y封臣§!或一位§Y相邻的统治者§!\n
向你的敌人发起决斗的决议现在已可用。
让某人成为盾娘的决议现在可用，她必须是你的姐妹或者女儿。
你现在在战场上受的伤能够更快的恢复。
当你率领部队时，你的战争经验能够让你遭遇战场上的新事件。
允许§G右键点击§!你的头像来赋予你自己§Y狂战士§!的特质。
当你领兵围城时，你成功捕获敌方领主和掠得宝物的几率将会提升。
因为你是§Y战士小屋§!的一员，现在你可以通过一系列严苛的训练来获得战场上的新能力。
允许§G右键点击§!你的头像来赋予你自己一个新的指挥官特质。
因为你是§Y战士小屋§!的一员，你可以召唤一个特殊的指挥官到你的宫廷。
§Y密谋§!菜单中的新决议已可用，你可以召唤一个特殊的指挥官到你的宫廷。
如果一个地产中的守备队和征召兵没有满，你可以选择瞬间将其补充完毕。
允许你在一个地产上§G点击右键§!来将其内部的守备队和征召兵瞬间补充满。
当率领部队时，你再也不会在战场上受到致命伤。
在三种军事信条中选择你的重心。这样做可以让你选择一种生活方式特质。
允许在你的角色头像上§G右键点击§!以选择三种不同的军事特长的其中之一。

正当[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]晕眩着往后退，紧紧捂着[combatant_2.GetHerHis]肚子上清晰可见的致命伤时，我喊道：「一切都结束了！」。我转身面对人群。「投降！或者————」满嘴血腥味的我还在讲话时，还没等我说完。我的对手就扔下[combatant_2.GetHerHis]血迹斑斑的[combatant_2.GetDuelWeapon]，咕哝道：「现在——一切都结束了」。

武器已经举起，我向[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]发起了冲锋，但是被什么东西绊倒了。我在对手面前就这样摔倒了，他一脸难以置信的看着我，因为我竟然自己凑到[combatant_2.GetHerHis]武器上去。我现在已经无计可施，所以用双手紧紧缠住[combatant_2.GetManWoman]的脖子，[combatant_2.GetHerHis]眼睛里瞬间被恐惧填满。

我举起我的[combatant_1.GetDuelWeapon]向[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]发起了冲锋。我的对手轻松地模仿我的步伐，旁边的围观者已经在对着这场优雅的决斗窃窃私语，不，这已经变成一场舞蹈了。到最后，我已经承受不住身体里巨大的伤痛，直挺挺的倒在了地上，[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]那双恐怖的眼睛直勾勾的盯着我的后背。
我……我拒绝……就这样孤单的死去……！
看来这就是终结了。[other_combatant.GetSisterBrother]，我很……荣幸

「投降！」[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName]对着我大喊。我只感到天旋地转，紧紧捂着我的肚子。我的视线开始变的模糊，刚才受的肯定是致命伤。正当我的对手转身接受人群的欢呼时，我的思绪开始飞奔。我的剑柄已经被汗水湿透，亦或是我自己的血，但是我依然想站起来冲锋。「投降！或者————」[combatant_1.GetSheHe]依然在继续命令我，但是还没等他说完，我的武器就已经完全不能用了。我的双膝最终屈服了，接着，眼前的世界就变黑了。

[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName]举剑向我发起了冲锋，但是他好像被什么东西绊倒了。瞬时间，[combatant_1.GetSheHe]的双手开始挥舞以保持平衡，但是还是在我面前摔倒了，并把[combatant_1.GetHerselfHimself]送到了我的刀尖上。当[combatant_1.GetManWoman]突然开始紧紧掐住我的喉咙时，我霎时间无法呼吸————我被[combatant_1.GetHerHis]可怕的眼神给震住了。

[combatant_1.GetTitledFirstName]举起了[combatant_1.GetHerHis][combatant_1.GetDuelWeapon]向我发起了冲锋。我轻松的模仿着[combatant_1.GetHerHis]步伐，旁边的围观者已经在对着这场优雅的决斗窃窃私语，不，这已经变成一场舞蹈了。到最后，我们几乎同时倒在地上，身上受了一样重的伤，鲜血渐渐遮住了我们的双眼。
至少我拉你做了垫背，傻逼。
啊啊啊啊！你！！呃啊啊啊啊啊！
一个可敬的对手，直到最后也是如此……我……呃……
我狂乱的挥舞着自己的武器，突然间，[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]发出痛苦的尖叫。我扔下了我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]，直勾勾的顶着这副我亲手制造的血腥场景。看上去我好像成功的[other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]。
这场战斗好像已经进行了数个小时————我开战前的豪情壮志现在已经消耗殆尽，我的步伐开始变的缓慢。然后，正当我的双膝已经支撑不住时，我[other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]。
决斗开始了，[other_combatant.GetTitledName]开始慢慢的靠近我。而我给了[other_combatant.GetHerHim]一个嘲讽味十足的微笑，然后没花多久时间就[other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]
我无限乐观的挥舞着我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]，一边听着观众的欢呼。当决斗结束时，[other_combatant.GetTitledName]正躺在地上，[other_combatant.GetHerHis]脸因为羞愧而变的通红。我耸了耸肩，然后对着人群微笑，也对着他微笑。
莫……莫非这场战斗我赢了？
你为什么不跪下来向我求饶？！
这一刻我已经等了很久了，你这条无耻阴险的毒蛇！
正当[other_combatant.GetTitledName]狂乱的挥舞着[other_combatant.GetHerHis][other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]时，一声尖锐的惨叫划破了天际。意识模糊的我发现那是我自己的声音————我的对手成功的[Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]。

不管[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]是不是仅仅一个[combatant_1.GetDuelType]，[other_combatant.GetHerHim]浑身上下都散发着一股毋庸置疑的自信。当我冲锋的时候，[other_combatant.GetSheHe]居然暗自笑起来！我的对手确保[Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]后，一切都结束了，我僵卧在地面上，一动不动。
[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]开始向我发起冲锋，不过一会儿就[Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]。人群似乎没有被我的努力所打动。
人群正在为了[other_combatant.GetTitledName]欢呼，[other_combatant.GetSheHe]以无限乐观的姿态，在空中挥舞着[other_combatant.GetHerHis][other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]。当一切结束时，[other_combatant.GetManWoman]满怀怜悯的看着我。
为什么，你这个————！我下次会给你点颜色看看的，[other_combatant.GetFirstName]！
有时候，当我在看我的士兵们在校场上操练剑术时，[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]的脸会突然在我眼前重现，接着是我们的那场决斗。这一切都让我的心跳加快————当时我没有成功的捍卫我的荣耀。虽然已经过去很久了，但是这种羞耻的感觉伴我至今。
终有一天，我要让[other_combatant.GetHerHim]为此付出代价。
有一个这样旗鼓相当的对手实乃三生有幸！
我才不会忍受这些嘲弄。

I have recently found myself becoming friendly with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] chuckles heartily, however, when I attempt to compliment the [From.GetManWoman] on [From.GetHerHis] fighting technique. "My [Root.GetLordLady], we both know that I did not do very well, last time we sparred", [From.GetSheHe] says
喔，不要对自己太苛刻了，我的好[From.GetManWoman]！

With the help of the [sponsoring_king.GetTitle] of [sponsoring_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [converting_king.GetTitledName] brought the [converting_king.Religion.GetName] faith to [converting_king.GetHerHis] realm, overseeing the conversion of scores of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects.
[converting_king.GetTitledName] petitioned [sponsoring_king.GetTitledName] to bring the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith to [converting_king.GetHerHis] pagan tribes.

With the help of the [sponsoring_king.GetTitle] of [sponsoring_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [converting_king.GetTitledName] brought the [converting_king.Religion.GetName] faith to [converting_king.GetHerHis] realm, overseeing the conversion of scores of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects.

Esteemed [Root.GetTitledName],
I wish to forsake my old religion and lead [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to its rightful place amongst the civilized realms.
I humbly request [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s assistance to ensure a peaceful transition into the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
[Root.GetTitledName] will sign a Non-Aggression Pact with [From.GetTitledName] and assist [From.GetHerHim] in converting [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s population.
[Root.GetTitledName] will inform [From.GetTitledName] that [Root.GetSheHe] is not interested in sponsoring the conversion of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

[Root.GetTitledName],
I sympathize with your dream of a [From.Religion.GetName] [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but I am afraid I cannot aid you in your mission at this moment.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
I am honored to accept your plea to help the poor people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] see the light and embrace the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
We will begin preparations for a great conversion immediately.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]
§Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will send [From.Religion.GetName] priests to prepare a large ceremony for the mass conversion of your subjects.
All vassals of §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! will be invited to the impending ceremony.

You meet with your vassals and [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s Imams in the middle of [converting_king.Capital.GetName]'s square.\nAddressing the crowd of commoners gathered all around you, you publicly denounce the old gods and spit on their false idols, gesturing for your vassals to do the same. A few complaints rise from the crowd, but they are swiftly quelled. Then, as the Imams set fire to the icons, you declare your faith to Allah and to His Prophet.\nYou all turn your back to the pyre of false gods and bow to Mecca.

The hooded priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrive at dawn, but the ceremony begins only after sunset, once they have helped the icons of the new gods adjust to their new home in your temple.\nYou meet with your vassals outside the city, a crowd of your subjects assembling all around you, and then, under the grim echoes of drums and horns, the Germanic priests begin the rite. They paint your faces with the blood of the sacrificial lambs, burn sacred herbs and chant their secret spells, as you all enter a trance.\nVisions of horror and delight accompany you for the rest of the night. When you wake at dawn of the next day, the priests are already gone. Little by little, the confused crowd of converts returns to [converting_king.Capital.GetName].

Following the instructions of [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests, you assemble your vassals and ride out of [converting_king.Capital.GetName] on your best horse.\nThe Tengri priests lead you away from the civilized roads, deep into the wilderness, refusing to answer to any query about your destination.\nAfter riding for the entire day, you stop at the edge of a cliff, looking at the bleeding hues of the sunset. The priests burn a few offerings of food to the sky god, creating a large line of dark smoke from a small set of fires. Then, as their chants echo through the air, you ride with your vassals through the smoke and cleanse yourself of the old gods.

The priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] insist that the ritual be performed at sunset. When the time comes you meet your vassals at the top of a cliff outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], with a crowd of your subjects waiting below. \nThe priests start the ceremony chanting and playing their sacred instruments. When the last rays of sun disappear in the distance you and your vassals proclaim that your old gods are dying with this day. The priests resume their singing and dancing, enduring for the entirety of the night, even after most of the common crowd has fallen asleep. When dawn comes, they proclaim that you are reborn with the new day under the protection of Dievas.

The priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] insist that the ritual be performed at sunset. When the time comes you meet your vassals at the top of a cliff outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], with a crowd of your subjects waiting below. \nThe priests start the ceremony creating a large fire with your offerings in order to satiate the spirits. When the last rays of sun disappear in the distance you and your vassals proclaim that your old gods are dying with this day. The priests resume their singing and dancing, enduring for the entirety of the night, even after most of the common crowd has fallen asleep. When dawn comes and the pillar of smoke finally vanishes, they proclaim that the sky god has accepted your offering and welcomes you under his protection.

The priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] insist that the ritual be performed at sunset. When the time comes you meet your vassals at the top of a cliff outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], with a crowd of your subjects waiting below. \nThe priests start the ceremony beating their drums to gain the favor of the thunder god. When the last rays of sun disappear in the distance you and your vassals proclaim that your old gods are dying with this day. The priests resume their singing and dancing, enduring for the entirety of the night, even after most of the common crowd has fallen asleep. When dawn comes, they proclaim that you are reborn with the new day under the protection of Perun.

Following the instructions of the Aztec priests, you round up a group of convicted criminals and have them dragged in the middle of [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName]'s square, where a crowd has already rallied.\nThere, the priests dress them up with blind masks depicting your old gods and adorn you and your vassals with the garments of the new ones.\nThe confused and scared criminals are then set free, and in a ritualistic skirmish, you and your vassals slaughter them in front of your subjects, bathing in their blood and proclaiming your allegiance to the gods of the West.

The shamans from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrive in a long procession, carrying an endless parade of idols.\nYou meet them alongside your vassals in the middle of [converting_king.Capital.GetName]'s main square, where you publicly renounce the old gods and welcome the new ones into your realm. One by one, you bow and kiss the feet of the new totems as they are carried inside your temple, while the priests interpret the gods' reactions to your welcome and placate any angry spirits of the old faith with loud drumming.

The [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests arrive at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] with a luxurious parade, carrying the tall, shining statue of the sun god to the center of your capital. \nYou meet them with your vassals, surrounded by a crowd of commoners, and publicly renounce your old gods before bowing to the golden idol. \nOne by one, you order your offerings of gold and precious stones to be delivered unto the new god, covering his statue little by little with increasingly more opulent garments. After you and your vassals have finished with your donations, some of the people from the crowd join in as well, leaving what little they have at the feet of the idol as it is carried inside its new home.

The Hellenic priests arrive to [converting_king.Capital.GetName] a few days before the ceremony in order to settle the statues of the new gods in their new home.\nThe evening before the conversion, you and your vassals are summoned in the temple's garden, where the priests strip you naked and have your entire bodies shaved and washed. The morning after, you meet the priests outside the temple with a large crowd at your back, and watch them sacrifice a dozen bulls to the main gods in front of the doors of the temple. The priests then carry the remains of their offerings inside, and, after a long hour, they finally re-emerge from their sanctum to address the confused crowd and proclaim that the gods have accepted your offering and will take further donations into consideration in the future.

The [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests arrive a few days before the ceremony in order to settle in their new temple.\nFor all the remaining days before the event, you and your vassals find yourself stuck listening to an endless list of rules and rituals that the priests swear you must absolutely know in order to correctly worship [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When the day for the mass conversion comes, the ceremony itself looks almost like an afterthought in comparison to the bureaucratic preparation. The priests quickly cleanse all old icons publicly and allow you to renounce your old gods before hiding back inside the temple and resuming their private rituals.

The [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] rabbis arrive to [converting_king.Capital.GetName] on a clear morning. \nYou meet with them alongside your vassals and at the head of a large crowd in the middle of the main square. Three tall pedestals have been set up for the newcomers, following their instructions, and the three assigned judges amongst them take place atop them. You are the first to be called to the public beth din, and for what feels like an eternity, the three judges examine the sincerity of your conversion. After they are finished with you, they move onto your vassals, testing them one by one as the crowd watches in silence.

Strangely enough, the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests arrive at your capital without much pomp.\nThey ask you to remain in seclusion with them for the remaining days before the conversions, they respectfully remove the icons of the old gods from your temple, and instruct you about your new responsibilities as a [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]. When the day of the great ceremony comes, you meet with your vassals outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], surrounded by a crowd of commoners. There, you strip yourselves of all your regalia, and sit around a sacred fire to meditate in silence, with the priests' soft chanting echoing in the background.
This is a new beginning for our people.

You receive news from your missionaries only a few days after the mass baptism of [converting_king.Capital.GetName]. Although the priest writes that he does not feel entirely convinced about the sincerity of the barbarians' conversion, the ceremony went well and [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is now officially [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName].\nBy aiding in the conversion of an entire score of pagans to the One True Faith, you have accomplished a feat worthy of the Apostles themselves.

Although the Prophet often spread His Word by the sword, it is a commendable feat for you to have converted an entire score of pagans through words only. \nYou have no doubts that infidels still hide in [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s domain, but now that the ruling class has been brought into the light, it is only a matter of time until everybody else in the realm follows. With the mass conversion of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetTitle] to [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName], you have brought the universal rule of Islam over the world one step closer to its completion.

The priests you have sent to [converting_king.Capital.GetName] return home exhausted and satisfied. \nThe people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have fully embraced their new gods. Their warriors will surely make a fine addition to Odin's army in Valhalla for the final war to come. \nWith your actions you have gained another ally in the eternal fight against the bringers of the end times.

The priests sent to introduce Tengri to the strange people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have returned bringing good news. \n[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] has sealed [converting_king.GetHerHis] allegiance with the sky god and the spirits of your ancestors and now [converting_king.GetHerHis] whole people ride under their protection. \nAs long as they will follow the rite and placate the spirits, they have opened themselves a road to a bright and prosperous future under the Great Blue Sky.

Your priests have done their best to introduce [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s people to your gods and to teach them how to placate the spirits of the wild surrounding them. \nYou can only hope now that they will stay true to their word and please the gods according to tradition lest ill luck befalls them.

Your priests have done their best to introduce [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s people to your gods and to teach them how to placate the spirits of the wild surrounding them. \nYou can only hope now that they will stay true to their word and please the gods according to tradition lest ill luck befalls them.

Your priests have done their best to introduce [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s people to your gods and to teach them how to placate the spirits of the wild surrounding them. \nYou can only hope now that they will stay true to their word and please the gods according to tradition lest ill luck befalls them.

Your priests return with good news. \n[converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s tribes have accepted their new gods and performed their first ritual sacrifices. Their resolve is commendable and will certainly prove fundamental to keep the thirst for blood of the immortals in check. Only through daily sacrifices can the gods remain strong enough to keep the sun in the sky and let the water flow.\nWe can only hope that [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] has fully understood [converting_king.GetHerHis] important new role in postponing the apocalypse.

You are certain [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and [converting_king.GetHerHis] vassals were quite surprised by the crowd of idols that have now taken place in their temple. \nIt will certainly beneficial for them as well as their subjects to know how to placate and pray to the spirits for blessings and curses in the proper way. \nYou can only hope that they understood all the spells correctly.

Your priests have done their best to introduce [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s people to the sun god. \nYou can only hope now that they will stay true to their word and please Zun according to tradition lest ill luck befalls them.

It is quite amusing to watch barbarians attempt to mimic civilized society. \nWhile you certainly appreciate [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s eagerness to be educated about the proper worship of the gods, you cannot deny to yourself a tinge of skepticism about their results. You very much doubt these tribal primitives will ever be able to pronounce the gods' names correctly, let alone know how to please them properly. \nThen again, their newly found faith might put a stop to their pillaging, which made your priests' work not a complete waste of time.

Your priests have returned bringing news from [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThe local tribes have been successfully introduced to the worship of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. \nWith the proper grooming, they will become model followers of the true faith, given enough time.

The rabbis have returned completely exhausted after the mass trial of [converting_king.Capital.GetName]. \nThanks to their tireless work and the enlightenment of [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName], another tribe has joined the sacred covenant with Yahweh and walks the Earth under His protection.

Your priests have done what they could to introduce [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith. Now it the converts' responsibility to stay true to their new convictions and follow the straight and narrow path to enlightenment.
The savages have finally seen the light.

[Root.GetTitledName],
I have decided to abandon my old beliefs and embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith.
As I care much for the salvation of all my subjects, I urge you to join me in [From.Capital.GetName], and renounce your old faith, alongside all the people of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
No longer will my [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] subjects have to live in fear under backwards [converting_king.Religion.GetName] rulers.
I have contacted the wise [sponsoring_king.GetTitledName] and, with the help of [sponsoring_king.GetHerHis] priests, I am preparing to convert the entirety of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith. 
[From.GetTitledName]

Inform §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! that you are happy for [converting_king.GetHerHis] decision.\nWhen the Mass Conversion takes place all of your Vassals, Courtiers, and Provinces will turn §Y[sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]§!.
Come out as a [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName].\nWhen the Mass Conversion takes place all of your Vassals, Courtiers, and Provinces will turn §Y[sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]§!.

Go to §Y[converting_king.Capital.GetName]§! and pretend to convert to your liege's new faith, while secretly remaining §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!.\nWhen the Mass Conversion takes place all of your Vassals will secretly maintain their old beliefs. All your Provinces will become §Y[sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]§!, but communities of Pagans will survive within your demesne, hiding amongst the converts.

Inform your liege that you will join [From.GetHerHim] and become §Y[sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]§!, and so will all your subjects.\nWhen the Mass Conversion takes place all of your Vassals, Courtiers, and Provinces will turn §Y[sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]§!.
I will never forsake the old ways!
Inform your liege that neither you nor your subjects will take part in [From.GetHerHis] conversion.
My [Root.GetTitle],\nI am overjoyed to hear of your conversion to the [From.Religion.GetName].\nI had long since prayed for you to see the light.

My [Root.GetTitle],\nFor many years I have looked at the followers of [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetHighGodName] with a sympathetic eye. You cannot imagine what a relief it is to hear of your conversion.
My [Root.GetTitle],\nWhat you ask of me is not easy, but I will not deny your request. I will join you at [Root.Capital.GetName] and convert to the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith with you.

My [Root.GetTitle], \nI have long thought about your request and I have come to the conclusion that I cannot abandon our ancestors' gods. I will not attend your great conversion, nor will any of my vassals.

The conversion of [converting_king.Capital.GetName] starts on a cold morning.\nThe Bishop leading [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s embassy meets your liege at a river near the city. You stand beside [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName], while [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects wait their turn behind you, looking still visibly confused.The Bishop recites a few verses from the Bible, then [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] leads you all in the river while the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests baptize you as you pass by them. It takes some prodding from the guards to convince the peasants to follow you into the water, but, after a while, the entire crowd stands soaked and shaking by the riverside, just in time to watch the priests and their helpers drop your old idols into the waves.\n"As the false visages are swallowed by the tides," the Bishop proclaims, "may their memory forever be banished from your soul."

You meet with your liege and [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s Imams in the middle of [converting_king.Capital.GetName]'s square.\nAddressing the crowd of commoners reunited all around you, [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] publicly denounces the old gods and spits on their false idols, gesturing for your and the [converting_king.GetHerHis] vassals to do the same. A few complaints rise from the crowd, but they are swiftly quelled. Then, as the Imams set fire to the icons, you declare your faith to Allah and to His Prophet.\nYou all turn your back to the pyre of false gods and bow to Mecca.

The hooded priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrive at dawn, but the ceremony begins only after sunset, after they have helped the icons of the new gods adjust to their new home in [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s temple.\nYou meet with your liege outside the city, a crowd of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects assembling all around you, and then, under the grim echoes of drums and horns, the Germanic priests begin the rite. They paint your faces with the blood of the sacrificial lambs, burn sacred herbs and chant their secret spells, as you all enter a trance.\nVisions of horror and delight accompany you for the rest of the night. When you wake at dawn of the next day, the priests are already gone. Little by little, the confused crowd of converts returns to [converting_king.Capital.GetName].

Following the instructions of [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests, [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] summons you and [converting_king.GetHerHis] other vassals and ride out of [converting_king.Capital.GetName] on [converting_king.GetHerHis] best horse.\nThe Tengri priests lead you away from the civilized roads, deep into the wilderness, refusing to answer to any query about your destination.\nAfter riding for the entire day, you stop at the edge of a cliff, looking at the bleeding hues of the sunset. The priests burn a few offerings of food to the sky god, creating a large line of dark smoke from a small set of fires. Then, as their chants echo through the air, you all ride through the smoke following your liege and cleanse yourself of the old gods.

The priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] insist that the ritual be performed at sunset. When the time comes you meet your liege at the top of a cliff outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], with a crowd of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects waiting below. \nThe priests start the ceremony chanting and playing their sacred instruments. When the last rays of sun disappear in the distance you all proclaim that your old gods are dying with this day. The priests resume their singing and dancing, enduring for the entirety of the night, even after most of the common crowd has fallen asleep. When dawn comes, they proclaim that you are reborn with the new day under the protection of Dievas.

The priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] insist that the ritual be performed at sunset. When the time comes you meet your liege at the top of a cliff outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], with a crowd of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects waiting below. \nThe priests start the ceremony creating a large fire with your offerings in order to satiate the spirits. When the last rays of sun disappear in the distance you all proclaim that your old gods are dying with this day. The priests resume their singing and dancing, enduring for the entirety of the night, even after most of the common crowd has fallen asleep. When dawn comes and the pillar of smoke finally vanishes, they proclaim that the sky god has accepted your offering and welcomes you under his protection.

The priests from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] insist that the ritual be performed at sunset. When the time comes you meet your liege at the top of a cliff outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], with a crowd of [converting_king.GetHerHis] subjects waiting below. \nThe priests start the ceremony beating their drums to gain the favor of the thunder god. When the last rays of sun disappear in the distance you all proclaim that your old gods are dying with this day. The priests resume their singing and dancing, enduring for the entirety of the night, even after most of the common crowd has fallen asleep. When dawn comes, they proclaim that you are reborn with the new day under the protection of Perun.

Following the instructions of the Aztec priests, your liege rounds up a group of convicted criminals and has them dragged in the middle of [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName]'s square, where a crowd has already rallied.\nThere, the priests dress them up with blind masks depicting your old gods and adorn you, your liege and all [converting_king.GetHerHis] other vassals with the garments of the new ones.\nThe confused and scared criminals are then set free, and in a ritualistic skirmish, you slaughter them in front of your subjects, bathing in their blood and proclaiming your allegiance to the gods of the West.

The shamans from [sponsoring_king.Capital.GetName] arrive in a long procession, carrying an endless parade of idols.\nYou meet them alongside your liege and [converting_king.GetHerHis] other vassals in the middle of [converting_king.Capital.GetName]'s main square, where you publicly renounce the old gods and welcome the new ones in your realm. One by one, you bow and kiss the feet of the new totems as they are carried inside your temple, while the priests interpret the gods' reactions to your welcome and placate any angry spirits of the old faith with loud drumming.

The [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests arrive at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] with a luxurious parade, carrying the tall, shining statue of the sun god to the center of [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s capital. \nYou meet them with your liege and [converting_king.GetHerHis] other vassals, surrounded by a crowd of commoners, and publicly renounce your old gods before bowing to the golden idol. \nOne by one, [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] orders your offerings of gold and precious stones to be delivered unto the new god, covering his statue little by little with increasingly more opulent garments. After you have all finished with your donations, some of the people from the crowd join in as well, leaving what little they have at the feet of the idol as it is carried inside its new home.

The Hellenic priests arrive to [converting_king.Capital.GetName] a few days before the ceremony in order to settle the statues of the new gods in their new home.\nThe evening before the conversion, you and your liege are summoned in the temple's garden, where the priests strip you naked and have your entire bodies shaved and washed. The morning after, you meet the priests outside the temple with a large crowd at your back, and watch them sacrifice a dozen bulls to the main gods in front of the doors of the temple. The priests then carry the remains of their offerings inside, and, after a long hour, they finally re-emerge from their sanctum to address the confused crowd and proclaim that the gods have accepted your offering and will take further donations in consideration in the future.

The [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests arrive a few days before the ceremony in order to settle in their new temple.\nFor all the remaining days before the event, you and your liege find yourself stuck listening to an endless list of rules and rituals that the priests swear you must absolutely know in order to correctly worship [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When the day for the mass conversion comes, the ceremony itself looks almost like an afterthought in comparison to the bureaucratic preparation. The priests quickly cleanse all old icons publicly and allow you to renounce your old gods before hiding back inside the temple and resuming their private rituals.

The [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] rabbis arrive to [converting_king.Capital.GetName] on a clear morning. \nYou meet up with them alongside your liege and at the head of a large crowd in the middle of the main square. Three tall pedestals have been set up for the newcomers, following their instructions, and the three assigned judges amongst them take place atop them. Your liege is the first to be called to the public beth din, and for what feels like an eternity, the three judges examine the sincerity of [converting_king.GetHerHis] conversion. After they are finished with [converting_king.GetHerHim], they move onto you and the other vassals, testing you one by one as the crowd watches in silence.

Strangely enough, the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests arrive at [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] capital without much pomp.\nThey ask both your liege and all of you to remain in seclusion with them for the remaining days before the conversions, they respectfully remove the icons of the old gods from your temple, and instruct you about your new responsibilities as [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] converts. When the day of the great ceremony comes, you meet with your liege outside [converting_king.Capital.GetName], surrounded by a crowd of commoners. There, you strip yourselves of all your regalia, sit around a sacred fire and meditate in silence, with the priests' soft chanting echoing in the background.

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to be baptized by a [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priest. \nThe once proud people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been led like cattle through a river while the blasphemous ceremony took place above them. \nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before the shadow of the cross reaches [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to burn the statues of the old gods and convert to Islam. \nThe once proud people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been forced to watch their gods be humiliated and destroyed by foreign priests with the approval of their own [converting_king.GetTitle]. \nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before the shadow of the crescent moon reaches [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the brutal Germanic gods. \nThe once proud people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been forced to consume magic herbs and commit obscene rituals to please their new warmongering masters. \nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the wild cult of the sky god Tengri. \nAccording to all accounts of the event, [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and [converting_king.GetHerHis] sycophants have abandoned their subjects and ran off into the wilderness where the foreign priests summoned evil spirits to possess their bodies and twist their minds. \nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected the common people to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] gods. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have employed a vile ritual to summon evil spirits to control and twist the minds of your liege and the other converts.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] gods. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have employed a vile ritual to summon evil spirits to control and twist the minds of your liege and the other converts.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] gods. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have employed a vile ritual to summon evil spirits to control and twist the minds of your liege and the other converts.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the bloodthirsty Sunset gods. \nAccording to most accounts, your liege and [converting_king.GetHerHis] followers have publicly slaughtered a crowd of innocent people while under a demonic frenzy, and then eaten the remains of their victims under the orders of their new masters.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected the people of [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] gods. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have forced all the people reunited for the ceremony to prostrate to the ground and cry for the favor of their new gods in a most humiliating display.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the sun god. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have forced all the people reunited for the ceremony to give away all their possessions to the golden statue of their greedy new god in a most humiliating display.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected them to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the Hellenic gods. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have completely taken over the capital and are starting to dictate laws without even consulting with the [converting_king.GetTitle].\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected the common folks to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have completely taken over the capital and are starting to dictate laws without even consulting with the [converting_king.GetTitle].\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected the common folks to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to form a covenant with Yahweh. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have put all the clan leaders under trial for worshiping demons, treating your fellow clansmen in a most humiliating fashion.\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected the common folks to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].

[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and all of [converting_king.GetHerHis] spineless new converts have reunited at [converting_king.Capital.GetName] to embrace the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith. \nAccording to most accounts, the foreign priests have completely taken over the capital and are starting to dictate laws without even consulting with the [converting_king.GetTitle].\nYou can only imagine what sort of indignities the foreign priests subjected the common folks to, but you are certain that now it is only a matter of time before this new religion forces its way to [Root.Capital.GetName].
We must preserve our ancient ways!
Truly, I am now a devout [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] (Lie).

[Root.GetTitledName],
Our [converting_king.GetTitle] has decreed that all [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is to be [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName].
I urge you to join me at [converting_king.Capital.GetName], where we will all officially convert to the new faith.

[From.GetTitledName]
Of course I will become a [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName]!
I will never betray the old gods!

Not only has [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] forsaken the old gods and the sacred traditions of my ancestors by embracing a strange and new religion, [converting_king.GetSheHe] has also fallen under the influence of a foreign ruler, the [sponsoring_king.GetTitle] who converted [converting_king.GetHerHim].\n[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] has proven to be a traitor to [converting_king.GetHerHis] people as well as a weak ruler.
And for all this I will forever hate [converting_king.GetHerHim].

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s stubbornness in clinging to the old faith has become more than a simple nuisance. \nMany have reported [From.GetHerHim] claiming that I am a traitor to my people and that I have sold off [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName].\nThere's little doubt [From.GetFirstName] has become my enemy.
I will have to deal with [From.GetHerHim] somehow.

I have just received news that [From.GetTitledFirstName] turned away from [From.GetHerHis] own faith!\n[From.GetSheHeCap] is still willing to sponsor the mass conversion of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
This is unacceptable. The ceremony is canceled.

With the unfortunate departure of [From.GetTitledFirstName] so goes the support of [From.GetHerHis] realm for the conversion of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. \nI will need to find someone else to help me in this endeavor.

It appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] died before [From.GetSheHe] could achieve salvation for [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.GetHerHis] people. \nThe great ceremony for the mass conversion of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been postponed indefinitely.

It seems [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s conviction was not as firm as [From.GetSheHe] claimed.\nI have just learned that [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith to become a [From.Religion.GetName].
[From.GetHerHisCap] actions put an end to our agreement.
Perhaps it is just a momentary lapse in judgment...

I have just received news that [From.GetTitledFirstName], the [From.GetManWoman] who helped me spread the new religion all across my realm, has abandoned that very religion in favor of the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
[From.GetHerHisCap] actions put an end to our agreement.
It does not mean we cannot still be on good terms.

I have just received news that [From.GetTitledFirstName], the [From.GetManWoman] who helped me spread the new faith across your realm, has died. \nWithout [From.GetHerHis] assistance, I am not sure I would have been able to tame the tribes of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and drag them to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

Esteemed [Root.GetTitledName],
The words of your missionary have convinced me to forsake my old religion and lead [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to its rightful place amongst the civilized realms.
I humbly request [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s assistance to ensure a peaceful transition into the [Root.Religion.GetName]'s faith.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
Our [converting_king.GetTitle] has decreed that all [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is to be [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName].
I have decided to take a stand for our old gods and deny [converting_king.GetHerHis] request. I urge you to do the same.

[From.GetTitledName]
Sorry, but I need to follow the [converting_king.GetTitle]'s will.

[Root.GetTitledName],
Our [converting_king.GetTitle] has decreed that all [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is to be [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName].
We cannot oppose [converting_king.GetHerHis] decision openly, but I believe that, together, we may keep our gods' memory alive in secret.

[From.GetTitledName]
Sorry, but I need to follow the [converting_king.GetTitle]'s will.

Some time has passed since the great conversion.\nIt is clear now that the followers of the old faith have no place in [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s new realm. The more I wait, the stronger will be the sway of the [converting_king.Religion.GetName] clergy over my people. \nWe must act now if we wish to reclaim our lands for the old gods and break the shackles of the new religion.
It is time to retake what's ours!

To all the followers of the true gods of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!\nOur [converting_king.GetTitle] has forsaken the old ways and sold [converting_king.GetHerHis] beliefs to a foreign [sponsoring_king.GetTitle]. We must stand together and break the shackles of the perverse [converting_king.Religion.GetName] faith!\n[From.GetTitledName]

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has rallied [From.GetHerHis] tribes and declared open war against all followers of [converting_king.Religion.GetHighGodName] in [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] in a last ditch effort to preserve [From.GetHerHis] backwards, dying religion.
It is time to get rid of these [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] worshipers for good.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] decided to abandon [From.GetHerHis] faith in the middle of the preparations for the mass conversion of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!\nFollowing this unforeseen event, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has had no other option but to cancel the whole ceremony.

News have reached court about [FromFrom.GetTitledName]'s passing.\nWithout [FromFrom.GetHerHis] support, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has had no other choice but to hold off the ceremony for the mass conversion of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], at least until [From.GetSheHe] finds another respected [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] ruler to support [From.GetHerHim] in this project.

To [From.GetHerHis] last breath my [GetFromRelation] opposed our liege's decision to abandon the old faith. With the mass conversion only a few days away, I must decide if I wish to follow in [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s footsteps or bow to the will of my liege.
I will remain true to my [GetFromRelation]'s wish.

In order to help my subjects to better understand their new responsibilities as [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] converts, [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName] has sent a knowledgeable priest to [Root.Capital.GetName]. He will be a great addition to the court.

It has been some time since the great ceremony. \nMy conversion to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has been an eye-opening experience. Abandoning the old gods has made me realize how much more purpose my life can have while serving [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Everyday I am amazed by how different everything looks through my new [Root.Religion.GetName] perspective...
I must embrace this newfound faith.
But my conversion was mainly for political reasons.

The more I think about the great conversion, the more doubt gnaws at my mind. [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests put up a nice spectacle, but even after converting your entire realm, there was no miracle, no divine revelation to reward your accomplishment. The peasants still toil in the fields, the chieftains still squabble amongst themselves. \nNothing changed.
Why does not [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] speak to me?
I must not waver. A sign will come.

Becoming a [Root.Religion.GetName] has forced me to rethink a lot of my life choices. \nMy conversion will have been for nothing if I do not strive to better serve [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and my [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects.
I should do more for my subjects.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would not wish for a weak servant.

Since the day of the great conversion, I have spent many hours listening to [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests, learning more about my newly acquired faith. \nBeing lectured day and night by all these old men of the cloth is making me realize how little I know about [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and of my new responsibilities as a [Root.Religion.GetName].
I am sure there are many things that the priests do not know either.

I have had a lot of time to meditate about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] since my conversion. \nKnowing that I still have to prove myself before my new protector has filled me with a divine resolve to test my mettle against the infidels.
How can I serve [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] if I am dead?

Since the day of the great conversion, I have spent many hours listening to [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests, learning more about my newly acquired faith. If there is one thing that they all agree upon, it is how beneficial it would be for the salvation of my soul to regularly and generously invest more of my material gains in the newly established religion.
Perhaps I should be more charitable...
I doubt any of my possessions are worthy of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].

Since the day of the great conversion, I have spent many hours listening to [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests, learning more about my newly acquired faith. \nAll this time away from the excesses of the life at the [Root.GetHouse] has forced me to limit my diet to a couple of scarce meals per day.

There is still much that I have to learn about being a [Root.Religion.GetName], but, thanks to the help of [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s priests, I feel I am every day a little closer to understanding how to properly serve [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
I have still much to learn about this new religion...

Although the great conversion of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] was a success, my work to help [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s savage people to turn them into proper [Root.Religion.GetName] converts is not done yet.
A new church is what they need.

Send a missionary force to §Y[converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! in order to proselytize in the realm's remaining pagan provinces.

After helping them see the light of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and their [converting_king.GetTitle] have often been in my thoughts. \nPerhaps visiting [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] could help improve the relations between our realms.
Travel to §Y[converting_king.Capital.GetName]§! to meet §Y[converting_king.GetTitledFirstName]§! and spend some time there to know [converting_king.GetHerHim] better.

[Root.GetTitledName],
We have decided to help you in your holy quest to turn your subjects to the true faith by funding the construction of a new church in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. 

[From.GetTitledName]
A new church is just what we need.

[Root.GetTitledName], 
I am glad to read of your decision. A new church is just what we needed to help spread the word of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to the masses. 

[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName], 
I appreciate your thought, but I must refuse your proposal: maintaining a new church would be no easy task, even if its construction was covered by your generous offer. 

[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
In order to assist you in the conversion of your lands to the rightful worship of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], we have decided to send you a modest sum of gold from Our royal coffers. 

[From.GetTitledName]

Esteemed [Root.GetTitledName],\nYour generous offer was much appreciated. You can rest assured that your gold will be dutifully invested to spread the holy message of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].

[Root.GetTitledName],
In an effort to assist you in the conversion of your realm, we have decided to send more of Our missionaries to your lands. They will be sure to rectify the path of the few remaining wayward subjects.

[From.GetTitledName]
Missionaries from §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! will be dispatched to one of your pagan provinces in order to convert it to the new faith.\nNote that their actions might upset the peasantry.
No, I do not want foreign priests upsetting the peasants.

[Root.GetTitledName],
I was glad for the arrival of your missionaries. The sooner all of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] becomes [Root.Religion.GetName] the better for everyone.

[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
I am afraid I have had to send your missionaries back without allowing them to fulfill their task. Tensions are still high after the great ceremony, and I do not wish to stir the peasants into open rebellion.

Thanks to the efforts of [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s missionaries, the people of [From.GetName] have abandoned their old pagan beliefs and embraced the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith.

[Root.GetTitledName],
We are happy to announce Our impending visit to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. It has been some time now since your conversion to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith, and we are eager to meet you in person and see your realm now that it is properly civilized.

[From.GetTitledName]

There is still some time to prepare for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s unexpected visit. This meeting presents me with a great opportunity to improve my relationship with the [FromFrom.GetTitle] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I should be careful not to squander it.

Traveling to the tribal realm of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been a reinvigorating experience for me. With only a small escort, I have left the familiar sights of my homeland to visit a more savage region of the known world, only to help spread the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. I cannot wait to witness the effects of the mass conversion on [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] subjects.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s party has finally been spotted in my provinces. Though [From.GetSheHe] knows the way to [Root.Capital.GetName], it might help to have somebody go meet up with [From.GetHerHim] and officially welcome [From.GetHerHim] to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to come meet me a few days from the capital to formally and personally welcome me to [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Riding alongside [From.GetHerHis] men-at-arms, there was also [convert_lord_spiritual.GetTitledName], the [Root.Culture.GetName] priest I had sent to help [From.GetTitledFirstName] some time ago. Seeing a familiar face traveling with my host has certainly been an appreciated gesture.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to come meet me a few days from the capital to formally and personally welcome me to [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Seeing my host come meet me in person has certainly been an appreciated gesture.

I was surprised to see [convert_lord_spiritual.GetTitledName], the [Root.Culture.GetName] priest I had sent to help [From.GetTitledFirstName] some time ago, ride to officially welcome me to [convert_lord_spiritual.GetHerHis] new liege's realm. Despite having made our presence quite apparent and being now only a few days from [From.Capital.GetName], no welcoming party was sent from the capital to greet me. I am not sure if [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s rudeness is a result of ignorance or spite.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was clearly pleased to have me welcome [From.GetHerHim] personally before arriving at the capital. [From.GetSheHeCap] thanked me for my kindness and talked about what an interesting travel [From.GetSheHe] has had up to this point. [From.GetSheHeCap] was also happy to see [convert_lord_spiritual.GetTitledName] riding by my side. This visit is certainly off to a good start.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was clearly pleased to have me welcome [From.GetHerHim] personally before arriving at the capital. [From.GetSheHeCap] thanked me for my kindness and talked about what an interesting travel [From.GetSheHe] has had up to this point. This visit is certainly off to a good start.

Sending [convert_lord_spiritual.GetTitledName] to meet [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not a bad idea. I just received a report from the priest telling me that his former liege was glad to be welcomed by a familiar face. This visit is certainly off to a good start.

Despite lacking any proper welcome party, the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] did not look particularly displeased when [From.GetSheHe] finally reached the gates of [Root.Capital.GetName], at least according to the reports I received from my courtiers.

Despite meeting [From.GetHerHim] with all the pomp a [From.GetTitle] deserves, [From.GetTitledFirstName] looked quite displeased after our first encounter. After my arrival at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s palace, I was pleased to see that my host had prepared a magnificent feast in my honor, providing me and my men with all sorts of food and entertainment. For the rest of the night after our arrival, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] Chieftains delighted us with the history of their tribes and their legendary ancestors.

My arrival at [From.Capital.GetName] was graced by sumptuous parade organized by [From.GetTitledFirstName] in my honor. Watching the lines of warriors and chieftains chanting and marching through the street to lead me to my host's palace was quite the spectacle.

I was not happy to discover that my host had only organized a small banquet in honor of my arrival. While I appreciated eating at least some decent food after the long travel, it hardly felt like a feast fit for a [Root.GetTitle].

I was not happy to discover that my host had not prepared anything for my arrival at [From.Capital.GetName]. Especially after the long travel, I was hoping to have at least some decent food, rather than be shown immediately to my chambers.
Not bad. Not bad at all.
I suppose it is passable at least...
A warm bed is all I need right now.
This is not what I expected.
Looks like my efforts to impress [From.GetTitledFirstName] with a lavish feast were not in vain: my guest looked very satisfied of the food and entertainment I provided for the night.
Looks like my efforts to impress [From.GetTitledFirstName] with a great parade in [From.GetHerHis] honor were not in vain: my guest looked very satisfied of the spectacle I provided for the evening.

Despite my lack of preparation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not look too upset to see that I had only prepared a meager feast for [From.GetHerHis] arrival. Perhaps, after the hardships of the travel, [From.GetSheHe] was just happy to finally sleep under a roof.

Despite my lack of preparation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not look too upset to see that I had nothing prepared for [From.GetHerHis] arrival. Perhaps, after the hardships of the travel, [From.GetSheHe] was just happy to finally sleep under a roof.

Despite my best efforts, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not look pleased by the feast I had prepared for [From.GetHerHim]. After eating only a little, [From.GetSheHe] excused [From.GetHerselfHimself] and retired to [From.GetHerHis] assigned chambers.

Despite my best efforts, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not look pleased by the parade I had prepared for [From.GetHerHim]. After watching the spectacle only for a while, [From.GetSheHe] excused [From.GetHerselfHimself] and retired to [From.GetHerHis] assigned chambers.

Unfortunately, it appears that my lack of effort in the preparation for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s welcoming feast did not go unnoticed. The [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] looked clearly upset to be presented with little food and no entertainment.

Predictably, the complete lack of preparation for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s arrival did not go unnoticed. The [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] was quite upset to discover no feast nor celebration had been organized for [From.GetHerHis] arrival.

Having [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] in my court for a few days presents me with a great opportunity to strengthen the relationship between our realms. If I could convince [FromFrom.GetHerHim] that [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is a civilized and respectable realm, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] might decide that it is in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] best interests to strengthen our alliance.
I will talk to [FromFrom.GetHerHim] about our laws and customs.
I will talk to [FromFrom.GetHerHim] about our military strength.
I will convince [FromFrom.GetHerHim] that our realms are not so different.
I will show [FromFrom.GetHerHim] how much we learned about the [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] faith.

As days pass by in [From.Capital.GetName] I am more and more surprised by the complexity of the laws and customs of the locals. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed [From.GetHerselfHimself] to be a distinguished and civilized ruler, very unlike the primitive chieftain I initially thought [From.GetHerHim] to be. As days pass by in [From.Capital.GetName] I am more and more surprised by strength and complex hierarchy of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s army. Thanks to my continuous efforts, I seem to have convinced [From.GetTitledFirstName] that [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is a respectable and powerful realm, one that no [From.Religion.GetName] [From.GetTitle] would be ashamed to call an ally.\nWith [From.GetHerHis] visit nearing its end, this might be my last chance to ensure the continued alliance of our two realms.
Propose an alliance by marriage with [From.GetTitledFirstName].

Despite my continuous efforts to prove otherwise, I have been unable to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] that [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is a respectable and powerful realm, one that has abandoned its tribal roots entirely.\nYet, with [From.GetHerHis] visit nearing its end, this might be my last chance to ensure the continued alliance of our two realms.

Only a few days before my departure from [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] has surprised me with a bold request: [From.GetSheHe] wishes to bind [From.GetHerHis] realm with mine by marrying me.
I am afraid I have other plans.

Only a few days before my departure from [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] graces me with an unexpected private meeting in my chambers. After hesitating about the subject of [From.GetHerHis] visit for a while, the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] finally confesses that, during these past days, [From.GetSheHe] has developed a deep affection for me and wishes to know if I feel the same about [From.GetHerHim].
Of course I love you too!

With only a few days left before my departure from [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] took some time during our last dinner together to ask me if, after learning more about [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] realm, I have come to consider [From.GetHerHim] a friend.

With only a few days left before my departure from [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] took some time during our last dinner together to tell me how honored [From.GetSheHe] was to host a guest as distinguished as myself and that [From.GetSheHe] hopes this will not be the last time we meet.
I assure you, the honor was indeed all yours.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was thrilled by my marriage proposal, so much so that [From.GetSheHe] insisted we organized the ceremony in [Root.Capital.GetName] immediately. With this union, an alliance between [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been ensured for years to come.

Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledFirstName] politely rejected my proposal before excusing [From.GetHerselfHimself] and leaving. With [From.GetHerHis] refusal the chance to bind our realms together permanently has passed me by.
Maybe [From.GetSheHe] will change [From.GetHerHis] mind in the future.

I was relieved to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] does reciprocates my feelings for [From.GetHerHim]. We spent our last night together consuming our passion, thus ensuring the continued alliance between our two realms, just in time for [From.GetHerHis] departure.

Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledFirstName] politely rejected my advances before excusing [From.GetHerselfHimself] and leaving. With [From.GetHerHis] refusal the chance to bind our realms together permanently has passed me by.

I was glad to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] considers [From.GetHerselfHimself] a friend of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], just as I consider myself a friend of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Hopefully, our relationship will ensure a peaceful and prosperous future for both our realms.
As long as we both live, at least.

Unfortunately, despite [From.GetHerHis] attempts to assure me that we are not enemies, I remain doubtful of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s friendship. I am afraid our realms may not remain at peace for long.

It has finally come the time for the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to leave [Root.Capital.GetName] and return to [From.GetHerHis] realm. I can only hope that, during [From.GetHerHis] visit, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to appreciate me and my people and that [From.GetSheHe] will now see us as more than simple tribal converts.

The time has finally come for me to leave [From.Capital.GetName] and return to my own realm. Living with [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s tribes was certainly an interesting experience. By going to personally meet the new converts, I truly have done everything in my power to put these pagans on the right path.

[sponsoring_king.GetTitledName] decided to travel to [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] in order to meet [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and witness the effects of the mass conversion of [converting_king.GetHerHis] realm in the aftermath of the great ceremony.

The tribes of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been converted to the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] faith. A group of priests sent by the [sponsoring_king.GetTitle] of [sponsoring_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have performed a great ritual during which they have converted the entire population of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] alongside [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] and many of [converting_king.GetHerHis] vassals.\nWith this act, the people of [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have once and for all forsaken their old pagan gods.
Going against all Christian traditions, this ruler has spurned the Pope and crowned [Root.GetHerHim]self. Such a blasphemous act is a certain sign of a mind gone mad with power.
a notable prelate of the Church
This ruler died before he could even receive his crown, a most shameful display.

This ruler received [Root.GetHerHis] crown in seclusion, without much celebration. While this is a clear sign of lack of wealth and influence, some members of the Church may also consider it a show of humility.
This ruler received [Root.GetHerHis] crown at the culmination of an entire month of glorious festivities in [Root.GetHerHis] honor, a clear show of power and wealth that few will forget.
The Imperial Crown of the Holy Roman Empire, an octagonal hoop showered with precious stones, representing dominion over all Romans.
An Imperial crown inspired by the regalia worn by the old Sassanids Shahs, reforged to honor the King who restored Persia to its ancient splendor.
The iron crown forged for the leader of the belligerent Norse reformers.
The Papacy will claim all titles under the disputed title that are held by infidels and vassalize all titles that are held by [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers.

To [Root.GetTitledName],

To [Root.GetTitledName],

[From.GetTitledName]
The warrior-monks will have their lands.
I do not wish to give away pieces of my realm for a crown.
It appears the Pope was not content with excommunicating me from the Church, he has now enlisted the help of [From.GetTitledFirstName] to unseat me from my very throne.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has enlisted the help of [From.GetTitledFirstName] in order to depose my Anti-pope through the strength of arms.

The road forward is clear: I must depose the corrupted [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] throne in order to earn my crown. Only once this war has been won will I be able to continue with the preparations for my anointment.

The road forward is clear: I must mend the schism brewing within the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church by removing the Anti-pope that is currently challenging the authority of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. In order to do so, I must wage war against [From.GetTitledName]. Only once this war has been won will I be able to continue with the preparations for my anointment.
May God see that day come soon.

With the false Pope forced to abandon his unholy quest for power, and with full dignity restored to the Church, the Pope has finally accepted to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
Before I can recognize your divine right to rule, you must deliver back under Papal control some Italian lands being currently withheld by a wicked ruler against Our wishes, a clear violation of the sacred agreement between Emperor Pepin and Pope Stephanus II.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
You shall have your lands back.
I will not wage a war on behalf of the Papacy.

The Papal State has decided to press some of its ancient claims over Italy by enlisting the help of [From.GetTitledName]. If our armies are defeated in the coming war, we will all be forced to submit to the rule of the Supreme Pontiff.
The road forward is clear: I must press the Church's claim over [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and restore [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s lands to Papal rule if I wish to be crowned [Root.GetTitle].
And reclaim these lands I shall.

I have successfully wrestled Papal lands from infidel control and delivered them back under the blessed authority of the Holy See. Such an act has certainly ensured me a place in Heaven, or at the very least the gratitude of the Pope.

I have successfully wrestled Papal lands from infidel control and delivered them back under the blessed authority of the Holy See. Now that this war is over, it is finally time for me to receive my crown.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
Your request is frankly ludicrous. Emperor Constantine gave full control of the Western Empire to the Papacy when he decided to move his court to the Eastern Provinces. If you wish to have a crown, I urge you to openly submit to the Holy See.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
If this is the will of God...

As such is the will of the Holy See, I decided to formally submit myself and my Empire to the sacred authority of the Universal Church. From now and forever more, His Holiness [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and His successors will have control over our lands, as it was intended by Emperor Constantine when he originally split the Roman Empire.
Surely it is for the best.

The Holy See has seen fit to press its ancient claim over my lands, and, in [From.GetHerHis] wisdom, my liege has decided to grant him his request. As such, it appears I have now become a vassal of the Holy See.
Surely it is for the best?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has died: with [From.GetHerHim] gone I must find another priest to anoint me [Root.GetTitle].
Now that I have a distinguished member of the [Root.Religion.GetName] clergy to officiate my coronation, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.
It shall be an extravagant ceremony.
Send invitations to all your vassals as well as any neighboring [Root.Religion.GetName] Kings to join you for the greatest feast of the century.
Send invitations to all your vassals to join you for a celebration fit for a [Root.GetTitle].
I will have a private ceremony.
Send invitations only to your Council members, asking them to join you for a private party leading up to your coronation.

My dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I wish to formally invite you to my court for a period of festivities leading up to my coronation.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
I will be sure to attend.

Distinguished [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I wish to formally invite you to my court for a period of festivities leading up to my coronation.
