I will be sure to attend.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nI will be glad to attend your coronation!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nI am afraid I have to decline your invitation.

The time of my coronation draws near: only a few more days before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before God and all my subjects. My court has been already filled with all the vassals of my realm who have come to bear witness to this fundamental moment of my reign.

The time of my coronation draws near: only a few more days before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before God and all my subjects. It will be a long wait with very little to do, but I hope at least that this period of seclusion will give me time to ponder upon my future responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle].
It will never be soon enough.
And yet, maybe I should keep my distance from [potential_friend.GetHerHim].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has spared no expenses for [From.GetHerHis] coronation. As I was admiring the lavish sights offered by [From.GetHerHis] palace, I was approached by the [From.GetTitle] [From.GetHerselfHimself]. After having talked to [From.GetHerHim] for a while, I am starting to think we might have a lot in common...
Let us join our realms in friendship!
will receive your request of friendship.
And yet, maybe I should keep my distance from [potential_friend.GetHerHim].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has cheerfully accepted my offer of friendship. I was not wrong putting my trust in [From.GetHerHim], and now, thanks to this fortuitous meeting, we have both ensured a lasting peace between our two realms.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has cheerfully accepted my offer for friendship. I was not wrong in putting my trust in [From.GetHerHim], and now, thanks to this fortuitous meeting, I have further guaranteed the stability of my realm.

Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not seem to share my feelings and politely refused my offer of friendship. While [From.GetSheHe] was hardly rude or confrontational, it is unfortunate that we could not see eye to eye.
Maybe [From.GetSheHe] will change [From.GetHerHis] mind in the future...

Organizing such a great ceremony has given me the chance to know better some of my vassals. Maintaining healthy relationships with all my subjects is fundamental to ensure the future stability and prosperity of my realm. [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] in particular seems like a [potential_friend.GetManWoman] I could really trust...
And yet, maybe I should keep my distance from [potential_friend.GetHerHim].

Meeting new rulers and exchanging ideas about politics and royal virtues has been an interesting consequence of this ceremony. Everybody has at least one anecdote to share with me about the proper way to rule a Kingdom. I wonder which is closer to the truth...
Fostering good relations with one's neighbors and subjects is paramount.
Proper handling of the realm's finances is fundamental.

During the evening, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has remarked on multiple occasions of how it is important for a new ruler to create stable diplomatic relationships with [From.GetHerHis] peers and subjects in order to ensure peace and prosperity for everyone. [From.GetHerHisCap] show of dialectics has been a revelation for all the guests.
I might even learn something from [From.GetHerHis] example.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has entertained [From.GetHerHis] guests during the evening with a remarkable show of knowledge in the matters of State. While tedious to a few of the guests, some of the ideas we all discussed about how to improve and solidify a realm's economy were quite inspirational.
I wonder if I could apply them on my own holdings...

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]'s presence for my upcoming coronation has lured an entire flock of scholars and theologians in my court. While most of them keep their distance from the nobility, I have had the chance to overhear a few of them discussing about the most intriguing, metaphysical subjects during the evening.
I will keep listening to them in the shadows.
...I might be learning something useful tonight.

With so many distinguished guests having traveled all the way to my court, the least I could do is entertain them while we all wait for the day of my coronation. This could also provide me with an opportunity to impress some of my more influential guests.
Having all the important grownups in my palace is great opportunity to show them that I am just as smart and wise as any [Root.GetTitle] no matter how old I am.
Attempt to use §YDiplomacy§! to impress your guests.
I do not want to embarrass myself before the ceremony.

Whatever doubts I might have had about my performance were completely unfounded: my speech about the duties of a good [Root.GetTitle] to [Root.GetHerHis] subjects was poignant and extremely well received.
When I started I was shaking a bit, but, after I finished listing all the responsibilities my tutor taught me about being a good [Root.GetTitle], all my guests applauded and congratulated me.
All of the guests' opinion is increased by §G+10§! because of your speech.

Despite my best efforts, my speech about the duties of a good [Root.GetTitle] to [Root.GetHerHis] subjects was received a bit too coldly compared to my expectations. Perhaps I should have used less platitudes and talked about something more substantive...

Just while I was in the middle of listing the duties of a good [Root.GetTitle] like my tutor taught me, somebody in the crowd coughed and I lost my concentration! After a few failed attempts at resuming my speech, I was too embarrassed to continue and left the room covering my face.
Ugh, this could have gone better.
All of the guests' opinion is lowered by §R-10§! because of your speech.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time decanting the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. [From.GetHerHisCap] speech was passionate and on point, enough to convince many of the people present that [From.GetSheHe] will be an extraordinary ruler.

The young [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time listing the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. It was quite surprising to see a child show already such wisdom, so much so that, after [From.GetHerHis] speech, many were convinced that, despite [From.GetHerHis] young age, [From.GetFirstName] might make a great [From.GetTitle].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time decanting the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. Sadly, [From.GetHerHis] speech was stale and filled with platitudes, and not many believed in the conviction that [From.GetSheHe] proclaimed to have.

The young [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time listing the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. Unfortunately, the child was not up to the task and stopped midway through [From.GetHerHis] speech, rushing away, red with embarrassment.

I can almost feel the weight of the crown over my head already, but it is far from burdensome: I feel reinvigorated by the prospect of finally becoming [Root.GetTitle]. Thinking about my new responsibilities as an anointed ruler fills me with trepidation.
I shall be the greatest [Root.GetTitle] ever!
This is a sign to stop slouching and take my work seriously.

With all this pomp and circumstance, all these lavish preparations, and with my coronation so close, I am finally starting to understand the weight and importance of my role as [Root.GetTitle]. People expect great things of me.
And I will not disappoint them.
Yet I should not let pride blind me.

Everybody is so kind and respectful to me, even a lot of important people that I only met a few days ago. This Coronation Ceremony is a lot more important than I had thought. It is really great to be a [Root.GetTitle]!
I am the most important person EVER!
I should work hard to show that I know how important this is.

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] approached me tonight to personally inform me of how satisfied [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] is with the great month of festivity I have organized to accompany my coronation. [coronation_priest.GetSheHeCap] wanted to be sure that I knew of how welcome [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] feels at my court, and that [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] expects great things of me.

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] tonight to personally inform [From.GetHerHim] of how satisfied [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] is of the great month of festivity [From.GetSheHe] has organized to accompany [From.GetHerHis] coronation. [coronation_priest.GetFirstName] wanted to be sure that [From.GetTitledFirstName], as well as everyone within earshot, knew of how welcome [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] feels at [From.GetHerHis] court, and that [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] expects great things of [From.GetHerHim].
It surely is an impressive ceremony...

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] took some time after dinner to take me aside and give me a long talk about what my new responsibilities will be after [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] crowns me Holy Roman Emperor. [coronation_priest.GetSheHeCap] warned me that being the heir to Charlemagne, as well as the protector of all Christendom will be a colossal undertaking, and that I should always strive to do my best to live up to the charge.
I will bring new glory to the Empire.
Tell me more about Charlemagne and the Emperors of old...
I will work tirelessly to be a worthy successor to this great man.

Late this evening, as the servants were clearing up our tables, [coronation_priest.GetTitledName] decided to talk to me about my new responsibilities after the coronation: as a [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle], I will be sworn to care for the secular needs of all my subjects as well as to stand against the tide of sin and heresy beseeching our world.
The world will never know a more devout [Root.GetTitle] than me.
Let us talk about the details of these responsibilities...

I can only imagine what pressure [From.GetTitledFirstName] must be under, to be given the responsibility of an entire realm while so young must be overwhelming. Perhaps I should take some time aside before dinner and try to teach [From.GetHerHim] a few things about being a good [Root.GetTitle], and thus repay the kindness [From.GetSheHe] did me by inviting me to such a lavish celebration.
Your [From.GetHonorific], could you lend me your ear for a moment?
I am sure [From.GetSheHe] will be able to handle it.

I was just preparing myself for dinner, when [From.GetTitledFirstName], one of my foreign guests, decided take me aside, offering to teach me a few things that a good [Root.GetTitle] should know in order to rule wisely.
I want to know! Tell me!
You are not my tutor, we are equal!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was happy to learn more about [From.GetHerHis] upcoming responsibilities as a [From.GetTitle] from me. I am sure that what I told [From.GetHerHim] tonight will be of great use to [From.GetHerHim] in the future, and it will make [From.GetHerHis] realm more prosperous as well.
A good action is its own reward.

Perhaps [From.GetTitledFirstName] is too young to understand that I was only attempting to aid [From.GetHerHim]: [From.GetSheHe] did not listen to my words and dismissed [From.GetHerselfHimself] as soon as [From.GetSheHe] could. This sacred ceremony might well be just a big game for [From.GetHerHim].
Such is the foolishness of youth.

I was surprised tonight when [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] stated that the period of festivity I have organized is unfit for the severity of the holy charge I am about to receive. [coronation_priest.GetSheHeCap] has concluded [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] scolding by remarking that [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] has witnessed many impious acts and degenerate behavior during [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] visit that have left [coronation_priest.GetHerHim] shocked and repulsed.

Many tonight were surprised when [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] stated that the period of festivity [From.GetTitledFirstName] has organized is unfit for the severity of the holy charge [From.GetSheHe] is about to take. [coronation_priest.GetSheHeCap] has concluded [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] scolding by remarking that [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] has witnessed many impious acts and degenerate behaviors during [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] visit that have left [coronation_priest.GetHerHim] shocked and repulsed.
Our host should be ashamed of [From.GetHerselfHimself].

It was not enough to learn that [From.GetTitledFirstName] was at [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s celebration: tonight, in the middle of dinner, my old rival decided to insult me in front of my host and many of the other guests!

I would be quite enjoying my visit at [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s court if it were not for [From.GetTitledFirstName] constant harassment. The [From.GetManWoman] is clearly jealous of my accomplishments as [Root.GetTitle], and cannot stop trying to besmirch my reputation, hoping it would make [From.GetHerHim] feel better about [From.GetHerselfHimself].

It was not enough to learn that [From.GetTitledFirstName] was at [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s celebration: tonight, in the middle of dinner, my old rival decided to insult me in front of my host and many of the other guests!

Inform your [GetFromRelation] that you will take leave and spend your pregnancy in the countryside.
Inform your [GetFromRelation] that you will keep ruling for the duration of the pregnancy.

This pregnancy is becoming a greater burden than I initially imagined. If I am not careful about my health, I may risk both my life as well as the child's. Perhaps I should take leave and spend the rest of the pregnancy in reclusion, looking after myself.
Retire and let your Regent take charge while you spend the last months of your pregnancy in seclusion in your private chambers.
I'd better leave the [Root.GetHouse] entirely then.
Retire and let your Regent take charge while you spend the last months of your pregnancy away from court.
Continue to rule at your own risk.
Thankfully, my [GetFromRelation] has taken my advice to heart and decided to spend the last months of her pregnancy in seclusion.
Thankfully, my [GetFromRelation] has taken my advice to heart and decided to spend the last months of her pregnancy away from court.
Unfortunately, my [GetFromRelation] has decided to ignore my advice and maintain a public presence even in her precarious state.

Curse them all! And the pox to this infernal piece of meat within me, stretching and destroying my body from the inside out! This is absolutely unbearable. I have snapped several times at my courtiers, even when I knew there was no good reason to do so, but I just cannot help it anymore! I want this to be over! Now!
Perhaps I should try to calm down.

It was only after the fifth course that I realized how much I had eaten last dinner. It has become so hard to tell when my body is already bloated, hosting a little insatiable pest. Perhaps I should stop bothering at all and just eat whenever I am hungry.
I am eating for two after all...
I should still try to use moderation.

The maid apologized and tried to bring me back to my chambers, but I refused her hand and kept crying in the middle of the corridor until two servants dragged me to my private rooms. It is my fourth episode this week and I am not feeling like it will stop anytime soon.
Yet, how inspiring my tribulation is...
I am a horrible person and a shame to my family.

Drinking a little every night has helped me a lot with relieving some of the tension I have been experiencing since the start of this pregnancy. I have started to feel a little dizzy in the past few days, but it is not like I have to do anything important in the next months anyway...
I will ask the servants for another round before going to sleep.
This is really irresponsible of me, I should stop.
Just as I was finally being lulled into sleep by the slow rocking of the carriage, when the horses suddenly broke off the driver's control, sending my entire entourage charging out of the road.

I thought being away from court and enjoying the clean air of the countryside would help me release some of the tension of this pregnancy, but it has only made things worse. My health is deteriorating by the day.
It is just some travel nausea.
Why is this happening to me?!

I thought being away from court and enjoying the clean air of the countryside would help me release some of the tension of this pregnancy, but [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] had other plans in mind. [Root.GetWildernessWeather]
A terrible sandstorm has engulfed my entourage, blinding the horses and leaving us lost in the desert.
A terrible storm has caught my entourage, deafening us all night with thunders and leaving us sore and completely damp in the morning.
I will not let a simple storm break me!

I have just realized today that, even with the pregnancy finally being over, I have yet to stop my daily visits to the cellar. I should probably stop it, but, on the other hand, it *has* become some sort of tradition by now for me and many courtiers do agree I have had a sunnier disposition since I started doing it.
No excuses: I cannot go on like this. I have to stop drinking so much.
I have survived a difficult labor: a little sip here and there won't hurt.

I thought that after the pregnancy I would go back being my usual self, but it seems I have gained a little weight. I am sure it is nothing to worry about, but still, reverting back to my old diet has not been as easy as I thought it would.
I should try to eat more moderately now that I have no child to sustain.
What is wrong with a little indulging?

This is the ninth servant I disciplined this week. The poor boy did not even cry as the guards flogged him. Now, I do not even remember what was the reason I was mad at the boy in the first place. The realization shook me: my temper has gotten really out of hand, what if I unleash it on my newborn child?
I really have an anger issue...

I have spent the last two days secluded in my chambers, refusing any food, too tired to move and too ailing to answer to any plead. I have given all myself to bring forth a new life into the world and now I feel empty, useless, discarded, alone. What was even the point of all that sufferance and anguish?
I cannot simply give up now. I have a child to look after.
There is no point in going on.
As days go by, I find harder and harder to ignore how my wife seems to have been letting herself go since her pregnancy, ravaging meal after meal.
She might use a little moderation.
She can take care of herself.
Outrageous! My spouse just had the nerve to tell me that I have put on too much weight and that I should start eating less, as if recovering from the pregnancy was not hard enough.
He *is* right after all. I should try harder to stop eating so much.
Fat?! I will show him fat!

Every night my wife keeps going down in the cellar, drinking herself to sleep. It was bad enough that she was doing it during the pregnancy, but I hoped she would have grown out of this bad habit by now.
Maybe she needs a little more encouragement...
There is nothing wrong in having a little bottle once in a while.

My husband seems to have noticed my nightly visits to the cellar: this morning he voiced his concern about having a drunkard for a wife. He could have been a little more gentle about it after all I have been through in the last months...
He is right! This behavior is unbecoming of me.
He should learn to enjoy himself a little and stop patronizing.
I hoped the solution would solve itself after the baby came out, but my wife's temper still remains a problem. I *could* try and tell her to calm a little, I suppose?
No, I am not feeling suicidal today.

My spouse, he *dared* to say I have a temper problem! After all I have done!! After all I have been through! He *dares* to complain, as if he has any right! Maybe I have become a little touchy after all the pain and stress I was exposed to in the last months, but that is understandable! What is *his* excuse?!
Hm... Perhaps I *do* have a temper problem.
It has been months since I saw my wife in a cheerful mood: she does not speak, she barely eats, never leaving her chambers unless she really has to. Every night I hear her crying in her sleep.
I cannot bear to see her this way. I should talk to her.
I really cannot stand her incessant moaning.

Today my husband talked a lot with me. Or rather to me, as I was not really in the mood for talking, myself. He was very gentle and tried to make me leave my room by inviting me to a private dinner. I do not know what to tell him.
I have suffered enough, perhaps this is my chance to live again.
I want nothing! Leave me alone!
My dear wife has finally listened to my advice. In a few weeks she might be back into shape.
It seems my advice fell on deaf ears. Every day that passes by my wife keeps stuffing herself like a goose. So much for moderation...
Ugh, we will need a larger bed.
I cannot remember the last time I saw my wife drunk. She has recovered from her bad habit quite nicely.
All my pleads have been for naught: my wife keeps sneaking out every night to drown her sorrows.
I do not know what else to do.
Surprisingly, even if she yelled at me when I talked about it, my wife seems to have finally resolved her anger issues. She is treating everybody better now.
Curses! I did not even manage to make my case: my wife just snapped at me and pushed me over the stairs. ...I think I broke something.
At least I am out of reach, for now.
It is such a relief to see my wife alive again! I was really starting to worry, but she finally managed to recover from her depression.
Now if only she could stop talking for once in awhile...
I do not know what to do with my wife anymore: I can barely recognize her, all gloom and pale, she looks like a ghost. She has become completely unresponsive to everything and everyone.
My health has quickly fallen in the last days to the point that I can no longer leave my bed. This pregnancy might be much more difficult than I expected.

Your wife's pregnancy is not going well at all. She can no longer leave her bed and has been barely conscious during the past few days. If she is not properly treated, she may well not survive the pregnancy.
Your [GetFromRelation]'s health has experienced a sudden drop during the last week. If she is not properly treated, she may well not survive the pregnancy.
My Court Physician will know how to help her.
Tell your wife that your Court Physician will take care of her in her time of need.
I am as good as any Physician. I will help her.
Tell your wife that you will put your skills as a Scholar to good use to help her in her time of need.
She needs a priest to pray for her.
Send a priest to comfort your wife in her time of need and pray for the salvation of her soul should the worst come to pass.
She needs a shaman to protect her.
Send a shaman to comfort your wife and cast the proper spells to facilitate her labor.
The only thing she needs is me.
Offer to comfort your wife in her time of need.
She will manage on her own.
In her current state [From.GetTitledFirstName] is almost entirely defenseless. Her pregnancy might present me with the perfect opportunity to get rid of her permanently.
No need to worry: she probably will die on her own.
As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I saw the golden gates of Heavens before me. A creature of light flew over them, blowing in his horn to let me in.

As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I saw the heavenly palace of Asgard and the battling fields of Valhalla where heroes of old were fighting against each other and alongside the mighty Aesirs.
As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I found myself riding over the vast planes. Then, suddenly, my horse left the ground and rose up, bringing me closer and closer to the ethereal clouds.
Is it my fate to join them already?
The Great Blue Sky protects me!

As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I saw a golden child fly before me, spreading his wings to welcome me in his embrace. Yet, my relief turned to horror as I realized his robes were covered in filth, and snakes were nesting among his curls.
As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, the fiery pits of perdition opened below me, letting a host of horrid jinns emerge to crawl over my flesh and froth at my face with their boiling spits.

As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I found myself in a dark and frozen cave. A sleek man was bound to a rock in its darkest recess, screaming and crying as two snakes were dropping poison in his eyes.

As I struggled in my bed, burned by the fever, I felt as if somebody was dragging me below the ground itself, to be crushed and suffocate under dirt and ashes. The grotesque spawns of Elrik then crawled beside me, crying and gnawing at my limbs.
I will not be trapped here forever!
Let me out! I cannot breathe!
Worrying for my precarious state, my [GetFromRelation] decided to send [From.GetHerHis] best physician to help me through the last months of this pregnancy.
I do not want a charlatan poisoning me!
Worrying for my precarious state, my [GetFromRelation] decided to offer [From.GetHerHis] own skills as physician to help me through the last months of this pregnancy.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is no expert in these matters!
[From.GetFirstName] has welcomed my physician to her bedchambers. Hopefully things will improve from today forward.
[From.GetFirstName] has welcomed my offer to help her with her labor. Hopefully I will be able to save her as well as our child.
[From.GetFirstName]'s stubbornness knows no bounds: as she lays feverish in her bed, still she refuses my help.
My [GetFromRelation] has sent a priest to my bedchambers to help and comfort me with his prayers. Hopefully his words will bring me some comfort during my labor.
My [GetFromRelation] has sent a shaman to my bedchambers to perform the proper rites and scare away any evil spirits that might be the cause for my current predicament.

The chalice slips from my fingers as my vision starts to go blurry. Usually it takes me longer to fall asleep, but tonight I really cannot keep my eyes open. Only when I start choking and spot my regent, peeking from the door with a leering look, I finally understand what has happened.
My plan worked and [From.GetTitledFirstName] choked on her own blood. I doubt anybody will suspect the cause for her untimely death to be anything but complications during her difficult pregnancy.

It takes me some time to react to the sudden pressure on my face: I had just finally managed to fall asleep after a long, painful night of cramps and nightmares. When I finally gained full conscience I find myself with only little air left. I struggle for a few seconds, trying to push the pillow away or grab my assassin's arms, but it is all in vain.
I waited until [From.GetTitledFirstName] fell asleep, snuck inside her room and pushed a pillow over her face. She barely put up any fight and, after a few minutes, she stopped struggling entirely.

I was about to drink my usual glass of wine to help me sleep, when a sudden retching forced me to hold it away for a moment. As I picked the glass once more, I noticed a strange smell coming from the wine. Just then, in my hesitation, I glimpsed at the reflection of my Regent [From.GetFirstName], ominously spying on me from my chamber's door with expectation.

My plan did not work: [From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow managed to discover my plot to kill her moments before I set the plan in motion. She steadily screamed for help and her personal guards came in to arrest me.

My plan did not work: [From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow managed to discover my plot to kill her moments before I set the plan in motion. She steadily screamed for help and her personal guards came in to kill me on the spot.

I was hoping that I could finally have a night with a peaceful sleep when the contents of my stomach decided to strongly disagree. I was just about to stand up when I heard a rustle near my bed: I slowly opened my eyes to see [From.GetFirstName] standing beside me, holding a pillow over my face.

[From.GetFirstName] promised that [From.GetSheHe] will visit me every day until my labor comes to term to offer me all [From.GetHerHis] support and [From.GetHerHis] prayer for a speedy recovery and a healthy childbirth.
I cannot stand up, I cannot lay down, even the gentler action sends shivers of pain through my body. If I do not do something about it, this pregnancy might be the end of me.
I will call for my Court Physician.
I need to hire a healer.
A shaman will exorcise the evil spirits plaguing me.
I can do this on my own, I just need to endure the pain.
I turn again and again under my bedsheets, panting desperately for air. My throat has become dry and hoarse, making it even harder to breathe.

The servants take away the last bucket filled with my vomit, but they are not fast enough to place the new one under my face. As I puke all over my bed, the stench provokes a new surge of nausea, making me shiver violently.

I tear off another bush of hair from my chest, trying to stop myself from scratching my arms and legs some more. Despite my best efforts to stop it, since a few days now dozens of rashes and spots of disgusting fur have started to dot my skin.

I spit out the glass of water, and order one of my servants to try it again. As the pregnancy progressed, everything has started to taste progressively worse, to the point that now even the blandest of foods and beverages feel like rusted copper in my mouth.

I feel the touch of the servants covering me yet another time as I stir under my bedsheets, sweating and shivering. I have long since lost the sense of time since this fever has started tormenting me. In fact, I can barely tell if I am awake or not most of the times.

As I spend more days wasting away in my bedroom, tormented by this pregnancy, I am finding it a lot harder to focus on anything. Things that I thought obvious now slip away from my mind, and I can hardly remember the names of half the people I seen moving back and forth from my rooms.

Once again, I wake in the dead of night, covered in cold sweat, with my heart beating wildly and struggling to breathe. My throat is already sore, but I still manage to scream my lungs out for help. When the guards finally come in, it takes them some time to stop me from screaming entirely and to assure me that there is nothing I should be worrying about.
But I saw something! I saw..?

One of my servants hangs a dish filled with yet another delicacy below my nose, but I quickly push it aside in disgust. I have barely the strength left to breathe, let alone to chew anything, and the growing cramps from your womb are making me feel nauseous at every turn, so much so that has become really hard for me to eat anything at all.

I stir and drool, twisting uncontrollably in my bed, despite my servants' best efforts to hold me still. I hear voices, both worried and threatening, echo around me, but everything is blurry and I have no idea what is happening to me, nor why I am unable to stop screaming and foaming at the mouth.

The servants come once more to change the bedsheets soaked in my blood as I scream and fruitlessly grasp for something to hold onto as I try to ease the pain that coursing through every fiber of my body.
I let out a whimper when the tooth rolls over my bedsheets, and then moan through my closed mouth as I feel the metallic taste of blood fill my throat and more teeth loosen from my weakened gums.

Yet another servant girls falls asleep in the middle of her story as I keep staring at her, teeming with envy. It has been almost a week since I last managed to sleep properly. My eyes are bloodshot and my ears scream in pain at even the softest whisper.
I just want to rest! Even just an hour!

Some of the servants seem to have been really started to worry about me since a few weeks, but in truth, I have not felt this good since quite some time, especially after since the talking fox brought some of his friends in my bedchamber to entertain me with their delightful escapades.
Oh, Lord Butterfly, you are such a braggart!
I startle as a pair of hands drags me back from the edge of the balcony. How did I even get here? The last thing I recall was trying to find the right position to sleep without squashing my womb...
Who..? Who are you? Where am I?
Things seem to be finally improving. I have resumed to sleep and eat regularly and the cramps have subsided. I may be able to see this labor to its end after all...

The servants are working tirelessly around me, changing bloodied bedsheets and brushing blood and sweat off of me, but there seems to be no end to it. The bleeding will not stop and I am too weak to endure any more pain and deprivation.
Given the ominous circumstances of my birth, I am clearly no ordinary child.
The pregnancy has been a hellish torture, but its fruit at least seems to have been a strong and healthy baby.
As if the terrible pregnancy was not enough, there seems to be something wrong with my child as well.
The pregnancy is over, but I have yet to leave my chambers, scourged by a steaming fever which is leaving me shivering and burning under my bedsheets.

As I turn restlessly in my bed, I find another curl of hair laying severed amongst the sheets. There is no doubt anymore that the strain my pregnancy put me under is resulting in an alarming loss of hair.
My bleeding has yet to stop. Even with the child out, I am still experiencing frequent accesses, despite the best efforts of my healers to stop the flow of blood.
The horrific trial is finally over: I have fully recovered from the ordeal that was this pregnancy without any lasting scar.
I am a little bit tired still...
I am finally starting to recover from the ordeal of this labor, but there is no doubt that this experience has considerably weakened me.
I might not survive another labor.

Although my body is recovering from the pregnancy, the pain I endured has deeply scarred my mind. Every little sound puts me on alert and it is harder and harder to find the resolve to go outside of my room, even to perform the simplest task.
I am so tired and- what was it again?

I hoped the pain would be over with the child out of me, but the internal bleeding I have suffered by giving birth to [From.GetHerHim] has made everything worse. As I lay in my blood-soaked bed, the servant desperately try to preserve what little spark of life I have left as I slowly slip into unconsciousness.
My wife [From.GetFirstName] went through an extremely painful and dangerous labor, but she seems to have miraculously recovered from it without any permanent damage.
My wife [From.GetFirstName] went through an extremely painful and dangerous labor and, while she managed to survive it, she has been left weakened and fragile after the ordeal.
Is the womb still in working condition though?

My wife [From.GetFirstName] went through an extremely painful and dangerous labor and, while her body managed to survive largely unscathed, her mind was unfortunately shattered by the hellish experience.
At least the body is fine.
My wife [From.GetFirstName] did not survive her pregnancy, dying of complications during her labor.
At least she is at peace now.

The nightmare is not over yet for my wife: her recovery was only passing, her conditions have quickly worsened after giving birth to her child. If she does not get better soon, she will surely perish.
Labor is not going well. My wife is bleeding profusely and seems to be suffering great pains. If the bleeding does not stop soon she will surely perish.

My treatment is finally showing some results: my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is sleeping and eating regularly again, and her cramps have subsidized. The pregnancy is not over yet, but she might be able to make it after all.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is sleeping and eating regularly again, and she claims to be feeling better. The pregnancy is not over yet, but she might be able to make it after all.
A little sip here, a small bottle there, it might not be what is best for the child, but drinking more has definitely help me cope with the stress of this pregnancy.
I am not drinking *that* much anyway...

I feel a lot less under pressure since I stopped caring about what I eat. In fact, I have started to routinely look forward to gorge myself on whatever the cooks have prepared every day. Besides, it is all to make a healthy son.
I will stop the moment the little thing is out.
The pregnancy seem to be getting on my nerves. Lately I have been more and more irate, sometimes lashing out at the smallest thing.

I do not know what day it is, or how long is left before this pregnancy is finally over. It feels as if I have always been in this bed. I cannot recall a single accomplishment of worth in my entire life. I feel hollow, worthless, and in constant pain.
[Root.GetTitledName] gains the trait '§YCrowned by the Pope§!'
[Root.GetTitledName] gains the trait '§YCrowned by a Prince-Bishop§!'
[Root.GetTitledName] gains the trait '§YCrowned by a Bishop§!'
This character has resigned in anger from [Root.GetHerHis] liege's Council and is not currently interested in being part of it.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! breaks the Iron Crown of Lombardy searching for the sacred nail.
This character has a very fragile health.
Attempt to smother [From.GetTitledFirstName] in her sleep.
Any other powerful Bishop in the realm will be §ROffended§! if you snub him for a minor prelate.

[concerned_relative.GetFirstName] grabbed the bottle out of my hand as I reached for more wine and hurled it against the wall. "You're killing yourself!", [concerned_relative.GetSheHe] shouted, tears in [concerned_relative.GetHerHis] eyes. "Stop drinking, for your family's sake."
I will try to change, for you.
You will try to stop drinking, but there is a chance you become unwell.
How dare you tell me what to do?
You make no attempt to stop drinking.

[concerned_relative.GetFirstName] passed away recently and though [concerned_relative.GetSheHe] is not around to make sure I don't drink anymore, maybe I should stop to respect [concerned_relative.GetHerHis] memory.
I will never touch another drop in their honor.
I need the drink to cope.
After hardly touching a drop of alcohol for weeks, [concerned_relative.GetFirstName] pointed out how much healthier I appear these days. "You look so much better".
I woke up today craving a drink more than anything. I feel absolutely terrible, but I won't give up. [concerned_relative.GetFirstName] would never forgive me.
This is meant to be good for me!
I tried to stop I really did, but I found a bottle that had been left out one night and drunk it all down. No one would have known if the servant hadn't told [concerned_relative.GetFirstName].
Due to my massive size I am constantly hitting my head on every door I go through, much to the amusement of anyone passing by.
It hurts but that just builds character.
This character has amassed a rather impressive treasury

I know you've been feeling down recently my court physician [physician.GetFirstName] said to me, "Try drinking this it could help, though there are some risks involved". The grey concontion smells vaguely of ash, not the most appealing prospect.
You drink the potion, despite the risk.
No way am I drinking that.
Independent Rulers can have exclaves (disconnected land) anywhere in the world.

Exclaves of Independent Rulers at peace will be removed on succession unless they are connected to the Capital area by at least one County, via a naval path or part of the character's De Jure territory.

Exclaves of Independent Rulers at peace will be removed on succession unless they are connected to the Capital area by at least one County, via a limited naval path or part of the character's De Jure territory.
Exclaves of Independent Rulers at peace will be removed on succession unless they are connected via a naval path or part of the character's De Jure territory.
Exclaves of Independent Rulers at peace will be removed on succession unless they are connected via a limited naval path or part of the character's De Jure.
Exclaves of Independent Rulers at peace will be removed on succession unless they are connected via a limited naval path.
§Y[text_target.GetBestName]§! has become independent from your realm as the land [text_target.GetSheHe] rules is too far from your capital.
As the County of §Y[text_target.Capital.GetName]§! was too far from your capital, an uppity peasant named §Y[text_target.GetBestName]§! was able to seize the land unopposed!
As the Barony of §Y[text_target_barony.GetName]§! was too far from your capital, an uppity peasant named §Y[text_target.GetBestName]§! was able to seize it unopposed!
As your lands were too far from the capital of §Y[Root.TopLiege.GetBestName]§!, you have lost contact with [Root.TopLiege.GetHerHim] and become independent.
This character was born a giant. While imposing, this character suffers from significant health problems and is likely to die young.
unable to carry their own massive frame
My giant body has given me troubles since I was born, and now I have grown to the point where I can barely walk without assistance. I am lucky to still have the strength to lift my own head...
No - from now on I will work out every day!
Why is [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] playing this cruel trick on me?

Since I was a mere child my body has been growing and growing, and with its growth I have constantly trained it. I now stand an imposing figure, not only tall like a mountain - but also with muscles like a [Root.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]!
How is the weather down there?
This giant character is suffering from significant health problems - though a thicker skin and a deeper, booming voice does come with advantages in combat.

As I get older and older my body will just not stop its incessant growth! My skin is getting thicker, my voice is becoming deeper, my limbs hurt and I have a headache that just will not go away. While my immense stature is more imposing than ever, I feel my spirit slowly leaving my body...
How long am I for this world?

\nThe §YShaman§! lends you one of his amulets to rub over the rashes.

This woman is fervently praying for a safe labor and for the good health of the child she is carrying.

This woman is being very careful not to overexert herself during her pregnancy, taking long pauses after every task and making sure to not jeopardize the health of the child she is carrying by taking unneeded risks.

This woman is taking the period of her pregnancy somewhat lightly, worrying more about finding ways to distract herself from the inconveniences of her current condition rather than prioritizing the health of her child.
Fearing for complications, this woman has decided to take a small break from her normal everyday activities, focusing on resting and ensuring the good health of the child she is carrying.
The pregnancy of this woman is happening under auspicious signs and is likely to end positively for both mother and child.
The pregnancy of this woman is not happening under auspicious signs and may be doomed to an unfortunate end.

This woman has vowed to the Holy Virgin that she will be chaste and avoid the temptations of the flesh. In exchange, she hopes that the Mother of Christ will protect her and her child during the dangerous moments of her labor.

This woman has vowed to the Holy Virgin that she will show humility and avoid dressing immodestly. In exchange, she hopes that the Mother of Christ will protect her and her child during the dangerous moments of her labor.

This woman has vowed to the Holy Virgin that she will care for the sick and the needy. In exchange, she hopes that the Mother of Christ will protect her and her child during the dangerous moments of her labor.

This woman has vowed to the Holy Virgin that she will show restraint in her habits and forsake all excesses. In exchange, she hopes that the Mother of Christ will protect her and her child during the dangerous moments of her labor.
This woman is traveling alone in the wilderness, exposing both herself and the child that she is carrying to bad weather, predators and bandits.
The comforting visit of a loved one has placated this woman, helping her putting her mind at ease in a delicate period of her pregnancy.
This is going to be my first child, and I feel completely lost. What if I am doing something wrong? What if something bad happens? What should I do while I wait for the day of my labor?
I need to pray for my child's good health.
I need to rest and avoid any hard task.
I need to find something to distract myself from this burden.
Ouch! As I place a hand over my belly and slowly sit down, a soft smile makes its way across my face. The baby is kicking again. I wonder if he will grow up to be a warrior...
I am sure I am carrying a fierce little soldier.
The child's rowdiness inside your belly may be a sign of his future character.

Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be. It would be nice to finally give birth to a boy, after all this time, and make sure my dynasty has a proper heir...

Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be. It would be nice to finally give birth to a girl, after all this time, and make sure my dynasty has a proper heir...
Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be: am I carrying a boy or a girl?
I sure hope it is a boy.
You will be truly delighted if the child you are carrying ends up being a §Yboy§!.
I sure hope it is a girl.
You will be truly delighted if the child you are carrying ends up being a §Ygirl§!.

What a bother! The number of good dresses that I am still able to wear is growing increasingly smaller as my pregnancy takes its course. Perhaps I should order new clothes to be tailored on my current measurements...
Maybe if I ate less I could still wear some of my old dresses...
I will have [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] buy me new clothes.
Ask your husband to buy you new clothes.
I really need to order new clothes.
No need to go through all this trouble for some dress.

My wife [From.GetFirstName] asked me to buy her some new clothes. Because of the pregnancy, she has outgrown most of her wardrobe and now she feels frustrated for not having anything nice to wear whenever she needs to make an appearance at court.
My dear, you do not need new clothes. You are already wonderful!
Why? So that she can throw them away a few months from now?
[From.GetFirstName] convinced me that I do not need any new fancy clothes when I am already positively glowing.
[From.GetFirstName] was happy to buy me new clothes. Being able to wear something that is both nice and comfortable has certainly improved my disposition.
Unbelievable! [From.GetFirstName] refused to buy me new clothes! Am I not already under enough stress as it is?
He never thinks about how I feel.
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: I will give birth under auspicious stars.
I must be sure to interpret all signs correctly.
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: my wife will give birth under auspicious stars.
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: the omens surrounding my pregnancy are terrible.
Maybe I am misinterpreting the signs...
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: the omens surrounding my wife's pregnancy are terrible.
I am sure I am misinterpreting the signs.
My poor [From.GetFirstName]! What am I going to do now!?!

I am uncertain about my future and I cannot stop worrying about the life of my unborn child. Perhaps I should make a vow to the Holy Virgin Mary, and pray her to ease my tribulations and help me give birth to a strong and healthy child.
Decide what kind of vow to the Virgin you wish to take.
I do not need to concern the Holy Virgin with my troubles.
The statue of the Holy Virgin stands over the chapel's alcove, the divine child resting on her arm. I kneel before it and look up at her somber smile.
I vow to be chaste and virtuous.
Be §YChaste§!, avoid the pleasures of the flesh, and the §YHoly Virgin§! may bless you with a strong and healthy child.
I vow to be humble and set aside all frivolous things.
Be §YHumble§!, avoid trinkets and fine clothing, and the §YHoly Virgin§! may bless you with a strong and healthy child.
I vow to be charitable and take care of the needy.
Be §YCharitable§!, give your wealth to the needy, and the §YHoly Virgin§! may bless you with a strong and healthy child.
I vow to be temperate and avoid all excesses.
Be §YTemperate§!, avoid all excesses, and the §YHoly Virgin§! may bless you with a strong and healthy child.

I cannot stop worrying about my unborn child. Perhaps I should make a personal offering to the old gods and placate their thirst for blood so that they in turn may spare the life of my unborn child as well as mine.
I will make an offering to the gods.
Expose yourself to the dangers of the wilderness to give the gods their due, and pray for the future health of your unborn child.
It would be too dangerous to go out alone in my condition.

As the smoke of my offering rises to the sky, I can almost hear the faint whispers of the gods traveling through the wind. I have called the attention of the immortals, it is now time to make my request.
Gods! Grant me a strong and healthy child!
If the gods will it, your child will be born §YStrong§!.
Gods! I only hope to have a beautiful and healthy child!
If the gods will it, your child will be born §YBeautiful§!.
Gods! I wish for my child to be bright and healthy!
If the gods will it, your child will be born §YSmart§!.
Ugh, the child is in the mood for something different today. What should I eat?
It does not matter 'what' as long as it is a LOT.
You do not seem to crave for anything out of the ordinary. It is probably for the best.
I wonder what a quail's foot tastes like...
Order your cooks to prepare a §Yquail's foot§! for dinner.
I am really feeling hungry for hare's head...
Order your cooks to prepare a §Yhare's head§! for dinner.
I want a trout's eye! NOW!
Order your cooks to spice your dinner with a §Ytrout's eye§!.
I will ask my husband about it.

The pregnancy has caused my wife to develop quite the unusual tastes. Most of what she asks for dinner nowadays ranges from mildly unsettling to positively revolting. Still, scholars do agree that a pregnant woman's cravings should always be accommodated...
I will make sure that she gets all she wants and more.
Make sure [From.GetFirstName] is always well fed and taken care of by the [Root.GetHouse]'s cooks.
Are you sure you do not mean a quail's *leg*, dear?
Order your cooks to prepare a §Yquail's foot§! for [From.GetFirstName]'s dinner.
Order your cooks to prepare a §Yhare's head§! for [From.GetFirstName]'s dinner.
Ugh! Why on Earth would you want a fish's eye?!
Order your cooks to prepare a §Ytrout's eye§! for [From.GetFirstName]'s dinner.
I have no money to spend on this nonsense.
Mother is not feeling well. The baby in her belly is unruly and she is gloomy all the time. Maybe I should go cheer her up?
My mother has not been feeling well lately. Going through a pregnancy is no easy task. Perhaps I should visit her and try to cheer her up a bit.
It occurred to me that my wife is feeling somewhat gloomy as of late. The burden of her unborn child is surely causing some humoral unbalance that is affecting her mood.

Whether it's guilt for her vile betrayal, or simply an humoral unbalance brought by her pregnancy, my wife has looked quite gloomy as of late. Perhaps she has finally started to understand the gravity of her crime against me...
Too late to feel sorry now.
I will buy her something nice.
§Y[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]§! will be comforted by your kind gesture.
I will go spend some time with her.
Your [GetFromRelation] will certainly be glad to have you visit her.
I am sure she will be fine.
I can only imagine how [From.GetFirstName] must feel – as if being unable to publicly declare our feelings for each other was not enough, she now must lie about the fruit of our love.
I can only imagine how [From.GetFirstName] must feel – as if being unable to publicly declare our feelings for each other was not enough, she now has to carry a child against her will.
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! will certainly be glad to receive a visit from her beloved.
It would be too dangerous right now.

I was very surprised to find my husband waiting for me in my rooms tonight, surrounded by an entire collection of assorted presents. Apparently, he just wants to give me his best wishes for the pregnancy.
Oh, dear, you really *do* love me!
Thank you, I really appreciate your gesture.

[From.GetFirstName] was extremely happy about the presents I bought for her. Right after seeing me, she jumped into my arms and gave me a passionate kiss. It looks like my kind gesture has really struck her.

[From.GetFirstName] decided to come visit me. [From.GetSheHeCap] said that [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my health, and so decided to spend the entire afternoon trying to cheer me up, asking questions about [From.GetHerHis] future brother, touching my belly, and trying to hear the baby inside. [From.GetSheHeCap] is such a sweet child.

[From.GetFirstName] decided to come visit me. [From.GetSheHeCap] worries about my health and wished to offer [From.GetHerHis] sympathies for my current condition. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that [From.GetSheHe] is quite eager to meet [From.GetHerHis] new baby brother or sister.

My beloved husband decided to pay me a visit tonight. We have not had a lot of time to be together since the pregnancy started showing, so it was a much welcome surprise for me to meet him in private again.
You are going to be a wonderful big [From.GetSisterBrother], [From.GetFirstName].
I was right to go to Mother. She was much happier after I talked to her. She even told me I will be a great [Root.GetSisterBrother] for the new child.
I was right to visit my [GetFromRelation]. She is feeling much better now. Hopefully what I did will help her get through this pregnancy more easily.
I hoe you are well, Mother.

When I discovered [From.GetFirstName] lurking in my chambers I barely managed to restrain myself from screaming and accidentally call the guards on [From.GetHerHim]. My lover told me that [From.GetSheHe] wished to comfort me in this stressful period of my life.
I am so glad you came!
The baby is finally out, and I can sleep easily once more.
My little [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a very talkative and cheerful [From.GetBoyGirl]. If only it weren't for that twisted foot of [From.GetHerHis]...
My little [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a silent [From.GetBoyGirl]. I worry that [From.GetSheHe] might be having a harder time learning to talk because of that harelip of [From.GetHersHis].
My little [From.GetFirstName] may not be the cutest of children, but [From.GetSheHe] certainly has a very curious and inquisitive mind behind [From.GetHerHis] plain face.
It looks like all that time kicking in my belly was not just for show: my sweet [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a fierce and healthy [From.GetBoyGirl].
The gods are truly generous! My sacrifice was not in vain: [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a healthy and strong [From.GetBoyGirl].
The gods are truly generous! My sacrifice was not in vain: [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a healthy and beautiful [From.GetBoyGirl].
The gods are truly generous! My sacrifice was not in vain: [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a healthy and bright [From.GetBoyGirl].
My prayers have been answered! The seed planted within me was indeed that of a wonderful [From.GetBoyGirl], just as I had hoped.
It looks as my prayers went unanswered. I was truly hoping to have something better than a [From.GetBoyGirl]...
I will just have to wait a little more.
The vow I made was not in vain. The Holy Virgin has blessed me with a healthy, strong [From.GetBoyGirl].
Perhaps I was not virtuous enough to gain the favor of the Holy Virgin: my vow did not help little [From.GetFirstName] to be born in good health.
The Holy Virgin has turned her gaze away from me. Why else would she let my poor innocent child die before [From.GetSheHe] could even be baptized?
I must still keep true to my vow.
I think it is time to turn my mind back to mundane concerns.
What have I done to offend you, Mother?
As soon as I broke my vow, my poor child's health started to drop. It is only because of my sins that [FromFrom.GetFirstName] now suffers.

I never knew how terrible it was for my mother to give birth to me until a few years ago, and only now I am starting to truly understand the deadly danger she put herself through in order to bring me into this world.
Talk to §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! and show your appreciation for her care and endurance.
I think she already knows how I feel.

Today [From.GetFirstName] decided to talk to me about [From.GetHerHis] birth. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that [From.GetSheHe] did not understand until very recently just how close I was to die when giving birth to [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCap] wished to openly show [From.GetHerHis] appreciation for my care and endurance, both during the labor and in the years following it.
It is very kind of you to say so.
I know just the person fit for the job...
Sounds fun, may I join as well?
Join the debauched feast planned by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to recognize your divine right to rule, but first, let us celebrate this joyous occasion with a lavish feast. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
Sounds fun, I am happy to join you.
Join the debauched feast that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is planning to consume at the Holy See.
I will pay, but I want no to have no part in this.
I cannot sully my name with this sacrilegious request.

I can scarcely believe my eyes: the private feast organized by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing more than a depraved orgy. All sorts of vile and shameless acts are taking place within the holy walls of [FromFrom.Capital.GetName], under the lecherous gaze of my guest.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made good use of my money: the holy walls of the Vatican have been filled to the brim with wine and whores. Soon after the start of the celebration for my upcoming coronation, the crowd of lechers and drunks invited to the party are already debasing themselves in the most abominable acts imaginable.
Climb over the fountain of wine and nectar in the middle of the garden.
There are so many pretty faces...
Jump on the pile of naked bodies.
I will take just another bit of swan...
Gorge on the lavish feast before your eyes.

[Root.GetPapalOrgyIntro] The [coronation_priest.GetTitle] brushes [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] tongue over my neck, whispering an incoherent prayer as [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] beckons me towards the orgy pit.
[Root.GetPapalOrgyIntro] The [coronation_priest.GetTitle] holds me by the shoulders, leering me with a drunken smile, and offers me a private communion.
I am ready for your blessing, [coronation_priest.GetFatherMother]!
Free yourself from §Y[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! hold and flee from the orgy.

This feast has given me much to think about the nature of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. I scarcely believe any heavenly reward could match the delights that [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] has introduced me to.

When my guards come to recover me in the morning, I barely remember anything of what has happened last night. I am fairly certain to remember, amongst other things, seeing [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crown me on top of a fountain of wine, while wearing nothing but [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] miter.

When my guards come to recover me in the morning, I barely remember anything of what has happened last night. I am fairly certain to remember, amongst other things, seeing [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crown me on top of a fountain of wine, while wearing nothing but [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] Papal tiara.
By the time [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crawls on the vomit-splattered ground to reach for me, I am barely conscious enough to recognize [From.GetHerHim].
When I finally spot [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] on the pile of bodies I am already exhausted and covered in sweat.
[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] finds me under the table, halfway asleep, holding my distended belly and containing an onset of nausea.
As I hold little [From.GetFirstName] in my arms, I cannot stop myself from thinking what will ever be the place for the Pope's [From.GetSonDaughter] in this world.
I am sure there are great things in store for [From.GetHerHim].
Too much eating and too little exercise have caught up with me. I have gained the §YFat§! trait.
I am finally back in shape. I have lost the §YFat§! trait.
Too little eating turned me into a shell of my former self. I have gained the §YMalnourished§! trait.
My bones no longer stick out my body. I have lost the §YMalnourished§! trait.
Start a war to depose an Excommunicated ruler. Upon victory, the §Y[From.GetTitle]§! will crown you.
Start a war to depose an Anti-pope. Upon victory, the §Y[From.GetTitle]§! will crown you.
Start a war in Italy on behalf of the Papal State. Upon victory, the §Y[From.GetTitle]§! will crown you.
Since I have forsaken the [From.GetName] faith, I no longer need the Church's approval in order to be deemed worthy of my crown.
The sudden conversion of [From.GetTitledFirstName] led to an abrupt stop of [From.GetHerHis] coronation ceremony.
This character is going through a difficult diet to try and get back in shape.

As I demand the servants to bring me another course of delicious red meat, my eyes fall down on my distended belly, placidly resting over my lap. My love of food is not having a positive effect on my health: if I do not do something about it, I may soon be in need of a wider throne.

The servant girls chuckle as I pass by them on my way to the dining room. I catch only a few of their words before they hastily go back to their tasks, but it is clear that the source of their odious giggling is my wide, puffy hips. All of these large feasts I subject myself to have really started to ruin my figure.

As I crumple and throw away another disappointing report, I yell at my servants, demanding for more food. As of late, eating is the only thing that has provided me with some relief from the stress of leadership. Unfortunately, as my flabby chest and double chin can attest, this solution might be having long term negative effects on my health.

As I crumple and throw away another disappointing report, I yell at my servants, demanding for more food. As of late, eating is the only thing that has provided me with some relief from the stress of leadership. Unfortunately, as my bloated potbelly and bulging hips can attest, this solution might be having long term negative effects on my health.

I stuff another chunk of meat down my throat, lying over the empty dining table. My stomach is starting to hurt, but I cannot stop myself: eating is the only thing that brings a sparkle of happiness to my otherwise terrible existence. Why should I care if I get a little overweight?

I cannot recall the last time I left my [Root.GetHouse] to take a walk or inspect my demesne. All of this slouching is turning me into a flabby pig, but so what? I am [Root.GetTitle], I was not meant for manual labor.

I cannot recall the last time I left my [Root.GetHouse] to take a walk or inspect my demesne. It has become quite difficult for me to keep my weight in check as of late, but so what? A lady of my stature should not demean herself with manual labor.

I incite one of my servants to keep stuffing me with more delicacies, reveling in the onset of titillating nausea coursing through my body from my distended belly. My pursuit of all of the most extreme earthly pleasures is proving to be quite taxing for my body, but is it not this a very small price to pay for absolute pleasure?

It is not easy being a mother. I cannot take any risks with myself when my children's future depends on my own health. The days I could freely go out for a ride, or play with the other ladies outside are over. Now I am committed to stay at home, tend to my family, and be a big happy woman.

It has been quite some time since I regularly went out hunting, or trained for combat. My body may no longer be what it used to, but spending more time at home with my beautiful wife gives me all the happiness I need in life.

Another day passes by, spent sitting on my nice soft couch and gorging upon the last delicacies prepared by my cooks. I have to taste everything to make sure that the food is good for my guests after all, but all these private parties I organize have really done a number on me...

I scrape the bottom of another dish and give a frustrated look at my increasingly bloated body. It has been so long since I laid with a [Root.GetManWomanPreference]. Since after I took my vow of celibacy, I have found that the only thing that dims my burning passion is gorging myself on sweets.

I scrape the bottom of another dish and give a frustrated look at my increasingly bloated body. It has been so long since I laid with a [Root.GetManWomanPreference]. Since after I was mutilated, I have found that the only thing that dims my burning passion is gorging myself on sweets.

I loosen up my belt and let out a satisfied sigh as my bloated belly fills my lap. Eating so much may not be what is best for my body, but it has certainly improved my attitude towards everyone at court.

As I look down on my next course, I notice that a few crumbs from my past meal are still scattered over my ample bosom, so I quickly brush them away with a giggle. Eating so much may not be what is best for my body, but it has certainly improved my mood.
I can scarcely believe it, but everybody agrees that my health has actually improved since I started to eat more. Perhaps my body simply needs more food to work properly.
I sit down, covered in sweat, looking at the flight of stairs spiraling down behind me. Tasks that were once easy have now become much more difficult to perform with my new flabby body.

Everybody at court agrees that I am the best host in the whole realm: my parties are the most grandiose, my food the most exquisite. All of my subjects have fallen in love with my charming and jovial attitude.

This morning one of my servants caught me just in time to stop me from falling senseless on the ground. At first I thought nothing of it, but, after a good night to think about the curious episode, I have come to the conclusion that perhaps all these years spent abstaining from all but the simplest foods are starting to take a toll on my health...

This morning I was found laying on the ground in my garden. I cannot recall exactly what happened, but the servants insist that I fainted while taking a walk. Perhaps all these years spent abstaining from all but the simplest foods are starting to take a toll on my health...

There are so many things to do, so many responsibilities filling my mind, that I barely have any time left to sleep or eat. All this stress is turning me into a hollow shell of my former self, but what else can I do? The life of a [Root.GetTitle] is not easy.

I give myself another look at the mirror, turning left and right, poking at my sides, looking for any trace of stretches or love-handles. A distinguished [Root.GetTitle] such as myself should strive to always look at [From.GetHerHis] best. My servant leaves my bedroom, carrying away another untouched dinner. It has been some time now since I had any appetite. My skin is slowly turning pale, growing tighter over my skeletal features, but I still find no point in taking any more food that is required for me to survive.

No exercise and entire days spent without even bothering to get out of bed, coupled with a prolonged lack of appetite, are turning me into a pale shadow of my former self. All my physicians agree that my appetite would return if only I stepped outside my rooms every once in a while, but I have yet to find any truly legitimate reason to do so.

It is well past midnight. All the other curators have left the library and all lights have been shut off... except for mine. My hands are shaky as they turn the pages of the old tome on my table, and large bags have appeared under my eyes, yet I cannot stop: what is a wasted body compared to an enriched mind?

Day after day, I have pursued the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forsaking all excesses and temptations. I may have grown pale and frail, yet I feel that my spirit grows stronger and purer at each new hour I spend in devout abstinence. I have long since come to relish in the cramps and growls coming daily from my stomach.

My eyes twitch from the bite of half-chewed roast to the line of waiters silently standing by the table: my suspects are immediately confirmed when I spot a young servant girl looking away from me. As the guards drag the traitorous woman away from my sight, I throw the dish at the other servants. Everybody is trying to poison me, how am I supposed to eat anything at all?

Today I had to dismiss the polite concerns of another one of my Vassals regarding my health: it seems that many in my courts, while being very appreciative of the diligence with which I resolve any task or issue, are starting to fear I may be working myself to death: I always go to bed with bags under my eyes, and the smallest whiff of wind is enough to push me to the ground.

I take a deep breath and move my eyes from the half-finished dish on my table to my distended, aching stomach. I am well beyond full and the mere smell of the food is making me nauseous, yet I still take another bite. If I don't find something else to fill all these lazy afternoons, I might soon grow too fat to stand...

As I unlace my dress to go to bed, I let out a sigh of relief as I feel my potbelly jump out, free of constraint. If I don't find something else to fill all these lazy afternoons, I might soon outgrow all my clothes...

My courtiers always try to encourage me to get out, take some sun, and enjoy life a bit more, but I simply cannot find anything that satisfies me. I am wasting by the week, yet all food seems stale to my palate... In the end, does it really matter if I am not in top physical shape anyway?

I pull the rim of my dress, looking at how large it has become in recent weeks. I am becoming really thin for whatever reason. My Courtiers are always inviting me to eat a bit more before I waste away entirely, yet I really cannot push myself to do it. All food seems entirely stale to my palate...

All these years spent stuffing my belly with sweets have turned me in a sturdy young man. I didn't mind being the biggest amongst my playmates when I was younger, but now I am starting to long for a slimmer, more agile body...

All these years spent stuffing my belly with sweets have turned me a stout, shapely woman. I have not received many complaints, yet, sometimes I wonder if I am not putting my health at risk by eating so much...

Since I was a child, all the other boys at court always mocked me for being weak and sickly all the time. How am I supposed to fight and be a good [Root.GetTitle] when the faintest blow can knock me out?

Since I was a child, all the other girls at court always mocked me for my frail body and weakly disposition. How am I supposed to fulfill my duties as a woman when a gust of wind is enough to push me down?
More military training is what I need!
Train harder to get in better shape.
Try to fight your natural inclination and stop being §YSturdy§!.
Try to fight your natural inclination and stop being §YFrail§!.
It wasn't easy, but thanks to my determination and countless hours spent running and training outside have helped me shed all the excess weight I was carrying around.
It wasn't easy, but my determination and countless hours spent running and training outside have helped me gain some weight and strength.

It wasn't easy, but thanks to my determination and countless hours spent running and training outside have turned me into an energetic, strong [Root.GetManWoman]. I cannot recall the last time I felt so well...

It wasn't easy, but all these days of self-imposed fasting have finally paid off: I have shed off all my excess weight and become a nimble [Root.GetManWoman]. I feel a bit weaker now, but that's a small price to pay.
I need to rest a bit...
It wasn't easy, but all these days of self-imposed fasting have finally paid off: I have shed off all my excess weight and become a nimble [Root.GetManWoman].
It wasn't easy, but I have finally managed to overcome my weakly disposition. No longer the nimble, sickly boy I was before, I have now become a big, strong man.
It wasn't easy, but I have finally managed to overcome my weakly disposition. No longer the nimble, sickly girl I was before, I have now become a big, beautiful woman.
Maybe I overdid it a bit...
It wasn't easy, but I have finally managed to overcome my weakly disposition. I tire less often, and I feel a lot stronger and a lot better than ever before.

My poor [From.GetFirstName] is so unresponsive, so slow to learn the most basic things... Sometimes I wonder if drinking so much while I was carrying [From.GetHerHim] has had a bad effect on [From.GetHerHis] health...

My poor [From.GetFirstName] is so unresponsive, so slow to learn the most basic things... Sometimes I wonder if smoking so much while I was carrying [From.GetHerHim] has had a bad effect on [From.GetHerHis] health...

Enough hashish! I cannot risk ruining my next child!
At least I stopped drinking since then...
At least I stopped smoking since then...
It is best not to think about it.
