At least she stopped poisoning herself since then.
She was always unable to control her urges...

I have successfully wrestled Papal lands from infidel control and delivered them back under the blessed authority of the Holy See. His Holiness was so relieved by my victory that he decided to entrust me with the safekeeping of one of the most sacred relics of the Church.

I have successfully wrestled Papal lands from infidel control and delivered them back under the blessed authority of the Holy See. His Holiness was so relieved by my victory that he has not only decided to keep his promise to crown me, but also has entrusted me with the safekeeping of one of the most sacred relics of the Church.
By not seeking legitimacy directly from the Holy See, your coronation will §ROffend§! the §YPope§!.
I may not be the fastest runner, but I am without a doubt growing into a healthy, stout young man.
I may not be the fastest runner, but I am without a doubt growing into a sturdy young woman.
Lack of exercise and frequent snacks are turning young [From.GetFirstName] into a stout young man.
The sedentary lifestyle and frequent snacks are turning young [From.GetFirstName] into a sturdy young woman.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should play more often with my friends and eat less if I want to be able to ride when I grow up.
Smoother skin, shining eyes, fuller curves... The changes brought by this pregnancy have made me even more beautiful than I already was.
Smoother skin, shining eyes, fuller curves... The changes brought by this pregnancy have made me more beautiful than I ever was in my entire life.
Smoother skin, shining eyes, fuller curves... I was never much of a looker, but the changes brought by this pregnancy have turned me into a much prettier woman than I thought possible.
It would be inappropriate to flaunt my looks while I am with child.

I could scarcely believe it possible, but the pregnancy has made my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] look even more beautiful than she already was. Whenever we are in the same room I can hardly take my eyes off her...

I could scarcely believe it, but the pregnancy has made my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] look more beautiful than she ever was. Whenever we are in the same room I can hardly take my eyes off her...
I could scarcely believe it possible, but the pregnancy has managed to make my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] look passable. I have found myself strangely attracted to her since a few weeks...
She is with child. I should not look at her this way.

It has been a long while since [From.GetFirstName] gave me so much attention. I am fairly sure [From.GetHerHis] sudden interest in me might be related to my recent changes, but I cannot deny I am flattered by it nonetheless.

It is good tradition to have some gossips around a pregnant woman in order to keep her calm and distracted from the tribulations of this delicate time in her life. As [From.GetFirstName]'s husband, it is my duty to provide her with the support she needs.
She needs familiar faces around her.
Ask some of your family members to spend time with §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! and keep her mind off any worries that might beseech her.
I will have some maids dispatched.
Pay a few servants to spend time with §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! and keep her mind off any worries that might beseech her.
She doesn't need old women filling her head with nonsense!

[From.GetFirstName] has enlisted the help of some of the women in our family to cheer me up and keep my mind off the pregnancy while I wait for the child to be born. If nothing else, it will be nice to have somebody to talk to when I am not dealing with my duties as [Root.GetTitle].

[From.GetFirstName] has enlisted the help of some of the women from our staff to cheer me up and keep my mind off the pregnancy while I wait for the child to be born. If nothing else, it will be nice to have somebody to talk to when I am not dealing with my duties as [Root.GetTitle].
This is exactly what I needed!

I cover my mouth and try to contain a giggle. Spotting a servant discreetly lighting up a candle, I realize that it's night already. This isn't the first time I spend my entire afternoon gossiping about friends and family with my guests without even realizing it, but I cannot deny that this new habit is really helping me getting through the pregnancy.
And I learn so much, just by listening!
I have never been so relaxed.

I thought I would enjoy the gossips provided by my husband, but this has been far from the case: these cackling harpies barely give me the chance to talk at all, and seem more interested in blathering on and on about their own petty concerns rather than making me feel better during this delicate time.
At least I am learning some pretty interesting secrets...
Enough! Get out! I need some quiet!

One of the maids helps me sit down, gently taking a feel of my belly and asking me if I am comfortable enough. Another servant encouragingly holds a spoonful of soup close to my mouth. All this pampering from my gossips is really spoiling me.
Don't worry, I can handle this!
What a blissful life I have!
Just soup? The baby is hungry...
My [GetFromRelation] has asked me to spend some time with [From.GetHerHis] wife, as is tradition, hoping it will put her mind at ease as the day of her labor draws near.
I have no time for this!

[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s [FromFromFrom.GetHouse] is filled with relatives and maids, all surrounding the pregnant woman, gossiping and tending to her needs. Overall, it's a very lively and cheerful pastime, even though more often than not the topics of conversation are beyond frivolous.
But that is the point, isn't it?
Keep §Y[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]§! entertained and spend as much time as possible chatting with her and the other women, honing your §YDiplomacy§!.
We should make sure [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] is well.
Keep §Y[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]§! pampered by spending your time caring for her needs and making sure that she misses nothing, thus honing your §YStewardship§!.
Why can't we talk about something more interesting?
Steer the conversation to your liking at the expenses of §Y[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]'s§! entertainment, in order to hone your §YIntrigue§!.

I cover my mouth and try to contain a giggle at [From.GetFirstName]'s joke. Spotting a servant discreetly lighting up a candle, I realize that it's night already. This isn't the first time I spend my entire afternoon gossiping about friends and family with my relatives without even realizing it, but I cannot deny that this new habit is really helping me getting through the pregnancy.

I thought I would enjoy the gossips provided by my husband, but this has been far from the case: [From.GetFirstName] and her host of cackling harpies barely give me the chance to talk at all, and seem more interested in blathering on and on about their own petty concerns rather than making me feel better during this delicate time.

[From.GetFirstName] helps me sit down, and stroking my belly gently [From.GetSheHe] asks "are you certain that you are comfortable enough?" Meanwhile, a servant next to her holds a spoonful of soup to my mouth, encouraging me to take another bite. All this pampering from my gossips is really spoiling me.

I ran my mouth dry to keep [From.GetFirstName] entertained, but, while she does look interested in what I have to say, she barely puts in a word of her own. While all this talking has earned me her gratitude, it was not as instructive for me as I hoped it would be...
[From.GetFirstName] is even more talkative than I am! I can barely keep up with her gossiping, yet speaking so much and about so many different subjects is helping me almost as much as it does her.

I must be really trustworthy for [From.GetFirstName] to open herself so much when talking to me... Or perhaps it is just the baby in her belly loosening her tongue. I can barely keep up with her gossiping, but speaking so much and about so many different subjects is helping me almost as much as it does her.

I have tried my best to divert the conversation of our gossiping group to more interesting matters, to learn more about my friends and relatives, but [From.GetFirstName] is much better at this than I am, unfortunately. I was entirely unable to gather any useful information with my prodding.

I might have spoiled [From.GetFirstName]'s peace of mind, but taking over the conversation is really helping me learn more about my family's secrets. The venomous gaze of my [GetFromRelation] is a small price to pay for my success.

I might have spoiled [From.GetFirstName]'s peace of mind, but taking over the conversation is really helping me learn more about my family's secrets. The poor sight of [From.GetFirstName] waiting silently with her head down is a small price to pay.

I really wish to help [From.GetFirstName] be as comfortable as possible during this delicate period of her life. Yet, despite looking genuinely thankful for my concern, my [GetFromRelation] still insists to do everything on her own, and be content with enjoying my company only.

Thanks to our concerted efforts, [From.GetFirstName] already looks more relaxed. We visit her almost every afternoon and make sure that her every need is tended to. Hopefully all this care will help her deliver a strong and healthy child.

Thanks to our concerted efforts, [From.GetFirstName] already looks more relaxed. We visit her almost every afternoon and make sure to satisfy every craving that the baby puts into her mind. Hopefully all this care will help her deliver a strong and healthy child.
I am flattered by her trust.
She was never that talkative to begin with.
She needs to eat for two after all...

Amongst all the forgettable gossiping I have been doing in the past days, the only meaningful conversations that I remember having are the ones with [From.GetFirstName]. I have really grown to like her...
I am sure she wants to be my friend too.
She is only being polite because of the baby.
I had never realized what a great woman [From.GetFirstName] is, but spending all these afternoons talking with her has really changed my mind.
She has become my dearest friend.
I cannot wait to take the communion again!
Prepare yourself to be reintroduced into the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName] Church§!.
I have no time for these superstitions!

I submit myself to the forgiving embrace of Our Lord, ready to partake of His sacred flesh after the long abstinence imposed by my pregnancy. Yet, I must be certain to be free of sin before I undergo the holy communion.
I will humble myself before God.
I will confess all my sins.
I need not do anything, for I am already pure.

As I took in the holy communion, a surge of ecstatic bliss filled my heart. In a fleeting moment, I saw a flight of angels from the stained glasses of the church spring to life, carrying my little [newborn_baby.GetFirstName] in their warm embrace.

I took the communion from the priest's hand and a warm sense of bliss filled my heart. I feel whole and at peace once again, ready to put the pain and unclean memories of my labor behind, and move forward with my life.

As I took the communion from the priest's hand, a sense of uneasiness filled my heart. Something is weighing on my soul, preventing me to find peace in the Lord's embrace, tormenting my mind with doubts and impure thoughts.

As I try to swallow the communion, a surge of nausea fills my body. I fall to the ground, and, taken by panic, I start coughing madly. It takes some time for me to retake my senses, and when I do, the priests surrounding me tell me that, while I was choking on the flesh of Christ, I called out the name of the real father of my newborn child.

As is tradition, my wife [From.GetFirstName] underwent her churching after recovering and cleansing herself from her recent pregnancy. When she returned home, she was teeming with excitement: while taking the holy communion she had a wondrous visions of angels leading our [newborn_baby.GetSonDaughter] [newborn_baby.GetFirstName] to glory. The child is surely destined to greatness!

As is tradition, my wife [From.GetFirstName] underwent her churching after recovering and cleansing herself from the recent pregnancy. She felt much better when she returned, clearly relieved to have fully rejoined the Church after her forced abstinence.

As is tradition, my wife [From.GetFirstName] underwent her churching after recovering and cleansing herself from the recent pregnancy. Unfortunately, her mood was not improved by taking the holy communion. Perhaps some old sin is still weighing on her soul...

As is tradition, my wife [From.GetFirstName] underwent her churching after recovering and cleansing herself from the recent pregnancy. Unfortunately, the unthinkable happened: [From.GetFirstName] nearly choked on the holy communion. The officiant priest swears that, in the subsequent delirium, the Lord compelled her to confess to her adultery.
I am sure I can calm her down.
She must deal with this problem on her own.
My husband [From.GetFirstName] must have realized that something went wrong during my churching. [From.GetSheHeCap] spent the entire evening trying to cheer me up and clear all my lingering doubts.
He can be so sweet sometimes...
Word of my unfortunate churching has reached my husband, yet, in a surprising show of kindness, [From.GetSheHe] has told me that, no matter what the truth is, [From.GetSheHe] is ready to forgive me.

Word of my unfortunate churching has reached my husband, and [From.GetSheHe] is livid. [From.GetFirstName] is convinced that [newborn_baby.GetFirstName] is not [From.GetHerHis] child and denounced me publicly as a vile adulteress.

Something truly unexpected happened. During her recent churching, [From.GetFirstName] was unable to take her communion. The power of Christ compelled her to admit her infidelity towards her husband. Even worse, as she was choking on the sacred flesh, she called for my name!
The vision I had at my churching all those years ago was correct. [From.GetFirstName] is growing into an amazing [From.GetBoyGirl].
The vision my wife had at her churching all those years ago was correct. [From.GetFirstName] is growing into an amazing [From.GetBoyGirl].
Rather than leaving the baby to her wet-nurses, this noblewoman is personally breastfeeding her child.
According to tradition, spending long periods of time resting in a dark room is the best way to prevent a mother from giving birth to a sickly child.
The pregnancy has made this woman a lot more talkative and distracted than usual.
This woman's cheerful and welcoming attitude has earned her the trust and friendship of many in her court.
Proper offering were made to [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] in order to protect this woman during the time of her pregnancy.
This woman was given the honor of portraying the [Root.Religion.GetName] goddess of fertility during the time of her pregnancy, as part of a long period of festivity in her honor.
The recent lavish celebrations of the harvest festival held by the ruling family of this province has left the local populace relieved and appeased.

This woman has recently taken on the role of the [Root.Religion.GetName] goddess of fertility in a harvest festival organized during her pregnancy. Even now, it seems a divine spark still lingers over her soul.

I have been feeling a lot more energetic than usual recently. Unfortunately, while I have had no problem wearing down the ears of everybody at court, I have been unable to focus all this newfound vitality on my duties. Yet, according to most scholars, an expecting mother should simply seclude herself in the dark for most of her pregnancy.

This pregnancy has made my wife [From.GetFirstName] much more talkative and cheerful than usual. She never misses the chance to chat with anybody within earshot. Unfortunately, most scholars agree that a pregnant woman should spend as much time as possible resting in a dark room to avoid giving birth to a sickly child.
I should follow tradition and rest.
I will let her have her fun.
I should stop wasting all this time.

Spending all these hours laying awake in the dark was almost unbearable at first, but, after I ordering a bard to sing me stories from outside the bedroom, the experience has completely changed. Now I am a lot more relaxed.
And I am learning a lot too...

At first, [From.GetFirstName] struggled to rest properly in her dark room, but, after I had the brilliant idea of having a bard tell her stories from outside, the experience has become a lot more bearable for her.
And she is learning a lot too.

I can barely keep track of time, spending hours upon hours in the dark while the sun shines outside, then being unable to sleep when night finally comes. I was just bored at first, but now I am starting to be scared as well. After my prolonged seclusion, my mind is starting to conjure shadows and whispers.

The dark rest may be good for my future child's health, but it is proving to be detrimental to my wife's mental stability. She is finding it harder to sleep at night, and has become twitchy and impossible to deal with.
I was dubious at first, but spending these long hours in quiet, dark meditation has helped me find peace. I am a lot less worried about my child than I was only a few weeks ago.
Resting in the dark has really helped my wife calm herself and clear her head. She looks in much better health and ready to deliver a strong child, just as I hoped.
All thanks to such a simple remedy...
I might not be able to accomplish much while wasting all this time chatting, but at least I think I am becoming better at talking in general...
My wife can really never stop chatting with courtiers and staff. If nothing else, this new habit of hers has made her much more comfortable and skilled at talking...
If only we could have some quiet every once in a while...

Being always so distracted might have prevented me from doing much work, but all this talking with my vassals and servants has had the unforeseen advantage of strengthening my relation with many of the people in my court.

Being always so distracted might have prevented my wife from taking a good rest, but all this talking with my vassals and servants has had the unforeseen advantage of strengthening her relation with many of the people in my court.
My husband [scoped_spouse.GetFirstName] has been so patient with me, carefully listening to all the rambling I have been doing in these last weeks... I have never felt so close to him before.
I think I am in love!

My wife has spent as much time with me as possible in the past week, constantly talking about the strangest subjects. I was worried at first, but now I am starting to enjoy our long conversations in a way I did not thought possible...
Am I falling in love with her?
It is but a passing fancy.

With my wife [From.GetFirstName] pregnant, I am starting to worry if I shouldn't organize something special for this year's harvest rite. Pleasing [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] could be instrumental to ensure the birth of a healthy child.
I will dedicate the entire festival to [From.GetFirstName]!
I will make a larger sacrifice to [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] in her name.
No need to waste money on old superstitions...

I was relieved to hear that [From.GetFirstName] decided to make a huge sacrifice during the seasonal festivity made to honor [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] this year, hoping it would help me deliver a strong child with little complications.
I am sure the goddess will protect me!

[From.GetFirstName] has really gone out of his way to ensure that both our child and I receive the favor of the gods. He has personally organized this year's harvest festival, and elected me to portray [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] herself during the celebration, hoping it will help me deliver a strong, healthy child.
I am humbled by this honor.

I place the baby back in the arms of the peasant woman and give her a warm smile as she thanks me for the blessing and gives space to the next petitioner. Acting on behalf of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] for this short time has truly made me understand how I could become a better [Root.GetTitle].
I must talk more often with my subjects.
As a mother is to her children, I must be to my subjects.
I must be a more exemplar worshiper.

Wearing the symbols of divinity, looking at all the hopeful and awestruck faces of the petitioners come to take [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]'s blessing through me... It would be an overwhelming responsibility, if I didn't feel the touch of the goddess upon me.
Could I be her own descendant?
No mother was ever as honored as I am.

This festival was no mere coincidence. I can feel the goddess' power coursing through my veins as I administer my blessings to the crowd of petitioners from [Root.Capital.GetName]. I must really be a descendant of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess].

Being carried around town, administering blessings on behalf of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess], is not as relaxing or satisfying as I hoped, but the people are loving this year's festival. They are always excited to see me smile at them and hold up their children.

Another noble guest bows his head at me, giving me his best wishes as my litter is moved through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName]. I never realized how many of my vassals are devout followers of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]. Having been elected to portray the goddess during the celebration has endeared me to many people.
I wonder how long it will last?
The Opinion of all devout §Yvassals§! of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has improved.

This year, [From.GetTitledFirstName] was elected to represent [From.GetFertilityGoddess] during the harvest festival. The [From.GetTitle] has really risen up to the task, sharing her motherly love with all her subjects and ensuring prosperity to the land and cattle through her blessings.
She is such a pious woman!

Portraying [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] during the harvest festival is a very enjoyable experience. An entire crowd of petitioners has come to my [Root.GetHouse] to get my blessing. They all shower me with words of gratitude, many of them have even brought sweets and cider to serve as small offerings to the goddess.
Refusing to eat would be blasphemous!
My throat does get hoarse with all these blessings...

As I administer another blessing, wearing [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]'s regalia, I wonder... If she is the goddess of life and fertility, how can she also be portrayed as virtuous? Is the drive that allows her to bring life to the world more important than her demeanor?
She inspired lust in all of us so we could create life.

My wife was thrilled to take the role of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] for the festival. She has been very popular with the public, maintaining a cheerful demeanor, always smiling at everybody. Hopefully this will both help her deliver a strong child as well as spread the goddess' blessing across my lands.

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is as gentle and caring when giving blessings to my subjects as [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] herself. Hopefully her actions will both help her deliver a strong child as well as spread the goddess' blessing across my lands.

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is a model of modesty and pious conduct. Hopefully her actions will both help her deliver a strong child as well as spread the goddess' blessing across my lands.

My wife has really taken on her role as [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] during the festival. She acts as imperious as any goddess would. Her behavior might be a bit out of place, but at least she is having fun and she is administering the rites properly.

My wife has really taken on her role as [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] during the festival. She acts as imperious as any goddess would. I just hope all of these special attentions will not inflate her ego to the point of making her inadvertently offend [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] herself...

My wife has really taken on her role as [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] during the festival. She acts as imperious as any goddess would. She is certainly having her fun administering blessings, but her demeanor is always collected and sophisticated. I am sure her actions will bring prestige to our family name, as well as the favor of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess].

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is the spitting image of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess], and all the peasants love her. If nothing else, this ceremony has certainly helped improve the spirit of [Root.Capital.GetName]'s population.

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is the spitting image of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess], and many of my vassals have taken a liking to her collected and pious conduct during the course of the ceremony. I have received quite a few compliments for choosing such a wise woman to be my wife.

My wife is certainly having her fun taking on the role of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]. Everybody seems to like her, and she has wasted no time hoarding all the food offerings made to the goddess for herself.

My wife is certainly having her fun taking on the role of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]. Everybody seems to like her, though I am worrying a bit about how frequently she is accepting cider from her petitioners.

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is a model of modesty and pious conduct. Hopefully her actions will both help her deliver a strong child as well as spread the goddess' blessing across my land.

My wife might have taken her role as goddess of fertility for the harvest festival a bit too literally. While she has undoubtedly enjoyed the celebration and earned the praise from peasants and nobles alike, I have received some disturbing rumors about her granting suspiciously private audiences to the prettiest petitioners in her crowd.
I am sure this will help her deliver the child.
The Opinion of all devout §Yvassals§! of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has improved.

[From.GetFirstName] grows more beautiful every day. I had my doubts at first, but now I cannot deny it any longer: the child is surely blessed. When I played [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] while I was carrying her, the goddess must have touched her and gifted her with her beauty and purity.

[From.GetFirstName] grows more beautiful every day. I had my doubts at first, but now I cannot deny it any longer: the child is surely blessed. When my wife played [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] during the festival, the goddess must have touched the child within her and gifted her with her beauty and purity.

It was hard to notice at first, but now there can be no doubts about it: my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is left-handed. It might be prudent to correct this behavior before it becomes permanent.

It was hard to notice at first, but now there can be no doubts about it: my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is left-handed. This sort of deviancy should not be allowed to take root, lest it encourages more ungodly behaviors later in [From.GetHerHis] life.

It wasn't hard to realize that my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is left-handed like me. I am wondering now whether it wouldn't be better if I corrected this behavior in the child before it becomes permanent...
The left hand is of the Devil!
Teach to §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! about what the scriptures say about [From.GetHerHis] unholy behavior.
Using your right hand is much more practical.
Teach to §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! about the tactical restrictions caused by being left-handed..
The child is fine like this.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is furious with me for some reason. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that I should always use my right hand whenever I do something, or [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] will be mad at me.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] told me that I should try to always use my right hand instead of the left. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that it will help me in many ways when I am older.
Alright, [GetFromRelation]. I will do like you say.
No! I like using the left hand!

[From.GetFirstName], that devious little brat, has fooled me into believing [From.GetSheHe] had stopped using [From.GetHerHis] right hand. Only this morning I overheard [From.GetHerHim] flaunting [From.GetHerHis] trickery with [From.GetHerHis] playmates!
A conscientious [From.GetBoyGirl], [From.GetFirstName] has decided to obey my order and force [From.GetHerselfHimself] to become right-handed.
The gall on [From.GetFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] outright refused to listen to me, and insists on using [From.GetHerHis] left hand for everything [From.GetSheHe] does!
You give birth prematurely before bleeding to §RDeath§!.

After much struggling, my wife bled out, giving birth to a fragile, sickly child. All the suffering that we went through has produced only a pale, skeletal creature that might not even survive the night.

My poor, sweet [From.GetFirstName] is dead. She resisted for as long as she could, but she was unable to survive her labor. She sacrificed herself so that a little, pale fiend could come out of her womb, so sickly and skeletal that the midwives are scared to hold it.
I will protect this child, for her sake.
The little monster stole her from me!
I have always lived a sheltered life because of my sickly disposition. Other children are scared of how I look, and many of the grown-ups are mad at me for killing my mother by being born.

Throughout my entire life, I have always been shadowed by death, yet I am still here. Despite my weak disposition and frail bones, I have endured past my childhood years. I cannot tell if this is a blessing or a curse...
I want to learn why I am like this.
Now the world will suffer as I did.

I have survived my mother's death and the scorn of everybody around me. Many thought that I would die of illness long before now, but they were all wrong. Time and again I have escaped death, to the point that I now find myself no longer fearing its cold embrace.
I have always been too weak for any sort of manual labor, but being able to focus on my mind since my earlier years has allowed me to learn a lot more than most kids do by my age.

It is time for the adults to start fear me as well as other kids have always done. Under my quiet and frail demeanor I have ironed I ruthless mind, and now I have finally the power and maturity to put it to use for my own benefit.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a frail and quiet kid. Yet, the more [From.GetSheHe] grows, the more brazen [From.GetHerHis] behavior becomes. It seems like being constantly on the brink of death due to [From.GetHerHis] weak disposition has stripped away all of [From.GetHerHis] natural fears...

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a frail and quiet kid. [From.GetHerHisCap] body is not meant for manual labor, and is voice barely goes beyond a whisper, but [From.GetHerHis] mind is a boiling cauldron of ideas, restlessly working to explore the darkest subjects.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a frail and quiet kid. Unfortunately, it has long become apparent to me that beyond [From.GetHerHis] silence and [From.GetHerHis] scrawny body lays a vicious and ruthless spirit.
This character was born under ominous circumstances. Always sickly during [Root.GetHerHis] childhood, [Root.GetSheHe] has long since grown out of most fears plaguing common men.
This character was born under ominous circumstances. Always sickly during [Root.GetHerHis] childhood, [Root.GetSheHe] has always eschewed manual labor in favor of literary study.
This character was born under ominous circumstances. Always excluded and avoided by everyone during [Root.GetHerHis] childhood, has grown into a heartless and conceited [Root.GetManWoman].
This character was baptized by the Pope himself with great pomp and circumstance, during a magnificent ceremony that will not soon be forgotten.
This character was baptized by the Ecumenical Patriarch himself of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church with great pomp and circumstance, during a magnificent ceremony that will not soon be forgotten.

This character was baptized by a notable member of the [Root.Religion.GetName] clergy, a clear show of [Root.GetHerHis] illustrious birth and of the good relationship between [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty and the Church.
This child was baptized in the blood of the innocent during a grotesque satanic ritual that bound [Root.GetHerHim] forever to the Prince of Darkness.

While I have yet to cleanse myself from impurities after labor, [From.GetFirstName] should be baptized as soon as possible. Given that [From.GetSheHe] is the heir of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I should make sure that the rite celebrating [From.GetHerHis] coming into this world is as grandiose as possible.

[From.GetFirstName] should be baptized as soon as possible so that [From.GetHerHis] place in Heaven can be assured. Given that [From.GetSheHe] is the heir of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I should make sure that the rite celebrating [From.GetHerHis] coming into this world is as grandiose as possible.
Only the Pope is fit to baptize [From.GetHerHim]!
Only the Patriarch is fit to baptize [From.GetHerHim]!
Have §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! baptism be officiated by the head of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
Our most distinguished clergyman will bless [From.GetHerHim].
Have §Y[From.GetFirstName]'s§! baptism be officiated by the most powerful representative of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church in your realm.
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! will be baptized no differently than any other child of yours.

Before I proceed with the initiation rites, I should select a godparent from the ranks of our Order to lead and protect [FromFrom.GetFirstName] as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] walks on the dark path I prepared for [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
After news spread about the grandiose ceremony I am preparing for [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s baptism, several of my subjects clamored to be chosen as the child's godparent.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] will initiate little [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] to the dark rites from the cradle. I was offered the honor to accompany the child on [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] dark path as [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] god[Root.GetFatherMother].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to organize a lavish ceremony to accompany [From.GetHerHis] [FromFromFrom.GetSonDaughter]'s baptism, and [From.GetSheHe] has decided to grant me the honor of being the child's god[Root.GetFatherMother].

The secret gathering of hooded cultists surrounds the child, chanting obscene verses. As another innocent victim is bled dry over [baptizing_child.GetHerHim], little [baptizing_child.GetFirstName] is baptized in blood and darkness, forever bound to Lucifer.

[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] washes the child three times over, reciting a prayer to protect [baptizing_child.GetHerHis] soul, surrounded by a host of cardinals. Then [scoped_pope.GetSheHe] raises little [baptizing_child.GetFirstName] up for all the crowd gathered in the great cathedral to see, exposing [baptizing_child.GetHerHim] to the cheers of [baptizing_child.GetHerHis] future subjects.

[scoped_bishop.GetTitledFirstName] washes the child three times over, reciting a prayer to protect [baptizing_child.GetHerHis] soul, then [scoped_bishop.GetSheHe] raises [baptizing_child.GetHerHim] up for all the crowd gathered in the church to see.
The secret gathering of hooded cultists surrounds me, chanting obscene verses. As another innocent victim is bled dry over me, I am baptized in blood and darkness, forever bound to Lucifer.

[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] washes me three times over, reciting a prayer to protect my soul, surrounded by a host of cardinals. Then [scoped_pope.GetSheHe] raises me up for all the crowd gathered in the great cathedral to see, exposing me to the cheers of all of my future subjects.
[scoped_bishop.GetTitledFirstName] washes me three times over, reciting a prayer to protect my soul, then [scoped_bishop.GetSheHe] raises me up for all the crowd gathered in the church to see.
The time has come to make [From.GetFirstName] aware of the illustrious future that the Light-bringer has in store for [From.GetHerHim]. I will introduce [From.GetHerHim] to the brotherhood tonight.

Tonight, [From.GetFirstName] woke me in the middle of my sleeping hours to drag me in a weird and secret place. [From.GetSheHeCap] introduced me to a group of strange, hooded people. They were all happy to see me, and told me that they expect great things from me in the future.
gains the trait '§YBaptized by the Pope§!'
gains the trait '§YBaptized by a Prince-Bishop§!'
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is granted an audience to your court.

The guards drag me to the feet of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s bed. While [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s appetite is yet to return, the leeching seems to have stabilized [From.GetHerHis] condition. Some malicious courtiers have spread the rumor that the constant bloodletting is sucking away all humanity from my patient, but I doubt any of it is true.

I look at the tumid leeches over my arm, feeling the bad blood being sucked out of me. My body may be weak, but I have never achieved such clarity of mind before. So many of the worries and attachments that bothered me in the past have now become inconsequential, and I am free to act however necessary to achieve my goals.
No longer I am a slave to passion.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a frail and gentle creature. Even the simplest actions are hard for her to perform. The more I see [From.GetHerHim], the more I am convinced that it is my duty as [From.GetHerHis] vassal to protect [From.GetHerHim] from harm.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was touched by my concern, but [From.GetSheHe] decided to politely decline my offer of assistance, assuring me that [From.GetSheHe] is perfectly capable of handling [From.GetHerselfHimself] and that it would be immodest for me to be so close to [From.GetHerHim].

My spouse [FromFrom.GetFirstName] spends too much time with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has developed an unhealthy relationship with that [From.GetManWoman], listening to [From.GetHerHis] every command. [From.GetSheHeCap] is clearly taking advantage of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] good nature.
Demand that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! distance herself from your husband.

The unthinkable has happened. The unthinkable has happened: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was so furious of the bard's song that [From.GetSheHe] had the man roasted on the spot as punishment. I never imagined my liege could be such a cruel and ruthless [From.GetManWoman]...

As the smoking carcass of the bard is brought back to the main hall, nobody is laughing anymore. Perhaps now my subjects will understand the proper respect that is due to their [Root.GetTitle].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a cursed maniac, [From.GetHerHis] skull a hollow cove for demons. I should just denounce [From.GetHerHim] publicly and wait for the justly-earned praise of my peers.

It is well enough time that somebody exposed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s supposed chastity for what it really is - a poor attempt to hide the [From.GetManWoman]'s barren womb.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is always doing something, always working... Clearly [From.GetSheHe] doesn't trust [From.GetHerHis] own friends and family to handle even the simplest of tasks. I should make sure that everybody knows of [From.GetHerHis] disconcerting pettiness.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] slothful, apathetic attitude. I am sure I can exploit [From.GetHerHis] distaste for all laborious tasks to my advantage in some way.
Send a falsified report on §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! demesne to force a new survey of [From.GetHerHis] borders.

I have just received the most disturbing news. It has been brought to my attention that a recent survey of my lands has determined my demesne to be much smaller than I believed. All my Council members agree that I should verify the soundness of this report immediately if I do not wish to see the prestige of my realm be greatly diminished.
Who cares? It is just a piece of scroll.
This is going to be so much work!
Issue another survey of your lands.

It appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not care enough about the legitimacy of [From.GetHerHis] borders in order to fall from my falsified report. [From.GetHerHisCap] inconstant nature must be the cause of this blunder.
I will have to try something different.
All of this work was for nothing! As it turns out, the survey report was a false document planted by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to undermine my authority as [Root.GetTitle].
Just as I hoped, [From.GetTitledFirstName] spent a lot of time and resources only to discover that the report I provided [From.GetHerHim] with was false.
At least [From.GetSheHe] did something for a change...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] short temper. I am sure I can exploit [From.GetHerHis] lack of patience to my advantage in some way.
Is there not a parade in [From.GetHerHis] honor soon?

The musky odor of mud fills my lungs as I stare in disbelief at my soiled clothes. The two urchins run away laughing, while my parade suddenly halts in the middle of the streets and my servants start surrounding me, asking me if I am hurt and hastily starting to clean me.
Forgive the slight against you and continue with your parade.
I will whip those dogs myself!
Ride in pursuit of the two boys.

My attempt to have [From.GetTitledFirstName] humiliate [From.GetHerselfHimself] did not succeed. According to reports, [From.GetSheHe] forgave the people I hired to disrupt [From.GetHerHis] parade without even trying to pursue them after their infraction.

I immediately run after the two little criminals, but they have already disappeared. In my rage, I spend hours wandering around [Root.Capital.GetName] in my pitiful state, yelling for the two scoundrels to come out. When I finally return to my [Root.GetHouse], a letter from [FromFrom.GetFirstName] awaits me, implying the [FromFrom.GetTitle]'s involvement in the entire affair.

Just as I hoped, [From.GetTitledFirstName] made a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself], running around [From.Capital.GetName] smeared in mud to try and apprehend the people I hired to harass [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] spiteful and opportunist nature. I am sure I can exploit [From.GetHerHis] insatiable envy to my advantage in some way.
Provide a fake claim to one of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! neighboring lands, hoping [From.GetSheHe] will humiliate [From.GetHerselfHimself] by trying to press it.

I have just received a wonderful gift from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetHerHisCap] Chancellor has recently discovered an old document legitimizing my claim on one of my neighbors' lands. [From.GetFirstName] has decided to offer it to me in a show of friendship.
Thank you, but I do not need it.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not interested in the false claim I provided [From.GetHerHim]. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] merely lacks the ambition to find my offer palatable.

Unbelievable! I was just about to press my new claim, when several clear inconsistencies were discovered in [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s document. The claim [From.GetSheHe] gave me is fabricated, and, more importantly, very poorly fabricated! Hardly anybody will consider it valid if I decide to press it.
This was all a waste of time!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was just about to start a war over my false claim before [From.GetSheHe] finally realized how useless the document I provided [From.GetHerHim] with was. Now [From.GetSheHe] is boiling in [From.GetHerHis] own bile, all [From.GetHerHis] dreams of a quick conquest squashed.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] pride. I am sure I can exploit [From.GetHerHis] vain obsession with [From.GetHerselfHimself] to my advantage in some way.
Have a very special painting of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! delivered to [From.GetHerHim] as a gift.

An envoy from [From.Capital.GetName] has just delivered sumptuous portrait depicting me, as a gift from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The proportions and features are a bit off, but the quality of the piece is undeniable.
Accept §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! gift, but arrange for it to be placed somewhere remote where nobody will ever see it.
It deserves to remain in plain sight.
Arrange for the portrait to be placed in the main hall of your [Root.GetHouse].

Unfortunately, although [From.GetTitledFirstName] accepted my gift, [From.GetHerHis] shy disposition prevented [From.GetHerHim] from putting the portrait on plain sight, where its true meaning would have been apparent.
I will have to try something different...

I cannot believe the pettiness of some people. The painting [FromFrom.GetFirstName] gave me lasted only a few days before starting to melt, twisting my features in a grotesque mockery of reality and filling the main hall with a foul stench. What is worse, many dignitaries saw it before I was informed of the problem and hastily ordered the rotting artwork to be removed.

I have just received some hilarious news from [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s court. It appears the painting I gave [From.GetHerHim] has started to rot, both twisting the features of its subject into a ridiculous, grotesque mockery and filling [From.GetFirstName]'s palace with an unbearable stench.
What an unexpected turn of events!
The reformed Bön faith has fully incorporated some of its Buddhists elements while codifying the shamanic and animistic deities followed by its worshipers in a series of detailed scriptures.

The Hellenistic religion is polytheistic, with a pantheon of twelve major gods including [GetZeusJupiterName], [GetAresMarsName], [GetHermesMercuryName], [GetAphroditeVenusName], [GetAthenaMinervaName] and [GetHestiaVestaName]. Restored after having been almost but wiped out by Christianity, it has been fully adapted by its new practitioners to contend against its more aggressive, younger competitors.

We are presented with the unique opportunity to reshape our faith forever. We must be careful on the path we set out on, as once the new dogma of our religion has been established it will be impossible to change. Many learned priests and scholars have traveled to my court in order to discuss all sorts of theological matters in an attempt to codify a complete and solid reinterpretation of our old oral traditions. \nYet, being the one who made this reformation possible in the first place, it would only be fair if I gave my own opinion on the Nature, Doctrine, and Leadership of our new religion.
§GRulers are less likely to start wars, plots, and factions§!
§GRulers do NOT receive Opinion penalties for raised vassal levies§!
§GArmies are stronger when defending their home territories§!
§RRulers waging war against members of their own faith lose Piety§!
§RThis religion does not allow marriage with infidels§!
§GThis religion can intermarry with its neighboring faiths§!
§GClose-kin marriage amongst nobility is considered a divine union§!
§GRulers can choose to gain Sympathy with another faith by decision§!
§GThe reformer will become the new Head of this religion§!
§GA priest is put in charge of this religion§!
§GAutocephalous priests are put in charge of each realm's religious matters§!
§YThis religion will never have a religious head§!
§GFollowers of this religion gain +2 base Martial§!
§GFollowers of this religion gain +2 base Diplomacy§!
§GFollowers of this religion gain +2 base Stewardship§!
§GFollowers of this religion gain +2 base Intrigue§!
§GFollowers of this religion gain +2 base Learning§!
We must endeavor to lead a life of peaceful conduct and harmonious discourse with our opponents, rather than fall to the sins of violence and mad pursuit of power.
Our only way forward is paved with the skulls of our enemies! Only by showing their bravery in battle the faithful can hope to be rewarded in the afterlife!
We might never spread the worship of our gods to all the corners of the worlds, but we are committed to make our ancestral lands impregnable to missionaries and infidels.
One thing that the heathen missionaries have shown us is that it is not by the strength of weapons that the gods are preserved, but through the power of words.
There is only One Word, only one correct interpretation of our scriptures, only one way to please the gods.
We must acknowledge that every people has its own protectors and that more often than not we all worship the same gods, just with different names and in different ways.
The gods have chosen certain bloodlines over others. Such dynasties must be maintained pure if we wish to keep the favor of our creators.
It is time that we acknowledge our concubines as full spouses. The children we have with them are just as legitimate as any other.
The gods do not care about the order in which a child is born, they care about the skills and virtues that he shows as a man.
It is blasphemous to doubt the legitimacy of a ruler who has come to power under the favor of the gods. He should be shown immediate loyalty by his subjects.
We will allow infidels to live in our lands, but only as long as they pay regularly for their blasphemy by giving us offerings of wealth and resources.
The most devout amongst us should be allowed to abandon their earthly affairs and spend their lives in seclusion and worship.
The wisest amongst us should be allowed to study other faiths and learn more about the people around us.
Only through the proper use of divination can we discern the will of the gods and lead our armies to victory.
It is only through the strong and resolute leadership of men that we will be able to fulfill the great destiny that the gods have in store for us.
Both gods and goddesses rule the heavens, and so it is only just to allow both men and women to rule the Earth.
It is only through the strong and wise leadership of women that we will be able to fulfill the great destiny that the gods have in store for us.
Our heavenly masters are cruel and ever thirsty. If we do not placate their hunger for flesh, blood, and souls they will turn their wrath upon us.
The gods praise bravery and a free spirit. They encourage even the smallest man to reach for the stars.
The gods have given us knowledge of the tides and of ship-craft so that we could use it to spread their word to all the corners of the world.
The gods will only reward the bravest and most fierce amongst the faithful. To die in battle is the greatest of honors a man can aspire to.
We shall not wane into obscurity without a fight! The end times are near. Our people must prove their worth if they are ever to enter Valhalla!
The Endless Blue Sky beckons our armies to ride forward and spread to the four corners of the world, untamed and unstoppable!
We must stand strong to survive the assaults of the new religions. Only the best among us will survive to preserve the memory of the gods.
All the children of Perun will come together, sharing a new, harmonious understanding of the gods, so that we can live in peace and prosperity with our neighbors.
For too long our tribes have squabbled against each other while our real enemies besieged us from outside. We must stand united or disappear forever!
In order for any spirit to get his due we must make sure that our priestly caste is qualified in all the spells and rituals scattered throughout our old traditions.
We must acknowledge the undeniable authority of the sun and its favored bloodlines in order to ensure the prosperity of our people.
A balance of old and new traditions is the imperative requirement for an enlightened future, blessed by the favor of the gods.
Our warriors must be ruthless and our armies unyielding if we wish to satiate the gods with the bountiful cattle roaming this New World.
We must remember that the gods are hardly ever interested in mortal affairs and that we should endeavor to maintain a detached attitude towards faith.
Secular and spiritual powers are inextricably bound. It is pointless to divide them between two offices.
A High Priest should be given complete control over all spiritual matters, so that the gods may be pleased with the proper rituals.
Every realm shall have its High Priest, working alongside its ruler and fulfilling the needs of the gods and their followers.
Every priest will be given the chance to give his proper interpretation of the new holy text, free from any centralized authority.

The reformed Norse Pagan faith has a Holy Book written in runes with chapters on Creation, the gods, Ragnarok, and secret spells - 'galdrs'. The church has a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy no longer relying on shamans and fortunetellers to lead the faithful.

Tengrism is the religion of the steppe peoples of Eurasia, especially Turkish and Mongol nomads. The chief god is Tengri, the creator god who rules the skies. The reformed Tengri faith has transferred its oral legends into a collection of scrolls written in the Orkhon runic script, acquiring a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy.

Baltic paganism is polytheistic, with a pantheon of gods led by Dievs, god of the sky. Other main gods include Perkunas, god of thunder and lightning, very similar to the Germanic god Thor and the Slavic Perun. The reformed Baltic faith has a Holy Book with a creation myth, chapters on the gods and a book of prophesies. The church also has a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy.

Finnic paganism is shamanistic and animist, revering a multitude of gods, including Ukko/Perkele, Kuu and, in the east, Mastor-Ava, goddess of the Earth. The reformed Finnish faith has a Holy Book with a creation myth, chapters on the gods and a book of spells and mysteries.

The Aztec religion features a creation myth centered on sacrifice - even gods were sacrificed to keep the sun moving. This is reflected in the many festivals and rituals of the religion, which feature human sacrifice on a massive scale. The reformed Aztec religion has a proper Holy Book, a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy led by a flock of dedicated hierophants.

The Slavic religion is polytheistic, the chief god being Perun, god of thunder and lightning, quite similar to the Germanic god Thor. Other important deities include Veles, god of the underworld, Svarog, Jarilo and Svantevit. The reformed Slavic faith has a Holy Book with a creation myth, chapters on the gods and a book of prophesies.
The reformed African religion is a fusion of many popular beliefs, with a single Holy Book including a creation myth, chapters on the spirits, totem animal fables and gods.

Zun, the Sun-God and Giver of Justice, embodies wisdom, power, fire and the light that drives away the night. The reformed Zun faith has a Holy Book detailing things such as the creation myths and outlining church doctrine, as well as a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy.
The gods demand blood! We must satiate their thirst or risk facing their wrath!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was sacrificed to the cruel [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] gods! Accounts describe of how [From.GetSheHe] was forcefully dragged screaming on top of a temple and torn apart by mad priests.

The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the top of the temple, they place [From.GetHerHim] on an altar, and slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. They then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.
Let this sacrifice appease you, almighty creators!
The [Root.Religion.GetName] religion does not forbid its practitioners to study other beliefs in their pursuit for knowledge.
I wish to know more about Christianity.
The words of the Prophet intrigue me...
I wonder about the god of Abraham...
The Eastern religions are more to my liking.
The [Root.Religion.GetName] religion does not forbid its practitioners to study other beliefs in their pursuit for knowledge.
The duality of Zoroastrianism is intriguing.
I wish to emulate the discipline of Indians.
The Abrahamic religions interest me more.

$ELECTOR|Y$ is NOT supporting your candidate in the election, and is instead voting for $CANDIDATE|Y$.

Select a ruler belonging to an organized religion, and petition him to sponsor the Mass Conversion of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. \nEmbracing one of the more civilized religions could help you in your efforts to centralize your realm and set aside your tribal ways.\n[Root.GetMassBaptismTribalAuthorityHint]

All $RELIGION$ kingdoms or empires also have their own autonomous Patriarchs. The Court Chaplain of such a kingdom or empire is also considered the Patriarch of that realm. He will always do what his liege asks of him, but only the $REL_HEAD_TITLE$ can grant the Invasion Casus Belli. Each autocephalous Patriarch controls Excommunication within their respective realm.

[From.GetSheHeCap] is so cute and fluffy, what would life even be like if I were to lose [From.GetHerHim]? I am not sure I could go on... I must do something about this and protect my beloved cat [From.GetBestName].
[From.GetSheHeCap] must lap up some of my immortal blood for protection.
Only I shall have this great power!

The Wolf Warriors, or Úlfhéðnar as they call themselves, consist of ferocious men and women fighting for honor and recognition on the battlefield, as well as an ideal of bravery and companionship. In honor of Odin the Allfather, they wear their pelts into battle, and favor a spear in personal combat.

The Eagle Warriors of the steppe carry on the ancient tradition of training and hunting with birds, the most prestigious type being the golden eagle. The hunters, also known as 'berkutchi', are said to only need three things in life: a fast horse, a faithful dog, and an eagle.

Worshiped by hunters and warriors alike, Medeina is the huntress goddess of the forest. Her followers wear wolf-pelts in her image and hold hares holy, as Medeina is known to send the animal out to lure away the unworthy, out of her domain. The warriors of Medeina have one simple calling: to protect the forest, their home and true legacy of their ancestors.

The Suomenusko Followers of Otso do not even utter the name of the sacred animal, but draw strength from worshiping the bear, calling it 'the King of the Forest'. After hunting one, a complex ritual must take place, wherein the bear is convinced that it was not slain, but died due to fault of its own, so that its hunters may don themselves in its fur.

The valiant Champions of Perun, the Slavic god of thunder, strive to uphold an ideal of honor and guard their fellow men and women from wrongdoing. Their families are known to hang protective symbols of arrows and bolts by their houses, to grant their heroes luck on the battlefield and shield them from storms.

The Olympian Champions train hard and maintain an expert physique, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport – participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.

My grip is cramping around my [Root.GetDuelWeapon], as [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] braces for another attack. The following moments are a blur, blood suddenly everywhere, somebody shouting. "Did [Root.GetTitledFirstName] just [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]?!"

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] swings [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly]. The fight has gone on forever, and my muscles are beginning to ache. With the remainder of my strength I [Root.GetKillingBlow].
My opponent seems to be getting tired, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves becoming slower. Strengthened by the cheers of the crowd, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].
I... yes, that was on purpose!
I am sorry it had to end this way.
Your death was the only logical outcome, [other_combatant.GetSisterBrother].

Just as I begin to think that I am wearing my opponent down, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] lunges at me, with more force than so far displayed. Sweat drips down my forehead, when suddenly, I hear someone shouting, describing the scene incredulously. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] has managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe].

The fight has been going on for some time and it's with some effort I'm still swinging my [Root.GetDuelWeapon], [Root.GetClumsilyElegantly]. [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] looks tired too, but suddenly [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [Root.GetKillingBlowOnMe].

Each blow of my weapon is becoming heavier, and I'm struggling to focus on my opponent, as the crowd cheers [other_combatant.GetHerHim] on. My vision is blurry when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [other_combatant.GetKillingBlowOnMe].

sink my [GetDuelWeapon] into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] chest! The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] groans, and it takes a while before my own heart stops pounding. Then [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is still

throw my [GetDuelWeapon], into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] stomach. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] falls, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] guts spilling out on the ground. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] does not rise again

thrust my [GetDuelWeapon] hard into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] chest. The surprise is clear on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face, as blood fills [other_combatant.GetHerHis] mouth. I must have hit something important

land a perfect blow to [other_combatant.GetHerHis] neck. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] drops [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon and clutches desperately at [other_combatant.GetHerHis] throat, but the wound is already claiming [other_combatant.GetHerHis] life

is sinking [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] into my chest. I groan, meeting the eyes of the [other_combatant.GetManWoman], who looks shocked at [other_combatant.GetHerHis] own success
throws [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] – it hits my stomach and I fall to the ground, trying to keep my own guts from spilling out. There is so much... Pain

thrusts [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] hard into my chest. I stop, my breath catching in my throat, followed by the taste of blood. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] must have... Hit something important
lunges at me. Then I feel the warmth of blood surrounding my neck. My.. My throat has been cut open

I was holding my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] in front of me, locking eyes with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. The crowd began to whisper, as my opponent fidgeted awkwardly with [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face growing paler. I thought [other_combatant.GetSheHe] was about to faint, when the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] started running, away from me.
Still shivering, I cannot explain what happened. When it all came down to it, my legs gave way and I simply... I fled the duel! I am such a coward..! Why did I ever agree to this in the first place?
I should have stayed and fought!
I just wanted to prove that I am not afraid.
It was too much, how they were just... All looking at me.
[Root.GetFirstName], what is the MATTER with you?!
Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]. However, the crowd is chanting MY name!

Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]. Dizzy, I can just about make out the sounds of the crowd: it is not my name they are chanting.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] has already managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe], when something twisted passes over [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I barely register the glint of something metal in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] hand, before my throat is cut open, blood spraying on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I try to ask why, but no words come out.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] has already managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe], when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] lets out an angry grunt. Before I know it, I am begging for mercy, but [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is beyond reasoning. The last thing I hear is the shocked gasp of the crowd, and a soft thud, which can only be my head hitting the ground.

I know that there wasn't really anything at stake during the mock duel that took place between us, yet I find myself filling with rage whenever anyone mentions [other_combatant.GetTitledName], and it's making servants flinch. But does it matter? I am the [Root.GetTitle]! Am I not allowed to loathe that [other_combatant.GetManWoman]?!

I have recently found myself talking with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] for hours, about [other_combatant.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]. I have to laugh, however, when the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] attempts to compliment my fighting technique – we both know that I didn't do very well, last time we sparred.

Since the duel, I have been practicing a bit with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] did best me, and I was quick to ask for any pointers. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] seemed surprised at first, but today I am proud to tell [other_combatant.GetHerHim] that [other_combatant.GetSheHe]'s a good teacher. "And friend!" I add.

I have recently found myself becoming friendly with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] chuckles heartily, however, when I attempt to compliment the [From.GetManWoman] on [From.GetHerHis] fighting technique. "My [Root.GetLordLady], we both know that I did not do very well, last time we sparred", [From.GetSheHe] says.

After the duel, [From.GetTitledName] asked me for advice on fighting. A little taken aback, I happily offered to train with [From.GetHerHim], on occasion. Today, [From.GetSheHe] thanks me, for being a good teacher. "And friend," [From.GetSheHe] adds, dunking me on the back, before [From.GetSheHe] cocks [From.GetHerHis] head, in direction of the sparring grounds.
We are married! If anything was to spark between us, shouldn't it already have happened?
[This.GetSheHeCap] may be unmarried and alone, but what if that is what [This.GetSheHe] prefers?
What if [This.GetSheHe] finds me too young, my feelings fickle and easy to disregard?
Would I not simply seem an old fool, yearning more youthful feelings?
What could a lowly [Root.GetTitle] have to offer the [This.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [This.GetTitledName]?
We already parted ways once, why would [This.GetSheHe] want me now?
We probably have NOTHING in common.
What if this ruins our friendship?
we are married, and it might be folly to dream of more than a practical arrangement
I am used to being alone
[This.GetSheHe] might find me young and inexperienced
[This.GetSheHe] might see me as too old
a lowly [Root.GetTitle] might not have a lot to offer a [This.GetTitle]
we might have nothing in common
it could put our friendship at risk

Ever since we sparred together, I have been having daydreams, about [other_combatant.GetFirstName]. I keep seeing [other_combatant.GetHerHim] in my mind's eye, and my heart flutters. I can't tell [other_combatant.GetHerHim] though... [other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]

It's dark when I jolt awake, my heart pounding in my chest. Wiping the sweat from my brow, the memory of my dream lingers. I was dueling [other_combatant.GetFirstName] again, but instead of delivering the winning blow, this time, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] put [other_combatant.GetHerHis] arm around my waist, and pulled me in for a kiss. When will these dreams end?

I thought I saw [other_combatant.GetFirstName] today, in the fighting grounds. I was wrong, and the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] was startled to find [other_combatant.GetHerHis] liege putting a hand on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] shoulder. Embarrassed, I fled. Oh, why does my heart long for [other_combatant.GetFirstName]? [other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]

Ever since [other_combatant.GetFirstName] bested me in our duel, I yearn to be near [other_combatant.GetHerHim], even more than before. I'm filled with thoughts and visions of us together, yet I dare not approach [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. [other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]

I've had trouble sleeping, ever since the duel with [other_combatant.GetFirstName], and it's affecting my temper. When my councilors begged me to clarify my thoughts on a matter, I simply blurted out that "[other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]"
I have to express my feelings to [other_combatant.GetHerHim].
You will send a letter to §Y[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

I have received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], containing a rather solemn declaration of love. Upon reading it, my eyes start stinging, and I have to sit down. [From.GetHerHisCap] words are anxious, expectant. Does [From.GetSheHe] not know how I have harbored feelings for [From.GetHerHim] too?

I have received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], praising both my beauty and combat prowess. "Oh", I mumble. "A love letter?" The servant who handed it to me nods. "I... I guess that [From.GetRomanticObstacle], but...", I mumble. The [Root.GetBoyGirl] shifts uncomfortably, but I am re-reading the words, over and over.

Dear [Root.GetFirstName], the letter begins. As I keep reading, I feel my ears grow hot. A love letter? From [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scratch my head. While I'm aware that [From.GetRomanticObstacle], I find my heart skipping a beat.

I was told to give this to you in person, the servant says, handing me a letter, with the seal of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. "I think it's a love letter, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", the [Root.GetBoyGirl] continues. "From [From.GetFirstName]?" I ask incredulously, snatching the papers from [Root.GetHerHis] hands. After reading it, I am stuck re-reading it, over and over.
Servant! Fetch me a scribe! I have to respond to this love letter.
I would rather pretend I never received these news.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has received the opinion modifier §YBudding Romance§! towards §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

As a servant [Root.GetBoyGirl] hands me a letter, I sigh. I've waited to hear from [From.GetFirstName] for what feels like ages, and every letter I receive in its stead feels like mockery. "What's this seal?" I mumble, suddenly curious. Soon, relief is washing over me. "[From.GetSheHeCap] wants to see me!" I laugh, and the servant smiles.

While awaiting news from [From.GetFirstName], I have tried occupying myself... I briefly entertained the idea of courting a visiting diplomat, but I quickly realized it was only because [From.GetHerHis] hair was the exact same shade of color as that of [From.GetFirstName]'s... It seems silly now, reading the heartfelt words my [From.GetLordLady] has sent me.
Oh, [Root.GetFirstName], I thought you'd never ask.
Telling the truth might be a winning strategy, after all...!
Oh, I look forward to my next dream about [From.GetHerHim]...!
The beautiful [From.GetManWoman] is encouraging me to stop hiding from my feelings...!
I've never met someone as kind as [From.GetSheHe].
[From.GetSheHeCap] wonders how I could ever have been jealous, when [From.GetHerHis] heart is mine.
[From.GetHerHisCap] words are inspiring! Oh, I will strive be more like [From.GetHerHim]...!
So I was not being delusional...!

My [GetMyChancellorName] [advisor_target.GetFirstName] clasps [advisor_target.GetHerHis] hands in a gesture of sympathy. "No, my [Root.GetLordLady], we have not received any word from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Yes, I've made inquiries among the servants, and nobody has stolen any letters..." Avoiding [advisor_target.GetHerHis] gaze, I wave my hand dismissively. "I suppose that is a response in its own."
I will not give up on our love...!
We have an eager new recruit! I should let the [new_recruit.GetManWoman] know that [new_recruit.GetSheHe] needs prove [new_recruit.GetHerselfHimself] to [new_recruit.GetHerHis] new peers...
I'll put on my most intimidating face. Ahem.

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] greets me with a brief nod. "Another recruit, huh? To join our ranks, you need to prove yourself, [Root.GetBoyGirl]", the [hero_character.GetManWoman] says gruffly, folding [hero_character.GetHerHis] arms across [hero_character.GetHerHis] chest. "You'd be fighting one of our own. Still interested, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] offered no protests when I explained our traditions, eyes all aglitter at the thought of an initiation duel. After some inquiry, [duel_target.GetTitledName] has kindly volunteered.
A sparring duel will take place between §Y[new_recruit.GetTitledName]§! and §Y[duel_target.GetTitledName]§!

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] listened while I explained our tradition of one-on-one duels, but then rolled [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes and walked off. "I would rather not get involved with barbarians."

My [hero_character.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.Society.GetName], [hero_character.GetTitledName], informs me that [combatant_1.GetBestName] needs someone to partake in a [combatant_1.GetDuelType], in an attempt for the eager recruit to prove [combatant_1.GetHerselfHimself] to us. The only respectable response would be to agree to help out.

[hero_character.GetBestName] and [From.Society.GetName] have chosen [From.GetTitledName] as my opponent. The [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] eyes me up and down when we are introduced. "Fresh meat, eh?" [From.GetSheHe] offers mockingly, before shoving an elbow into my side, making everyone laugh.
The duel will take place within the next few days.\n
How did... With your BARE HANDS?!

Although I did not expect much, we were all stunned by the performance of [From.GetBestName] during [From.GetHerHis] initiation fight. It will be interesting to see what [From.GetSheHe] makes of [From.GetHerselfHimself], as a member of our ranks.

In spite of some bruises and mild injury, I was not alone in being satisfied with the skill displayed by [From.GetBestName]. While I am intrigued, only time will tell whether joining our ranks is the right path for the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman], or not.

[From.GetBestName] was rather seriously injured by [From.GetHerHis] opponent, [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]. I expected my [combatant_2.GetRootRelation] to get in a blow or two, but I am mildly surprised that [From.GetTitledFirstName] still wants to join our ranks.

Just as [combatant_2.GetTitledName] was about to show [From.GetTitledName] what sparring match should look like, the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] dropped [From.GetHerHis] weapon and ran..
Now, that's what we want to see!

Not so fast, a voice whispers in my ear, as I'm preparing to turn in for the night. I turn around, but something stings my throat. A dagger? "We WILL duel, dear [Root.GetFirstName], do you understand? Nod if you understand." Panic pounding in my chest, I nod, carefully as to not hurt myself further. While attempting to talk some sense into [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName], in regards to [combatant_2.GetHerHim] declining my duel, I have decided to sneak into [combatant_2.GetHerHis] [combatant_2.GetCapitalHolding]. One day as I am sitting with my [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] I decide that I should show [From.GetHerHim] an excerpt from [GetMOCode] in the hopes of teaching [From.GetHerHim] the way of [GetMOGod]. Having learned what I can about one-on-one combat, swinging my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] being as easy as breathing, I have decided that it is time I focused on other pursuits common among [Root.Society.GetName].
Having studied many a tome on the topic, as well as the practical application of it, I am already well-versed in strategic warfare... Perhaps it is time I focused on something else?

Having lost count of the [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal] trophies which decorate the many walls of [Root.Capital.GetName], maybe I should spend some time on other pursuits befitting a member of [Root.Society.GetName]?
I should focus on personal combat.

My fellow members of [Root.Society.GetName] have long been wondering when I will choose a focus for my fighting talents. There are those who live for the art of dueling, while others prefer the more theoretic side of combat... Yet hunting is also a worthwhile pursuit.

I have studied my soldiers practicing their swordsmanship, and I am certain that some of them are becoming unsettled by the constant watch of their [Root.GetTitle]... Perhaps it is time I admit that I could use some guidance, when it comes to my own dueling? If nothing else, I could join their training...
I shall get [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] to teach me everything [mentor_target.GetSheHe] knows.
