left for a holy pilgrimage, and never returned

It is said Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] woke up to [saint_person.GetHerHis] hands and feet bleeding profusely, only for it to miraculously heal a couple of minutes later. Such was [saint_person.GetHerHis] life, so closely following in the footsteps of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].

It is said the body of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] has stayed the same as it was when [saint_person.GetSheHe] died, a pleasant floral smell filling the coffin. The miraculous incorruptibility of [saint_person.GetHerHis] body can only be proof of [saint_person.GetHerHis] rise to Heaven.

The stories of the miraculous healing of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] are numerous. [saint_person.GetSheHeCap] traveled all across the [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] world, bringing the sick and injured back from the very brink of death.

They say [saint_person.GetFirstName] had prophetic foresight, being able to see things which would happen days, months or years later. Through [saint_person.GetHerHis] visions, Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] guided friends and family to avoid the dangers they would face.

It was often said that Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] was so understanding of others that [saint_person.GetSheHe] would be able to practically read their minds. Despite [saint_person.GetHerHis] gift, [saint_person.GetSheHe] never used it for evil, and was truly a servant of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName], blessing those in [saint_person.GetHerHis] presence.

Many are those who work for [saint_person.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], but they all faded in the presence of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName]. It is said [saint_person.GetSheHe] ripped evil out of people, forcing them back into the right path in life for the glory of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Rumors say that the very servants of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName] stepped down from Heaven to confer with Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName]. Feathers could be found all around [saint_capital.GetName] after these miraculous meetings, truly showing everyone what a virtuous person [saint_person.GetFirstName] was.

The story goes that a man was drowning in [saint_capital.GetName], when Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] ran across the water to help the poor drowning man. It was only after the man was safely rescued everyone understood the miracle which had just happened. Following the footsteps of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName] so literally is only fitting for one as great as [saint_person.GetFirstName].

If one visits the church in [saint_capital.GetName], one will occasionally still hear the voice of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] among the singing voices of the faithful. Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] was so pious that even after [saint_person.GetHerHis] death, [saint_person.GetSheHe] still attends the prayers to [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].

At a rare moment in [saint_person.GetHerHis] childhood fire suddenly blasted forth from [saint_person.GetHerHis] fingers, and that was only the first of several such occurrences. Random at first, [saint_person.GetSheHe] managed to control their blessed gifts and used it to help the [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] world.

It is said one of the virtuous men of [saint_capital.GetName] was stuck under debris, and no matter how many men tried to help it was impossible to get the man out. Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] came across them, and prayed to [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName] to help them out. Afterwards the man could simply stand up and brush the debris off, as if it was as light as a feather. Such was the miraculous life of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName].

After the martyred death of [saint_person.GetFirstName], it is said some people saw [saint_person.GetHerHim] walk back home to [saint_capital.GetName] with [saint_person.GetHerHis] head in [saint_person.GetHerHis] arms. After these visions, they suddenly came across a new burial site where they found the body of [saint_person.GetFirstName].

So much did [saint_person.GetSheHe] care about the people around [saint_person.GetHerHim] that [saint_person.GetSheHe] blessed the local water with the power of love. It has become a famous spot for pilgrims, to wish for love and happiness in their life. So strong was [saint_person.GetHerHis] faith in [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].
It is said Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] cared so much for life, [saint_person.GetSheHe] brokered a peace with the rats and had them move out peacefully rather than forcefully remove them.

Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] was often followed around by a dog which was never seen eating, drinking or interacting with anyone but Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName]. Stories go that [saint_person.GetFirstName] conversed with this creature from [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName], and was told how to go through life as a virtuous faithful [saint_person.GetManWoman].

Stories tell of how in the middle of a prayer, Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] suddenly rose from the floor and floated above ground for several minutes. This periodically happened all throughout [saint_person.GetHerHis] life, showing us how [saint_person.GetSheHe] rose closer to Heaven even before [saint_person.GetSheHe] passed on.
walking across water to save a man
being seen carrying own head around after death
blessing local water with the power of love
having a wise dog [saint_person.GetSheHe] conversed with
being able to float above ground while praying
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known for [saint_person.GetHerHis] love for the pain of others. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known for [saint_person.GetHerHis] wild parties across the [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] realm. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known for [saint_person.GetHerHis] disgusting acts of cannibalism. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known for [saint_person.GetHerHis] insane and erratic actions throughout [saint_person.GetHerHis] life. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known for [saint_person.GetHerHis] love for alcohol. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known as the lover of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].
[saint_person.GetFirstName] was known as the lover of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Impiously canonized by the wicked [Root.GetTitledName].

A message is delivered to you by a [Root.GetMonkOrder]. Your ancestor made an impact on them, and they would like to extend their hand to you in friendship. If you so wish, they will settle some of their monks in [Root.Capital.GetName] to talk to the locals and spread the faithful message of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
A donation to help them out will be made.
I will do them one better, and join the monastic order myself.
All right, I wish them luck.
monk from the Community of Saint Basil
monk from the Community of Saint Abraham
monk from the Community of Saint Anthony
Become Prince Mayor of the Merchant League of the Hansa.
Become Prince of the new Swiss Confederation.

Years have passed with great fortunes and trading across the Baltic Sea, and the great [Root.Culture.GetName] cities in Holstein and Mecklenburg have grown into wealth and expanded considerably.

[Root.Liege.GetBestName] have given us the right of becoming Free Imperial Cities of the Empire. With my seat at [Root.Capital.GetName], I have become the new Mayor of the Hanseatic League, a large Merchant Republic that will span the entire Northern Seas.

With [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] at our back, we will grow to become a major player in the Empire. The petty feudal princes of old will bow down before us.
We have a bright future ahead of us.

Several German merchant guilds and trade cities along the shores of northern Europe have come together in Lübeck to form the Hanseatic League with the blessing of [Root.Liege.GetBestName] of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This loose confederation of Free Imperial Cities is dedicated towards the continued prosperity of its members and the mutual defense of any merchant vassals flying its flag. Their eventual and unstated goal, of course, is to one day completely dominate all trade along the Baltic and North Seas...
That is bound to ruffle some feathers...

For a long time, the cities around the central Alps have been threatened by other actors inside the Empire. All our cities have the honor of imperial immediacy, and we have agreed to come together to defend one another. No longer will we stand alone in the face of these threats, but rather we will stand together as a stronger faction.\n\nI have been chosen as the head of this confederation, as the one who will be the figurehead of all the Cantons of our new Swiss Confederation. No longer will we be threatened by outsiders, but rather be a strong independent actor in the Empire.
We will be safer as a unified group.

A new entity known as the Swiss Confederation has risen in the Empire. They are a conglomeration of cities with imperial immediacy settled around the central Alps, and they have entered a defensive alliance to protect themselves from the other electors around them.

An independent force to be reckoned with, they have broken free from any prior claims to their lands, be it from the old Burgundians to the west or the German lords to the north

I should look out for this new potential threat in the Empire.
Collect the provinces of the Central Plateau into the new Allied Swiss Confederacy.

There has been a large increase of pilgrims traveling to see the burial site of the local Saint [local_burial_tomb.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] in [local_burial_tomb.GetName]. With so many people, this is a prime opportunity for...
Refurbishing the tomb so everyone can see what a pious [Root.GetManWoman] I am.
Refurbishing the tomb and granting the church a large public donation.
Restore the tomb of Saint [local_burial_tomb.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] to its former glory.
To make a large public donation to the church.
Making some money off of them.
I will converse with the pilgrims.
Talk to them about my own pilgrimage.

The local Saint [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName] was an inspiration in many ways, and I wish I could live up to [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHim]. Lately I have visited [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHis] tomb a lot, and listened to the tales of [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHis] miracles throughout [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHis] life.
I will live up to [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHis] ideals!
I can only wish to be like [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHim]...
A well preserved skull of a saint.
An incorruptible tongue of a saint.

[target_burial_site.GetName] is a well known traveling spot for pilgrims to see the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName]. I have never cared much for Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName] nor [offended_burial_site_owner.GetTitledFirstName], and an opportunity to grab the valuables of the tomb has offered itself. But is it worth the risk?
No, I rather not do that.
Why yes, that sounds like a good idea.

My [Root.GetLordLady], we do not have a lot of time. Should we be careful and take it slow, or hurry and grab as much as possible? My captain asks me, as we breach the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName].
Let us be careful, and grab what we can.
You find a couple of trinkets.
Silly man, we are here to get as much as possible.

My men suddenly bring drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] into my room. "My [Root.GetLordLady], we found this [From.GetManWoman] in the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName], clearly trying to pillage the place."
Oh my, how preposterous! Put [From.GetHerHim] away!
The burial site of §YSaint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName]§! at [target_burial_site.GetName] has been plundered, and has been left a complete mess...

My men has come across the burial site of some sort of holy person for the pathetic [pillaged_christian.Religion.GetGroupName] [pillaged_christian.GetTitledFirstName]. This could be a chance to show them how we treat their weak holy people.
Take everything of value, and leave nothing behind.
We are not barbarians like them, we will leave it alone.
A great warrior King who has shaped his own kingdom out of the lands of the infidels.
A great warrior Queen who has shaped her own kingdom out of the lands of the infidels.
Organize a personal guard unit to protect the Papal States.

I have often noticed how [sway_target.GetFirstName] seem to make awkward weird mistakes in diplomatic encounters. I have a couple of books on the matter, and [sway_target.GetSheHe] would probably be happy with my help.

[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s men have outdated drilling routines, and it is almost embarrassing to see them in action. I could send him some books, or maybe some commanders, to help [sway_target.GetHerHim] get [sway_target.GetHerHis] men up to date.

I just heard about an absolutely atrocious business deal made at the behest of [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]. I could spend some time to help [sway_target.GetHerHim] out, or send some scribes over?

All kinds of rumors have been spreading about [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] recently. Does [sway_target.GetSheHe] have no understanding of how to cultivate a proper image? Someone need to help [sway_target.GetHerHim] out.
I came across an assertion written by [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName], and though it is well written, I have ideas for how it could be improved.
I will happily share the things I know.
A commander will get those soldiers up scratch in no time.
Let us make sure that does not happen again.
A proper image is the first step to quell court intricacies.
I will send a letter to explain how [sway_target.GetSheHe] could improve!
Maybe I am overstepping my boundaries here?
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of diplomacy, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of warfare, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of governing a realm, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of court intrigue, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s writing, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
I will refrain from offering my help.

I received a letter and a package from [From.GetTitledFirstName], where [From.GetSheHe] recommends me to take a look through the books [From.GetSheHe] sent me. They seem to be mostly focused around politics and negotiations.
A large burly man has been sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to help train my soldiers. For some reason they think they are better at exercising my men than I am.
A couple of scribes has been sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. They say they would like to help me govern my realm and aid with business deals.
A short and concise letter has been sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName], where [From.GetSheHe] discusses the recent rumors which have been spread about me.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a long letter about how I could improve my writing, and get a better understanding of more difficult scientific subjects.
If [From.GetSheHe] thinks [From.GetSheHe] can help, I am willing to give it a try.
I have noted a difference in the day to day political life recently, as I have started to find it a lot easier to simply converse with my courtiers and political allies.
My men look sharper and more ready for war than ever, and I feel ready to lead them to war. I would not have expected anything akin to this, just a couple of weeks ago.
Money has been flowing the last month as every business deal I do seem to go in my favor, and my people seem happier than ever.
Whatever rumors might have been floating around, seem to have dissipated the last month, and my own rumormongers have effectively spread a better image of me.
I found myself reading some of the more obscure, older books from the library. I have always been somewhat skeptical of these books, but they are not actually that bad after all.
My hard work is paying off.
I certainly worked hard for my recent accomplishments, but a lot of people have been saying it is because of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help.
[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] certainly helped, and I will send a letter with my gratitude.
I would have managed to do it without [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim].
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a letter with [sway_target.GetHerHis] thanks for all my work recently.
I am just happy to help out.

With every passing day I feel like things are degrading politically, and the court life is getting ever harsher. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] said [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wanted to help, but I expected things to get better, not worse.
My men look at me with scornful eyes. Whatever [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to help me with, this is clearly not having a positive effect on the men.
Money seem to disappear, and I have started worrying if the so-called help [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] sent me was a ploy to trick me.
I keep hearing more distasteful rumors spread about me by the day. If [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to help out, this is clearly not having the effect we wanted.
I start questioning my writing, and I have lost all interest in reading. I know [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] probably wanted to help, but it is having an adverse effect.
A lot of people has blamed me for the recent chaos that has been happening around the court, but was it not [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] who originally wanted to help out?
And yet I am the one who accepted [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help, so I am to blame.
Yes, what about [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]? Everything was fine before [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help!

There has been a lot of chaos at [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s court recently. My courtiers suddenly approached me with a letter today, where the ungrateful bastard blames me for the recent chaos.

The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith allows free interpretation of the scriptures. Note that a character can change [Root.GetHerHis] branch only once in their lifetime.
This character believes in adapting some of the features of the newer religions to [Root.GetHerHis] own worship of the old gods.
This character believes in detaching [Root.GetHerselfHimself] from worldly affairs in the pursuit for true enlightenment.
This character has interpreted [Root.GetHerHis] scriptures as a call to action against all the infidels threatening the survival of [Root.GetHerHis] faith.
This character believes that the true worship of the old gods is still best exemplified by the care that a [Root.GetManWoman] has for [Root.GetHerHis] own family.
The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith allows free interpretation of the scriptures. I must decide which of the main branches of beliefs I ascribe to the most.
Perhaps I misinterpreted the new scriptures. Perhaps there is a better way to worship the gods...
§GFollowers of this religion can pick a preferred Branch§!
By creating the Holy Order Dralha's Children, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
The Holy Order §YDralha's Children§! is established.

Followers of the [leader_of_dralhas.Religion.GetName] faith have always followed the central tenet of showing respect to all living creatures and to refrain from violence. But even the most peaceful of men must occasionally go to war.\n\nAs such, a new order has been founded, named the [leader_of_dralhas.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_dralhas.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_dralhas.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_dralhas.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_dralhas.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.
Known to be Gluttonous, [GetSheHe] spent [GetHerHis] days trying to sate [GetHerHis] abominable appetite. A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
The sacred restorer of the Persian Empire, [GetHerHis] rise to glory will be immortalized in the sermons of all Zoroastrian priests. Surely, [GetSheHe] sits next to Ahura Mazda now
A pious [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] spent many years and resources trying to spread the word of [Religion.GetHighGodName] amongst the heathens
A revolutionary [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] led [GetHerHis] tribes away from the worship of old idols and into the glory of the [Religion.GetName] faith
A zealous [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] fought for the glory of [Religion.GetHighGodName] against the heathens in one of the greatest holy wars of recent history
A wicked [GetManWoman], [GetSheHe] was rumored to speak to and entertain [GetHerselfHimself] with beasts. [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] abominable sins in the afterlife
Rumored to consume human flesh for sustenance, [GetFirstName] is without a doubt being punished in the afterlife for [GetHerHis] wickedness in life
Rumored to have sold [GetHerHis] soul to [Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], [GetFirstName] was always considered by many a troubled and mysterious [GetManWoman]
By restoring the Empire's ancient power, [GetFirstName] has ensured that [GetHerHis] name will live on in glory to the end of times
Having died as an outcast, excommunicated from the Church, [GetFirstName] is sure to face eternal damnation in the afterlife
Because of the unfortunate circumstances of [GetHerHis] birth, many doubted the legitimacy of [GetFirstName]'s rule. [GetSheHeCap] has now found peace from their slander in death
Known to be a staunch opposer of the Papacy, [GetFirstName] was notorious for claiming that [GetHerHis] right to rule came directly from [GetHighGodName]
Known to have stained [GetHerHis] hands in the blood of [GetHerHis] own kin, [GetFirstName] is surely paying for [GetHerHis] horrific crimes in the afterlife
A conscientious ruler, [GetFirstName] was renown for [GetHerHis] excellent skills as a steward and a ruler
Known as a great builder and imaginative planner, [GetFirstName] will be remembered for [GetHerHis] tireless attempts to renovate and expand [Capital.GetName]
Known to be a fierce fighter, [GetFirstName] spent most of [GetHerHis] days practicing for [GetHerHis] next duel, always seeking new thrills
Known as a competent strategist, [GetFirstName] was often found envisioning new and complex games to impress [GetHerHis] guests at court
Surely, [GetSheHe] is now lending [GetHerHis] skills to groom [Religion.GetHighGodName]'s garden itself
Known for [GetHerHis] wild feasts and dissolute conduct, [GetSheHe] hardly ever gave any thought to spiritual matters. [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
A skilled hunter, [GetFirstName] filled [GetHerHis] halls with exotic trophies gathered in [GetHerHis] many expeditions in the wilderness
Known for [GetHerHis] sadistic streak, [GetFirstName] enjoyed torturing and mutilating [GetHerHis] enemies. [GetSheHe] will surely be punished for [GetHerHis] inhuman crimes in the afterlife
Known for [GetHerHis] twisted, conniving mind, [GetFirstName] never revealed [GetHerHis] true intentions to anybody, not even [GetHerHis] closest friends
Known as a libertine [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] was gifted with a silver tongue, able to charm anyone into sharing [GetHerHis] bed
Known as a libertine [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] was gifted with a silver tongue, able to charm anyone into sharing [GetHerHis] bed

Known for spending most of [GetHerHis] nights in [GetHerHis] laboratory, [GetFirstName] was believed by many to be nothing more than a warlock, concocting unholy spells in the secrecy of [GetHerHis] [GetHouse]
Known to be a respected scholar, [GetFirstName] spent most of [GetHerHis] days studying in [GetHerHis] library, rarely leaving [GetHerHis] [GetHouse]
A talkative person and a sensible host, [GetFirstName] was renown across the realm for [GetHerHis] welcoming and cheerful attitude
Known to be an exceptional strategist, [GetFirstName] spent many of [GetHerHis] days examining fields and drilling [GetHerHis] troops
Known as a pious [GetManWoman], [GetFirstName] spent many of [GetHerHis] years studying the ancient scriptures and learning all that there is to know about [Religion.GetHighGodName]
Known as an inspired and insightful poet, [GetFirstName] delighted many in [GetHerHis] court with [GetHerHis] moving verses

Known as an inveterate drunkard, [GetFirstName] hardly ever spent a single day without drenching [GetHerselfHimself] in liquor, barely aware of [GetHerHis] surroundings. [GetFirstName] will surely pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
Born with unparalleled genius, [GetFirstName] was known for [GetHerHis] sharp and brilliant mind, always looking for new problems to solve and new opportunities to exploit

Barely eating anything, [GetFirstName] was known for [GetHerHis] weak constitution. Many at court were fearing that [GetHerHis] habits would lead [GetHerHim] to an untimely demise for years before [GetHerHis] death

Cursed with an unhealthy love for food, [GetFirstName] was known for [GetHerHis] massive girth. Many at court were fearing that [GetHerHis] habits would lead [GetHerHim] to an untimely demise for years before [GetHerHis] death
A disturbed person, [GetFirstName] was known throughout [GetHerHis] lands as a raving [GetMadwomanMadman]. Many are cautiously rejoicing at the news of [GetHerHis] death
Born under unfortunate circumstances, [GetFirstName] was often derided for [GetHerHis] diminutive stature. [GetHerHisCap] soul has finally been freed from [GetHerHis] deformed body
Born under unfortunate circumstances, [GetFirstName] was often derided for [GetHerHis] gigantic proportions. [GetHerHisCap] soul has finally been freed from [GetHerHis] deformed body
Born under unfortunate circumstances, [GetFirstName] was often derided for [GetHerHis] twisted back. [GetHerHisCap] soul has finally been freed from [GetHerHis] deformed body
Having been horribly disfigured, [GetFirstName] spent [GetHerHis] last years unable to show [GetHerHis] face in public. Death has finally freed [GetHerHis] soul from [GetHerHis] crippled body
Having been mangled in a terrible accident, [GetFirstName] spent [GetHerHis] last years barely able to walk. Death has finally freed [GetHerHis] soul from [GetHerHis] crippled body
The sacred feathered headdress worn by [tengri_pagan_reformed.GetHighGodName]'s incarnation on Earth.
The horned crown worn by [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetHighGodName]'s divine representative on Earth.

To the Excellent [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s coronation, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by donating the [scoped_artifact.GetName] [Root.GetSheHe] holds back to the Church.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]
This relic is part of my family's heritage!

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to recognize your divine right to rule, as soon as you donate the [scoped_artifact.GetName] back to the Church. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
This relic is part of my family's heritage!
Since I have forsaken the [From.Religion.GetName] faith, I must petition the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church's approval in order to be deemed worthy of my crown.
Surely I can convince [From.GetHerHim] to stop...
Use your diplomatic skills to convince §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to stop trying to §YAntagonize§! you for some time.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my attempts to slander [From.GetHerHim] has been extremely polite and reasonable, so much so that it has put me in a difficult position. It would not be appropriate for me to continue harassing [From.GetHerHim] after such a kind and thoughtful response...
Fine, I will leave [From.GetHerHim] be for a while.

It appears my call for peace and unity fell on deaf ears. [From.GetTitledFirstName] is too inconstant and arbitrary to care for my words, even when it comes at the expenses of [From.GetHerHis] own reputation.

Usually unbearable, this character is experience a extremely positive period in [Root.GetHerHis] life, which has turned [Root.GetHerHim] into a much more amenable person than [Root.GetHerHis] usual self.
Pestering [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been quite the entertaining activity. Reveling over [From.GetHerHis] misery has allowed me to get over mine.
Pestering [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been quite the entertaining activity. Reveling over [From.GetHerHis] misery has given me much needed relief from my other responsibilities.

Pestering [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been quite the entertaining activity. As long as I can torment [From.GetHerHim], I can keep some my more unsavory inclinations in check during my everyday duties.
And everyone loves me for it!
As entertaining as tormenting [From.GetTitledFirstName] is, having to spread rumors and weave plots around [From.GetHerHim] has also been an intriguing learning experience for me.
The more I know, the more I can hurt [From.GetHerHim].

Seeing [From.GetTitledFirstName] squirm and yell at my covert efforts to antagonize [From.GetHerHim] has made me realize how much easier it is to ruin the reputation of an impatient [From.GetManWoman].
I must be calm if I do not wish to suffer the same fate.
I will not tolerate this offense!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] truly hates me. Before I can even think about making [From.GetHerHim] like me, I should try to apologize about the past offenses that are the cause of [From.GetHerHis] current animosity towards me.
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for the terrible treatment I subjected [From.GetHerHim] to in the past.

Given the horrible mutilation I have caused [From.GetHerHim], it is no wonder that [From.GetTitledFirstName] hates me. If I wish for [From.GetHerHim] to ever like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for the terrible treatment I subjected [From.GetHerHim] to.
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for having unjustly held [From.GetHerHim] captive in my dungeons.
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for attempting to murder [From.GetHerHim].
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for the terrible pain I inflicted upon [From.GetHerHim] by torturing [From.GetHerHis] own family.
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for the terrible crime I committed by executing [From.GetHerHis] own child.
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for attempting to kill [From.GetHerHis] own spouse.
If I wish [From.GetTitledFirstName] to like me, I should first and foremost try to apologize for attempting to kill [From.GetHerHis] own family.
Let us bury these sour, old memories...
I never meant any of it, I swear!
I hope you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
I am truly sorry for our past disagreements.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] wished me to know of how deeply and truly sorry [From.GetSheHe] is for causing me so much pain in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will forgive [From.GetHerHis] past slights and give [From.GetHerHim] another opportunity to earn my trust and friendship.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]  wished me to know of how deeply and truly sorry [From.GetSheHe] is for causing my family so much pain in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will forgive [From.GetHerHis] past slights and give [From.GetHerHim] another opportunity to earn my trust and friendship.
Very well, I will give [From.GetHerHim] another chance.
Liar! I won't fall for [From.GetHerHis] tricks!
[From.GetHerHisCap] groveling is as amusing as it is fruitless.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me in an attempt to apologize for the many offenses [From.GetSheHe] has subjected me to in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will forgive [From.GetHerHis] past slights and give [From.GetHerHim] another opportunity to earn my trust and friendship.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me in an attempt to apologize for the many offenses [From.GetSheHe] has subjected my family to in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will forgive [From.GetHerHis] past slights and give [From.GetHerHim] another opportunity to earn my trust and friendship.
Despite my sincere show of contrition, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has rejected my apology. [From.GetHerHisCap] vile and resentful nature has clearly gotten the better over [From.GetHerHis] reason.

I was relieved to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is ready to forgive me for my past behavior. Unfortunately, the list of indignities I subjected [From.GetHerHim] to is a long one. I think I might need still some time before I can truly start swaying [From.GetHerHim] to my cause.

I was relieved to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is ready to forgive me for my past behavior. Now that we have finally put behind us old quarrels, we can start to know each other better and build trust between us.
It appears [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s suspicious nature made [From.GetHerHim] wary of my apology. I might have to find another way to make [From.GetHerHim] believe that I am sincere.
Despite my sincere show of contrition, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has rejected my apology. [From.GetHerHisCap] vile and sadistic nature has clearly gotten the better over [From.GetHerHis] reason.
I suppose [From.GetHerHis] behavior is not entirely unjustified...

Despite my show of contrition, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has rejected my apology. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the sting of the cruel actions I committed against [From.GetHerHim] is still too vivid in [From.GetHerHis] mind to allow [From.GetHerHim] to grant me forgiveness.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure a safe and prosperous future for their people.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and lead the assault against the new religions.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to defend its followers from infidel invaders.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure the spread of the worship of the old gods to the four corners of the world.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure the preservation of their ancient customs.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to ensure the coexistence of their religion with its new neighbors.
Firmly under the leadership of a holy [Root.GetTitle],
Now organized in a strict hierarchy with an official religious head,
Reorganized as an autocephalous hierarchy of loosely connected High Priests,
Reorganized to give each independent clergyman full authority over [Root.GetHerHis] flock,
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is ready to contend with its weak and effeminate opponents, be they missionaries or Crusaders.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has been entirely reinvigorated, forsaking its shamanistic roots and acquiring an official dogma, fit to oppose its rivals.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has abandoned its tribal ways for a well-defined dogma and structure, fit to oppose its rivals.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has developed a series of well-defined rituals and a full list of deities to combat the proselytizing efforts of its neighbors.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has ratified all the spells and charms once preserved by oral tradition in a proper holy text, so that they can be better used to combat the prayers of foreign missionaries and their alien gods.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has ratified all the spells and charms once preserved by oral tradition in a proper holy text, so that they can be better used to combat the curses and armies of its rivals.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has developed an official holy text describing all the proper ways to worship [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and counteract the arguments of infidel preachers and missionaries.

the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has finally defined the fundamental differences between itself and the other Eastern religions, preventing any more of its worshipers from slipping away to Buddhism, Hinduism and their ilk.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is finally fit to complete the conquest of the New World without fear of its champions being swayed by foreign preachers and missionaries.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is ready to contend with its degenerate and barbarous opponents, reborn stronger than ever from its ashes.
This event could mark the beginning of a new era of pagan revivalism all throughout Europe and spell doom for the Abrahamic usurpers.
By this action, the Sunset invaders have made clear that they have absolutely no intention to ever leave Europe.
This event might put in serious jeopardy the advance of the Muslim invaders in the East.
For the first time in centuries, the authority of the Christian Church over Europe is being undermined.
This child is not worth my life!
Drink a §YJunipers' Potion§! to rid yourself of the child and avoid further complications.
As if being infidel to me was not enough, I have just discovered that, rather than risk her life in a difficult pregnancy, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to kill the child growing in her womb.
I have just discovered something terrible! Rather than risk her life in a difficult pregnancy, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to kill the child growing in her womb.
Not my child, not my problem.
Everyone should know about her crime!
I must find the strength to forgive her.
I suppose we will have to try again...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow found out that my abortion was not an accident. Even worse, [From.GetSheHe] made the news public, accusing me of infanticide.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow discovered that my abortion was not an accident. Fortunately, [From.GetSheHe] told me that [From.GetSheHe] understands why I took this decision and that [From.GetSheHe] is still willing to stand by me and support my choice.
I am so glad of it!
This woman has been exposed for the terrible crime of killing the fruit of her own womb, placing her safety above that of her child.
In secret, the faithful have organized around a small church community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
In secret, the faithful have organized around a small cabal in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
In secret, the faithful have organized around a small cabal in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has passed away. I can only hope [From.GetSheHe] remembered me fondly in [From.GetHerHis] last moments...
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has passed away. I guess I will have to find another plaything to torment now.
Despite now being [From.GetHerHis] opponent in war, I still feel as if I can try reaching out to [From.GetTitledFirstName] in some way...
If we fight, let us fight honorably.
Propose to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to agree never to use underhanded §YTactics§! during the war.
Can we not put an end to this unnecessary conflict?
Offer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a meeting to discuss your reasons for fighting.
I honor the bravery of your troops.
Send a letter to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, complimenting the valor and skill that [From.GetHerHis] troops have shown.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can remain on good terms. [From.GetSheHeCap] has petitioned me to reach an agreement to never use underhanded tactics against each other whenever our armies meet on the field of battle.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can find a peaceful and harmless resolution to this conflict. [From.GetSheHeCap] has assured me that [From.GetSheHe] is ready to order [From.GetHerHis] armies to stand down if I promise to do the same.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can remain on good terms. [From.GetSheHeCap] has invited me to a short meeting under the white flag, hoping to find some common ground despite the ongoing hostilities.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can remain on good terms. I have just received a letter from [From.GetHerHim], complimenting me and my troops for the valor and skills we have shown during the war.
Order your troops to avoid trying to §YAmbush§! the armies of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
End your war against §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! §Yin a White Peace§!.
Trust §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and meet [From.GetHerHim] under the white flag.
Your troops proved to be just as brave.
If only I could say the same about yours...
I was happy to hear [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I are of one mind on this issue. We will both refrain from using underhanded tactics against each other during this war.
The messenger came in this morning to inform me that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to accept my offer of peace. The war is over.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to trust me and accept my offer and meet me during a momentary truce. While it is unlikely that this meeting will result in a settlement of our dispute, it might help us to maintain a healthy relationship in spite of the war.
This is the perfect opportunity to capture [From.GetHerHim]!
I will make my reasons clear.
Unfortunately, it appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not interested in limiting [From.GetHerHis] option when fighting against my troops, probably not trusting that I would do the same.
Unfortunately, it appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not interested in talks of peace right now.
Unfortunately, it appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not trust me enough yet to meet me in person.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was flattered by the honors I bestowed upon [From.GetHerHis] troops and was happy to reciprocate them.

Sadly, [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignored my flattering message regarding the bravery of [From.GetHerHis] troops and the skill of [From.GetHerHis] commanders in battle. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] did not believe me to be truthful...

I have been betrayed! [From.GetTitledFirstName] took advantage of my trust to ambush me during our meeting, breaking the truce that [From.GetSheHe] [From.GetHerselfHimself] had called. I am now at [From.GetHerHis] mercy!

My plan worked brilliantly! I have caught [From.GetFirstName] during our brief meeting. While breaking the truce has considerably hurt my reputation, this trickery could bring a quick resolution to this war.

I was not wrong to trust [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The truce allowed us to discuss many things and clarify our respective reasons to fight this war against each other. Even though we were unable to reach a peaceful resolution, I think that we have come to respect each other quite a bit more after this meeting.

Thankfully, the truce I called for allowed me and [From.GetTitledFirstName] to discuss many things and clarify our respective reasons to fight this war against each other. Even though we were unable to reach a peaceful resolution, I think that we have come to respect each other quite a bit more after this meeting.
This character does not rule nor live under any government.
You cannot §YSway§! and §YAntagonize§! the same character at the same time.
Only through human flesh the truth can be revealed!

I was told many time when I was growing up of how the stars are influencing my behavior, but now I am no longer sure of it. Was it just stories grown-ups were telling me to make me feel special?
I don't care about the stupid stars!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has taken a deep interest in the circumstances of [From.GetHerHis] birth and in the constellations affecting [From.GetHerHis] destiny.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] seems to be unwilling to take into consideration the circumstances of [From.GetHerHis] birth and the constellations affecting [From.GetHerHis] destiny.
So what? Astrology is nothing but superstition.
Good. [From.GetSheHeCap] should not let the stars dictate [From.GetHerHis] future.
[From.GetSheHeCap] worries too much about the stars.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] warned me that I worry too much about the stars and that I should not let the circumstances of my birth affect my judgment on present events.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me for not focusing too much on astrology at the expenses of my better judgment.
I should not let the stars rule over me!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me today for paying the due respect to the heavens and taking a healthy interest in astrology and the influence that the stars have on me.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] decided to scold me today for my lack of interest in astrology. [From.GetSheHeCap] warned me that I should always pay mind to the influence that stars have over people.
I must look up to see what is inside me.

By determining in clear terms which constellations favor me and which bring me harm, I can fully embrace the nature of my zodiac sign and reach a greater level of understanding of myself and the world around me.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Aquarius, a constellation commonly associated with introversion and eccentricity.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Aries, a constellation commonly associated with fierceness and honesty.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Cancer, a constellation commonly associated with tenacity and introspection.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Capricorn, a constellation commonly associated with curiosity and steadiness.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Gemini, a constellation commonly associated with versatility and fickleness.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Leo, a constellation commonly associated with fervor and pride.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Libra, a constellation commonly associated with fairness and moderation.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Pisces, a constellation commonly associated with introversion and compassion.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Sagittarius, a constellation commonly associated with dynamism and charisma.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Scorpio, a constellation commonly associated with secretiveness and stubbornness.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Taurus, a constellation commonly associated with perseverance and determination.
After making the proper calculations, I have determined that I was born under the sign of the Virgo, a constellation commonly associated with diligence and humility.
Truly, the stars know my heart.
Take some time to study the ruins and accounts of the Ancient Greeks and Romans.
Take some time to study the ruins and accounts of the Ancient Greeks and Romans.
This ruler has spent a long time studying the accounts and writings of Caesar's military exploits in order to refine [Root.GetHerHis] military skills.
This ruler has spent a long time studying the orations of Cicero and other famous Classical politicians in order to better learn the art of diplomacy and sophistry.
This ruler has spent a long time studying the accounts and writings of Emperor Justinian in order to acquire a deeper understanding of statecraft and Roman law.

I walk amongst the ruins of one of the greatest civilizations to ever grace this world. I should take the opportunity to study in detail the history and the glorious accomplishments of those that came before us if I ever wish to emulate their feats.
I wish to know more about these strange gods they worshiped...
I want to study the great generals of old and their tactics.
I wonder how the old Empire worked...
I wish to study the speeches of the great men of ancient times.

I did my best, but my attempts to study the history of the Roman Empire were not as successful as I hoped. Most accounts I was able to access are fragmented and confusing. I don't think I was able to learn anything valuable after all these months of study.

I am fascinated by the legends of the old gods worshiped by Romans and Greeks in the past. Their capricious and passionate nature differs so much from [catholic.GetHighGodName]'s unknowable and contradictory designs... Their plots and rivalries certainly offer a better explanation for the chaotic state of our world.
What if *they* are the real gods?
They are nothing but entertaining stories.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of Caesar's military exploits against the Gauls. It has been an enlightening learning experience and I am sure that, despite the difference in equipment and sizes, I can apply some of his tactics against my own enemies.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of Rome's greatest statesmen. Reading the works of Emperor Justinian and of his reformation of the Roman legal code in particular has been an eye-opening experience for me.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of Rome's finest orators. Reading through the treaties of Cicero and other great sophists has allowed me to learn a lot about the fine art of diplomacy and politics.

Followers of the Bön religion worship many gods and spirits. Adherents seek Great Perfection through the Dzogchen, which is one of the Nine Vehicles (or paths) of the Bön faith. In secret, the Bön Faithful continue to sacrifice animals made of barley flour to appease the higher powers.

Followers of Hellenism worship the old gods of the ancient Greeks and Romans. Adherents sacrifice animals and calculate the future through astrology, believing their deities to be fickle and passionate beings, largely indifferent to the affairs of mortals.

Followers of Hellenism worship the old gods of the ancient Greeks and Romans. Adherents sacrifice animals and calculate the future through astrology, believing their deities to be fickle and passionate beings, largely indifferent to the affairs of mortals
This woman is recovering from the traumatizing consequences of aborting her own child.

What horrible crime have I committed? Whenever I close my eyes I can hear the silent cries of my son that never was. The guilt for the ruthless murder of that innocent soul plagues my mind like a disease.

The unthinkable has happened. Rumors about my terrible crime have spread across the court. And, if the stories are true, I have nobody to blame but myself. The servant whisper that every night I walk in my sleep around the castle, asking forgiveness to the child I murdered before his own birth.
I feel that there is something wrong with me. The premature end to my last pregnancy broke something within me.
The citizens of Rome have risen up after the ruthless destruction brought by their new Emperor upon the Church and their homes.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has NOT recently chosen a Religious Branch.
The decision to reinstate a dead, heathen cult in place of the worship of the Abrahamic god has upset many vassals across the Empire.
The decision to reinstate a dead, heathen cult in place of the worship of the Abrahamic god has dragged the newly-reformed Empire into civil war.

For centuries the Church has had free reign to lord over Rome, the ancient capital of my Empire. The influence of the Papacy looms still over the city, as its many churches can attest. Perhaps it is time to reaffirm the authority of the Empire over the Church in incontrovertible terms...

Even now that the Christians have been driven out of the great and ancient city of Rome, the monuments to their God still persist, challenging my authority as [Root.GetTitle]. I have only one option if I wish to truly claim Rome for myself...

Centuries ago, the Galileans, in order to hide their crimes, falsely accused one of my predecessors of burning Rome to the ground. Perhaps it is time I returned them the favor and cleansed the Empire's old capital of the wretched temples scourging its Seven Hills...
I must rid the city of any lingering Christian influence.
Heathens as they are, we should not destroy their temples.
We must endeavor to be better than them.

In order to stamp out any remaining rebellious aspirations and punish past insults against the Empire, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the destruction of the Holy See itself. After having priests and prelates abandon their churches in a hurry, barely giving them enough time to recover relics and books, [From.Culture.GetName] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.

In a flagrant act of disrespect and carelessness for tradition and culture, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the destruction of the Holy See itself. After having priests and prelates abandon their churches in a hurry, barely giving them enough time to recover relics and books, [From.Culture.GetName] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.

Living up the reputation of the heathen Emperors of old, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the ruthless destruction of the Holy See itself, in an attempt to undermine Christendom. After forcefully locking priests and cardinals within their own churches, [From.Culture.GetName] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.
The wailing of Christians does not concern me.
Galileans will be the ones to burn for a change...
The §YChristian§! world is outraged by your actions.\nThe destruction of the §YHoly See§! has gravely affected the §YMoral Authority§! of the §YCatholic Church§!.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is forever damned by this act!
The burning of Christian temples is of no concern to us.
It is time somebody rectified the failings of our ancestors...

The citizens of Rome have not reacted well to the city's great fire. After boiling for a few days, a large mob of peasants has broken the peace and assaulted the local garrison, rebelling openly against the destruction of the Holy See and the collateral damage caused by the fire to the people's homes.

I have restored the Empire, a feat worthy of immortal glory, yet now doubts beset my mind. How can I ensure that this Empire will not fall like it did in the past? When looking for the causes that fragmented and destroyed the old Empire, there is only one thing that appears to be constant...
Christianity led us to our fall...
Work to reinstate the old §YHellenic§! faith in the hopes that it will strengthen the Empire.
Weak and impious leaders doomed us.

Could it be possible that, by embracing the barbaric Eastern religion of Christ, Emperor Theodosius weakened the Empire, and that, conversely, I might be able to strengthen it by reintroducing the worship of the old gods? My decision could just as easily doom the Empire a second time as I attempt to save it...
I must act quickly, when people still praise me for restoring the Empire!
Send letters to all your §YVassals§!, ordering them to follow you in your conversion.\nSeize all old §YHellenic§! holy sites under your control so that new temples can be established within them.
I must act patiently and find kindred souls before revealing my plans.

[Root.GetTitledName],
We have come to the conclusion that Our predecessors' attachment to the barbaric cult of the Galileans is inextricably tied to the fall of this great Empire of ours, and I have come to the resolution that, in order to truly restore the glory of Rome, we must also restore its ancient religion.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I must bow to the Imperial will.

I shall not be part of this farce. I am a §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§!, and I will not abandon my faith in [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

I am happy to stand right beside you for the resurgence of the §YHellenic§! faith, my [Root.GetTitle].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
I have come to the conclusion to abide by the new Imperial decree and convert to the Hellenic faith. I expect all my subordinates to follow me in this decision.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I will not convert to a dead religion!

The great celebrations across the Christian world after the restoration of the Roman Empire at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have been cut short by a terrifying and unexpected turn of events. The new [From.GetTitle] has determined that Christianity is a barbarous and seditious cult that has no place in [From.GetHerHis] new Empire. \nIn an effort to rebuild the past glory of Rome in its entirety, [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken [From.GetHerHis] faith in favor of worshiping the old pagan gods of [From.GetHerHis] ancestors.
The old gods will rise from the ashes of the Church!
A new §YHellenic Temple§! is established in §YRome§!.
A new §YHellenic Temple§! is established in §YThessalonike§!.
A new §YHellenic Temple§! is established in §YAtheniai§!.
A new §YHellenic Temple§! is established in §YSyracuse§!.
A new §YHellenic Temple§! is established in §YAlexandria§!.
We stand united against the barbarity of the Galileans!
Babylon has risen again! The end time is near!
This is of no concern to us.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has clearly gone insane, yet, with the authority [From.GetSheHe] has accumulated after [From.GetHerHis] many accomplishments, [From.GetSheHe] might be able of perverting the Empire into a force for evil, a nation of idolaters. [From.GetSheHeCap] must be stopped now, before it's too late!
We must rise up and depose this tyrant!
Send letters urging all the followers of the §YOne True God§! in the Empire to band together against the Apostate on the throne.
There is nothing we can do.

To all the faithful of the One True God!\nThe [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] has taken over our [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle]'s mind, twisting it with lies and madness. We must stand together and depose the Apostate who sits on the holy throne of Rome or see the accursed heathens spread once again across our world.\n[From.GetTitledName]
These are the words of a traitor.

The time has come!\nAll the followers of the One True God suffering under the yoke of our mad [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] have reunited under my lead and are ready to bring the blasphemous tyrant to justice.

Several indignant vassals have banded together to stand against the new Imperial religion of Rome. They have taken arms and plan to overthrow their own [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] and restore the worship of their god throughout the Empire.
I cannot say I am surprised...

Despite the incredible unpopularity of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] decision, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to emerge victorious from the Empire's recent civil war and reaffirm [FromFrom.GetHerHis] desire to restore the Hellenic faith to the Roman world. After [FromFrom.GetHerHis] show of force and lucidity, the Emperor has gained several new supporters, both amongst the people as well as the nobility. \n\nThis is truly a new beginning for Rome and a dark day for Christians everywhere.

The Civil War has ended, and [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] has reaffirmed [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] authority as our rightful [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]. Perhaps it is time I reconsidered my choice and embraced Hellenism, lest I suffer the [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]'s wrath.
Deep down I always believed in [hellenic_pagan.GetHighGodName]!
No, I must stand my ground!
Convert to §YHellenism§! and urge your §YVassals§! to do the same.
With the Empire restored, we can all once again enjoy the civilized and opulent lifestyle of our ancestors.
§YRoman Culture§! will start spreading across the Empire.
With the Empire restored, we can all once again enjoy the civilized and opulent lifestyle of our ancestors.

As expected, the reintroduction of ancient Roman law and customs has not been well received by the Galilean moralizers. An entire coalition of Christian priests has petitioned me to put a stop to these new excesses to prevent the damnation of my subjects' souls.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire have caused the ire of a few moralizers amongst my Christian subjects. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire appear to have caused the anger of some Christian priests. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.
Your cult of mediocrity is no longer law.
I care not for the lamentations of infidels.
On the contrary, I must be charitable to be virtuous!
Issue a great period of celebrations throughout the Empire, further encouraging the adoption of §YRoman Culture§!.
We will endeavor to be moderate.
It is not our intention to upset the Christians.
Far from me to eschew humility...
The outcome of the Civil War will drive more citizens of the Empire to embrace §YHellenism§!.

The newborn [leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName] religion has found new protectors in the Myrmidons, a company of faithful warriors dedicated to the protection of the sacred altars of the old gods and the fight against the barbarous infidels besieging them.\n They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_myrmidons.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_myrmidons.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_myrmidons.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.
We must organize the most devoted warriors amongst us under one banner so that they can protect us from the barbarian heathens surrounding us.
The Holy Order of the §YMyrmidons§! will be formed.

The secretive cult of Bacchus has always been a plague to the civilized society of Ancient Rome. Members of this cult gather at night to perform obscene rituals to satisfy their most primal instincts, dabbling in sorcery, cannibalism and bestiality.
Has not been approached by the Bacchants before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a Bacchant.

Beneath the confines of civilized society lay the tumultuous passions tormenting all human beings. Re-establishing the mystic cult of Bacchus will only allow the enlightened among us to satisfy our innermost desires without restraint.
The Secret Society of the §YBacchants§! is established.

Believed to be vanquished for centuries, the mad followers of Bacchus have resurfaced, spreading their grotesque beliefs throughout civilized lands.\nSlaves to their most primal desires, these deviants hide their twisted allegiance to the darkest powers of Chaos during daytime, walking inconspicuously amongst the virtuous. Yet, when night comes, they gather in the wilderness to dance around fires while dressed like goats and leopards, performing obscene orgiastic rites and consuming raw human flesh.
Is it such a crime to follow one's instincts?

I'm having dinner and plenty of drinks with [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledName] tonight. It's lovely, yet what I am most charmed by is [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] [satanists_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]. Why else would I not immediately stop our conversation, which has slowly begun to touch upon some unsavory and deviant topics about the primal needs of every [Root.GetManWoman]?

What if I told you I can set you free from all the tedium and responsibilities of society? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "I can show you a world of pure passion where your every pleasure is distilled to its purest form..."

I meet [From.GetTitledFirstName] on my way to the meeting. We walk together in the sacred garden, under the cover of the night, attracted by the maddening rhythm of the drums and cymbals of our brethren. Many have already begun the ritual when we arrive, dancing incessantly around the fires, filled with the God's essence.
It is time to spill some blood!

The frenzy takes hold of us as the god's brew courses through our veins, filling us with primal strength and divine intent. We fret and scream at the moon, circling around the wailing victims rounded around the fire. I leap forward growling and sink my teeth in the flesh of a young man, tearing him apart and desecrating his corpse.

The frenzy takes hold of us as the god's brew courses through our veins, filling us with primal strength and divine intent. We fret and scream at the moon, circling around the wailing victims rounded around the fire. Yet, in the end it's [FromFrom.GetFirstName] that I leap on, consumed by Bacchus' madness, tearing and clawing.
Be merry tonight, my kindred, for tomorrow civilization awaits.

Our frenetic dance quickly turns into a violent orgy. Wails of men and beasts overlap in a sinister cacophony as the grotesque shadows of our jumbled limbs quiver, grasping for the crackling fires. When I finally regain consciousness after dawn, soiled and exhausted, I only have broken memories of the terrible delights I experienced during the Bacchanal.

Our frenetic dance quickly turns into a violent orgy. Wails of men and beasts overlap in a sinister cacophony as the grotesque shadows of our jumbled limbs quiver, grasping for the crackling fires. Then, just as I am finally feeling the gods fill me with his ecstatic presence, I feel somebody yelling at me and something hitting my head.

Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously mention the most extreme and unsavory practices of our rituals... Thankfully, it seems that my carefully chosen words had the desired effect on [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]. From [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] glittering eyes I got the distinct impression that [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] enjoyed the promise of titillating experiences within our congregation.

Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously mention the most extreme and unsavory practices of our congregation... Regretfully, it seems that my words only irritated my [satanists_recruit.GetRootRelation] – from the steely look [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] finally gave me, I should probably steer clear of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim] for now.
Determine which §YPagan Branch§! you belong to.
Abandon the §YPagan Branch§! you currently ascribe to and choose another one.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of its organized, proselytizing neighbors. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful of [Root.GetHerHis] priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and protect their ancient customs.\nWith official clergy and ratified scriptures, this new religion has already started to spread amongst the old [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful.
My lover [From.GetFirstName] has just informed me that she is pregnant with my child.
I have received news that my lover [From.GetFirstName] is with child. Hopefully she will be able to persuade her husband to be the real father.
Now that I have embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, I must choose which branch of it I ascribe to...
Rulers follow the Hellenic principles of syncretism and meritocracy
Rulers follow the Aztec principles of human sacrifices, seafaring and relentlessness
Close-kin marriage is forbidden and Heir Designation is allowed
Polygamy and holy close-kin marriages are allowed
Religious Taxes and monastic traditions are enforced
Rulers receive no Short Reign penalty and are hard to convert
Rulers can move by river and do not suffer Short Reign penalties
Rulers can designate heirs and are hard to convert
Polygamy is allowed and armies ignore defensive attrition
Rulers follow the Norse principles of adventuring and seafaring
Men are entirely excluded from all positions of power
Both men and women have equal access to all positions of power
Women are entirely excluded from all positions of power
Characters are born under specific Zodiac signs
Army morale is determined by Haruspicy
Rulers can gain Sympathy towards another religious group
Rulers do not receive Short Reign penalty
This character was born to the consort of a ruler. Children of consorts can inherit but are somewhat poorly regarded by others.
That vile hag [From.GetBestName] has forced me to become her consort!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my husband [From.GetBestName] to become her consort!

My consort, [target_consort.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], does not love me. While love is not exactly necessary, I'd still like to see his charming face light up with smiles and laughter... so I've decided to romance him!
My consort [From.GetBestName] has fled! He climbed out of his tower room window, probably with outside assistance, because my guards were completely unable to locate him before he escaped my realm.
I want a portrait of my beautiful consort.
I am surely with child... my consort will be pleased.
I am surely with child. I wonder which one of my consorts is the lucky father...

The Hellenic School of Stoicism is based on the shunning of excesses and passions in favor of a balanced and rational approach to life, centered around the virtues of Wisdom, Courage, Temperance, and Justice. Most Stoics believe that happiness can be achieved by studying philosophy and leading a virtuous life.
Promulgate a series of social edicts that will gently lead the local population into embracing the more civilized [From.Culture.GetName] culture.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the title shield of a county to convert the local population to your culture.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about your life and your actions in order to reach a better understanding of the world.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
The School of Stoicism was one of the predominant branches of Hellenic philosophies at the time of the old Roman Empire, based upon the pursuit of virtue and moderation.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to restore the ancient School of Stoicism. Based upon the pursuit of reason and moderation, Stoics believe in shunning all excesses and passions in favor of a balanced and rational approach to life, centered around the virtues of Wisdom, Courage, Temperance, and Justice.\nAlthough membership is not excluded to other religions, this philosophy has always been closely related to Hellenism.
They shall be a bulwark for civilized society!
A majority of the population in [From.GetName] has embraced the [Root.Culture.GetName] culture.

A courier is brought before me with a message, telling me that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has imposed some strict social reforms on [From.GetName] to lead the populace into embracing [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] customs.
The sacred feathered headdress attuning the wearer with the spirit world.
The sacred crown worn by the Sun-King.
The branched crown worn by [slavic_pagan_reformed.GetHighGodName]'s divine representative on Earth.
The branched crown worn by [baltic_pagan_reformed.GetHighGodName]'s divine representative on Earth.
The sacred feathered headdress worn by the divine emperor of the [aztec_reformed.GetHighGodName] faithful.
Regalia representing the authority and enlightenment of the [bon_reformed.GetName]'s divine leader.
Regalia representing the dignity and power of the divine emperor of the Hellenes.
You can consecrate a temple to a specific god of the [From.Religion.GetName] pantheon, ensuring you receive their blessing.
The temple must be controlled by a priest of the §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! faith.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not have consecrated a temple recently.
Decide to which [From.Religion.GetName] god should this temple be dedicated.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetZeusJupiterName], god of heaven, justice and fertility.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetPoseidonNeptuneName], god of seas, horses and settlers.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetHadesPlutoName], god of the underworld, associated with secrets and precious minerals.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetHermesMercuryName], god of traders and tricksters.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetDemetraCeresName], goddess of earth, seasons and prosperity.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetAthenaMinervaName], goddess of wisdom and military strategy.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to Apollo, god of the sun, associated with arts, medicine and vengeance.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetArtemisDianaName], goddess of the moon, associated with purity and nature.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetAresMarsName], god of war and wrath.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetAphroditeVenusName], goddess of love and lust.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetHephaestusVulcanName], god of fire, volcanoes and metalworking.
This ruler has ordered the consecration of a great temple to [GetHestiaVestaName], goddess of hearth, home and family.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetZeusJupiterName], god of heaven, justice and fertility.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetPoseidonNeptuneName], god of seas, horses and settlers.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetHadesPlutoName], god of the underworld, associated with secrets and precious minerals.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetHermesMercuryName], god of traders and tricksters.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetDemetraCeresName], goddess of earth, seasons and prosperity.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetAthenaMinervaName], goddess of wisdom and military strategy.
This temple has been dedicated to Apollo, god of the sun, associated with arts, medicine and vengeance.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetArtemisDianaName], goddess of the moon, associated with purity and nature.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetAresMarsName], god of war and wrath.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetAphroditeVenusName], goddess of love and lust.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetHephaestusVulcanName], god of fire, volcanoes and metalworking.
This temple has been dedicated to [GetHestiaVestaName], goddess of hearth, home and family.
This character has recently overseen the consecration of a temple to a specific god.

Many gods inhabit the [Root.Religion.GetName] pantheon, but it would be only right to dedicate such an important temple as [scoped_temple_barony.GetName] to one of the twelve Olympians, the most prestigious of the deities watching us from above.
This temple belongs to one of the Kronid brothers.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the three sons of [GetKronosSaturnName]: §Y[GetZeusJupiterName]§!, §Y[GetPoseidonNeptuneName]§!, or §Y[GetHadesPlutoName]§!.
Let the gods of war consecrate this temple!
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the more bellicose deities of the pantheon: §Y[GetAthenaMinervaName]§!, §Y[GetAresMarsName]§!, or §Y[GetHephaestusVulcanName]§!.
This is the home of a kind deity.

Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the gods of prosperity: §Y[GetHestiaVestaName]§!, §Y[GetDemetraCeresName]§!, §Y[GetAphroditeVenusName]§!, or §Y[GetHermesMercuryName]§!.
One of the Heavenly Twins will inhabit this temple.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of sons of Leto: §YApollo§! or §Y[GetArtemisDianaName]§!.

[GetZeusJupiterName] is by many considered the King of Heaven. He and his brothers fought a war against their father for control of all Creation and then gambled over its spoils. Fate bestowed dominion of the skies upon [GetZeusJupiterName], leaving the seas to [GetPoseidonNeptuneName] and the earth to [GetHadesPlutoName].
