[GetAresMarsName] has always been a very popular god amongst the Romans, observing a more direct and passionate approach to war compared to his sister [GetAthenaMinervaName]. While not explicitly a god of war, [GetHephaestusVulcanName] is often associated with blacksmiths, siege engines and weapons.

Several Hellenic gods are associated with earth and prosperity. [GetDemetraCeresName] oversees the harvest, [GetAphroditeVenusName] is associated with fertility, [GetHermesMercuryName] to roads and trading, and [GetHestiaVestaName], one of the most beloved Roman goddesses, to hearth and family.

Apollo takes a very prestigious spot in Hellenic mythology, being associated with reason, arts and medicine. His twin sister [GetArtemisDianaName] on the other hand tends to have humbler, more secretive followers, being associated with night and nature.
Religion now does NOT use [GetJizyaName] tax
Population of other religion groups pay the [GetJizyaName] tax
A Tax on the non-Muslim population, this tax is larger than the Zakat tax paid by Muslims and therefore increases the total tax income
A Tax on the non-[GetGroupName] population, it is larger than regular taxes paid by [GetGroupName] worshipers and therefore increases the total tax income
The sacred Imperial crown of representing absolute authority over the [e_byzantium.GetFullName].
The ancient crown of the Elected Emperor.

Reforming the [Player.Religion.GetName] faith will turn it into an organized religion. Unless you control all of the Holy Sites, doing so requires §Y50§! Moral Authority and control of §Y3§! [Player.Religion.GetName] holy sites. It will cost you §R750§! [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]. Reforming a religion allows a ruler to determine the Nature, Doctrines and Leadership of the new faith, entirely reshaping its dogma.
§GPrisoners of a different religion can be sacrificed for Piety§!
§GDiviners read the signs before war to try to improve troop morale§!
§GRulers can ask their subjects to 'Take the Vows' and disinherit them§!
§GReligious taxation of subjects of a different religious group is allowed§!
§GEnatic law is enforced§!\n§GFemale rulers are NOT penalized§!
Unfortunately, it appears that [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] has fallen gravely ill and is unable to perform is duties as host any longer.
My guest, [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName], has fallen gravely ill and was forced to return back home before the end of [sponsoring_king.GetHerHis] visit.
The signs are not as bad as the diviner says...
Foolish priest! This is actually a good omen!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a insufferable, weak-willed [From.GetManWoman], without any worthy accomplishment to [From.GetHerHis] name. It would be nothing more than my duty to make sure everyone knows of how pathetic [From.GetSheHe] is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent [From.GetHerHis] sycophants to torment me once more, spreading vile rumors about me. It looks like [From.GetSheHe] will not be satisfied until [From.GetSheHe] has dragged my name into the mud.

The Field of Mars is an area designated to parading and training troops, built nearby a city or outpost. This is where Legionnaires are taught how to maneuver and fight in formation, providing the backbone of the Roman military.
§YFull Cognatic Law§! and §YFull Status of Women§! are enforced throughout the realm.
This ruler was crowned by a minor prelate.\nA formal coronation is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [christian.GetGroupName] ruler.
This ruler was anointed by a notable member of the clergy.\nA formal coronation is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [christian.GetGroupName] ruler.
This ruler was anointed by the Vicar of [GetChristName] himself.\nThis is incontrovertible proof of [Root.GetHerHis] divine right to rule.
Now that I have found a [Root.Religion.GetName] priest willing to crown me, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.
All of your vassals' Opinion of you is lowered by §R-10§!.
Is NOT in Hiding, in Seclusion, out traveling, or otherwise occupied with important business\n
Is NOT in Hiding, in Seclusion, out traveling, or otherwise occupied with important business\n
On second thought, I think I will wait for now.
You will no longer be able to §YSway [From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the next §Y10§! years.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has recently rebuked §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s attentions in clear terms.
Perhaps it is time I asked [From.GetTitledFirstName] to spend some time with me. It is probably the fastest way for me to gain [From.GetHerHis] trust.

My dissertation on military matters was very appreciated it seems: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for sharing my knowledge with [From.GetHerHim], remarking that [From.GetSheHe] will treasure what [From.GetSheHe] has learned from me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my military dissertation was cold and disinterested. Whether [From.GetSheHe] is does not care about military matters, or [From.GetSheHe] doubts the validity of my suggestions, it is clear that [From.GetSheHe] was not impressed by my words.
I wish to know more about the [christian.GetGroupName] religions.
The words of [muslim.GetGroupName] theologians intrigue me...
I wonder about the god of the [jewish.GetName] people...
There are other religions that are more to my liking.
The mysteries of [zoroastrian_group.GetGroupName] faiths are intriguing.
I wish to follow some of the [indian_group.GetGroupName] principles.
§YRoman Culture§! will start spreading across your lands.
The glorious restorer of the Roman Empire, who brought Europe, Africa and Asia back under Imperial rule.
There is something about Pagans that intrigues me...
I long for the simplicity of the [pagan_group.GetName] worshipers.
was roasted in a Brazen Bull on the orders of $KILLER$
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has claimed that [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty shares blood with Phalaris, ancient Tyrant of Akragas, infamous for his use of the Brazen Bull against his enemies.
Can use the §YBrazen Bull§! to execute prisoners.

Following a recent reminder of the terrible fate that expects the enemies of this ruler, many in the court of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been dissuaded from acting against their ruthless liege. At least for the time being...

Since [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s gruesome execution, the most baffling rumor has been spreading throughout my realm. People around [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have come to believe that the traits I share with the old tyrant of Akragas are no mere coincidence, but rather the proof that I must be a descendant of the infamous Phalaris.\n\nIf I allow such rumors to keep spreading, my entire dynasty's reputation might be stained forever.
If the people cannot love me, they will learn to fear me.
Acknowledge the §YBrazen Bull§! as your family symbol.
I must stop this madness before it gets out of hand.
I was shocked to hear what fate [From.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

As I hear the delightful melody coming from my brazen bull as the screams of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are filtered through the contraption, I find myself reflecting upon how much I have come to rely on this wonderful instrument, and on how much I resemble the enlightened King of Sicily who employed it the first time...

After spending some time researching as well as discussing with a local blacksmith, I was able to submit [From.GetFirstName] to the most intriguing of tortures – a brazen bull. As the [From.GetManWoman] was cooked inside this wonderful contraption, [From.GetHerHis] screams were turned into a delightful and cautionary melody for all my court to hear...
I was shocked to hear what fate [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is pushed screaming and kicking inside the brazen bull in the middle of the throne room, under the silent watch of all my courtiers. The [From.GetManWoman]'s desperate shrieking as [From.GetSheHe] is roasted alive inside the contraption soon turns into harmonious bellowing.

The guards drag me out of the dungeon and to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s court. My hopes for freedom vanish quickly as I see the imposing figure of the brass bull staring at me from the middle of the hall, surrounded by fearful courtiers. The guards drag me towards the statue while the executioner starts stoking the fires beneath it.
Lock [Root.GetTitledFirstName] into the Brazen Bull and let [Root.GetHerHim] cook inside the monstrous contraption.
Your other §YVassals§! will be Intimidated (§G+10§! §YOpinion§!) by this action.
Let's try something more original this time...
Ugh, just throw them in the Brazen Bull...

Foul rumors are spreading from Sicily. The once prosperous Mediterranean isle has been fallen into the hands of a cruel [From.GetManWoman], who claims to be a descendant of the [pagan_group.GetName] Tyrants of old. 

Consumed by paranoid delusions and sadistic fantasies, [From.GetSheHe] has killed hundreds of [From.GetHerHis] own subjects for the most trivial of slights. 
Most of [From.GetHerHis] victims have met their end in the fiery belly of [From.GetHerHis] brazen bull, symbol of [From.GetHerHis] degenerate dynasty.
Will attract §YShips§! during times of war.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to lead my people against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient [pagan_group.GetName] Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to stand strong against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.
And why not? We have so much in common...
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has claimed that [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty shares blood with Teuta, the Pirate-Queen of the Illyrians who stood tragically against the Roman Empire of old.
Nonsense! I have nothing in common with her.

As if the humiliation for our recent defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not a price steep enough to pay for the Empire, more barbarians are gathering around the banner of our enemy, emboldened by the recent success of their brethren. Their leader has started to spread ludicrous rumors about her ancestral ties to Queen Teuta, another rebellious Queen of Illyria of bygone times. \nWe must clean the stain of this failure from our reputation before it is too late...

The [defeated_emperor.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has recently suffered an ignominious defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Galvanized by their victory, the people of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have started idolizing their [From.GetTitle], comparing [From.GetHerHim] to a ruler of their legends and claiming [From.GetHerHim] to have such a heroic ascendancy.\n Through her victory, the pagan tribes of old Illyria have discovered a new strength to stand against their Roman masters.
Enjoy your fleeting victory while you can!

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how I protected them from the Empire in the past, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] protected their forefathers from the Empire, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems my name still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems that the name of [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay me for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay my family for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A promising member of [invited_lodge_soldier.Society.GetName], [invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName], is eager to test [invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis] mettle in battle and prove [invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis] loyalty fighting by my side and leading my armies against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
Good! And I already know who to replace...
I expect great things from you, [invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName].
Request help from your fellow [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] warriors against your enemies.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §Y[finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! rulers to request troops in war becomes available.
A skilled §YCommander§! from [Root.Society.GetName] will arrive at your court.
A band of warriors will arrive at your capital.
Has NOT already requested help from §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! for the current campaign

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] will gladly come to the help of a fellow [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] warrior in the time of need, rushing out of their sacred forests to prove their mettle and fight against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
I need strong fighters to vanquish my foes!
I need staunch spear-men to defend my homeland!
I need swift riders to pursue my enemies!
Perhaps I do not need their assistance for now...
There are still semi-nomadic bands of warriors wandering in the wilderness of [Root.Capital.GetName], and their liege has decided to summon them to war.
Use your influence with [Root.Society.GetName] to gather any faithful fighters wandering in your realm.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §Y[tengri_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! rulers to speed recruitment across the realm.
You will receive a boost in §YPopulation§! and §YManpower§!
You will receive a boost in §YLevy Reinforcement§! rate

With the galvanizing presence of [Root.Society.GetName] to lead my troops, scores of new recruits are riding to [Root.Capital.GetName], abandoning their lives as shepherds to become warriors and earn immortal glory by fighting for me.

The fervor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] runs still through the veins of the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. When called to action, they rush to their family weapons and ride to my banner, ready to show once more the strength and ruthlessness of their ancestors to all those who oppose us.
With the help of [Root.Society.GetName] and their mystics, you can achieve an otherworldly level of strength and clarity of intent, for a short period of time.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §Y[zun_pagan.GetName]§! rulers to enter a battle trance for a limited time, increasing their military skills.
Has NOT recently entered a Battle Trance
Augment your §YMilitary§! skills for a limited amount of time, at the cost of your §YHealth§!.
As the [zun_pagan.GetName] mystics surround me, preparing my body and mind for the ritual, one of them asks me what do I wish to do with the power bestowed to me by [zun_pagan.GetHighGodName].
I wish to lead my troops to victory!
I wish to vanquish my enemies!
I wish to inspire my warriors to greatness!
On second thought, maybe this was a bad idea...
This character has made use of the ancient mystical knowledge of the Sun-worshipers to temporarily increase [Root.GetHerHis] military prowess.
This character has made use of the ancient mystical knowledge of the Sun-worshipers to temporarily increase [Root.GetHerHis] military prowess.
This character has made use of the ancient mystical knowledge of the Sun-worshipers to temporarily increase [Root.GetHerHis] military prowess.
Ask for help from [Root.Society.GetName], hoping one of their warriors will assemble a band of mercenaries to aid you in your war.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §Y[slavic_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! rulers to request help from the Warrior Lodge when waging a war.
Has NOT already requested help from §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!
A member of the Lodge is willing to assist you
A member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! will assemble an §YArmy§! at your capital.

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] have heeded my call to action. [scoped_slavic_savior.GetTitledFirstName], a valiant follower of [scoped_slavic_savior.Religion.GetRandomGodName], has assembled a host of warriors to aid me in the ongoing war.
Welcome! I am glad to meet you!

[scoped_slavic_savior.GetFirstName] has been working restlessly to aid [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] win the war since [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHis] arrival. I must admit I have grown really fond of [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] in the past few days...
But does [scoped_slavic_savior.GetSheHe] love me back, I wonder?
I cannot distract [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] with this nonsense right now.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has grown really fond of me since I joined [From.GetHerHis] campaign. It has come to the point where [From.GetSheHe] flat out admitted [From.GetHerHis] love for me openly.
You are not really my type.
I was happy to discover that [From.GetFirstName] shares my feeling for [From.GetHerHim]. Now that we are together, nothing will be able to stop us!
Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] admitted that [From.GetSheHe] does not shares my feelings for [From.GetHerHim].

[scoped_slavic_savior.GetFirstName] has been working restlessly to aid [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] win the war since [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHis] arrival. I could certainly use more fighters like [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] in my court...
Still, I shouldn't be too careless trusting a stranger...
Use the resources and expertise of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! to improve the fortifications of this province.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a holding for §Y[baltic_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! rulers to request help from the Warrior Lodge to fortify their §YCastle§! and §YTribal§! holdings.
The local infrastructure supports the construction of an §YEarth Hillfort§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a §YWooden Hillfort§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a §YReinforced Hillfort§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a §YStone Hillfort§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a §YWall and Ditch§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of §YCamouflaged Outposts§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of §YLayered Palisades§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of §YStone Watchtowers§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a row of §YCastle Walls§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a new row of §YCastle Walls§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a new row of §YCastle Walls§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a new row of §YCastle Walls§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of a new row of §YCastle Walls§!
The local infrastructure supports the construction of §YCastle Fortifications§!
The local infrastructure supports the improvement of the §YCastle Fortifications§!
The local infrastructure supports the improvement of the §YCastle Fortifications§!
The local infrastructure supports the improvement of the §YCastle Fortifications§!
The local infrastructure supports the improvement of the §YCastle Fortifications§!
Old wounds have left this character visibly scarred.
This character has seen [Root.GetHerHis] share of fights, as [Root.GetHerHis] face can attest.
Let my TRUE nature be revealed for all to see!
The frightful appearance of the Antichrist will become apparent to all.
This character has abandoned all pretenses of humanity and revealed [Root.GetHerHis] true nature.
With the wicked ruler having been dealt with, the Pope has finally accepted to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.
This warrior has offered wealth and food to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
This warrior has offered a prized specimen from [Root.GetHerHis] livestock to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
This warrior has offered the life of one of [Root.GetHerHis] servants to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
This warrior has offered the life of one of [Root.GetHerHis] own family members to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
Perform a ritual sacrifice to the patron deities of [Root.Society.GetName] to strengthen your resolve in battle.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to sacrifice wealth and blood to the divine patrons of the Lodge in exchange for prowess in battle.
Has NOT performed a §YWar Sacrifice§! in the past §Y10§! years
Perform a sacrifice to receive the favor of the gods.

I must show my devotion to the divine patrons of my Lodge if I wish for them to favor me in battle. The greater my sacrifice the greater will be the reward that the old gods will grant me in the wars to come.

Although I follow the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], giving to the old gods their due might help me in the coming wars. Their violent nature well fits my need for fierceness and savagery.
I will immolate my own flesh and blood to please you!
I will sacrifice one of my people to the old gods.
I will immolate one of the most prized specimens from my livestock.
I will immolate some of my best horses.
I will offer food and gold to satisfy your whims.

Two warriors from the Lodge carry [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] outside, ignoring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] kicking and screaming. While the priests prepare me for the ritual by inscribing holy signs under my skin, the offering is brought to the tallest tree we can find and hanged from its strongest branch. We then start chanting hymns to the old gods under the twitching shadow of [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName].

We ride for a few hours in the wilderness, leaving all signs of civilization behind us. Once we are alone, a pair of fellow warriors tie [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] on the ground and I repeatedly trample [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] with my horse while the priests beat their drums and chant around us. Once the offering has been made, the warriors paint my face and invoke the spirits' powers to protect me.

After leading [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] in the woods, a few warriors and I start stalking [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], our faces painted and our bodies covered in pelts. We run after our prey, howling the gods' names and throwing rocks at [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim]. In the end, after having surrounded [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], we tear [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] apart, offering [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] flesh to the gods.

Under the maddening beating of the shamans' drums, the warriors bring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] forward. I approach [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], my face inscribed with the sacred symbols, and carve a long cut through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] throat, grabbing [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] by the head and showering the Lodge's totem with [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] blood.

[scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] is driven by my fellow warriors to the top of the temple while the priests chant praises to the Sun and cover my face in golden dust. When the victim is brought to my feet, I plunge my blade through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] chest and carve out [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] heart, offering it to the eternal aster

We meet in a secluded grove, a few warriors carrying my offering to the gods and a priest bringing all the sacred tools to officiate the rite. [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] is stripped naked and cleaned. The warriors then bring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] whimpering to my feet, and I plunge my blade through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] neck, pushing it all the way to [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] beating heart.

Two warriors from the Lodge carry [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] outside, ignoring [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] kicking and screaming. While the priests prepare me for the ritual by inscribing holy signs under my skin, the offering is brought to the tallest tree we can find and hanged from its strongest branch. We then start chanting hymns to the old gods under the twitching shadow of [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName].

We ride for a few hours in the wilderness, leaving all signs of civilization behind us. Once we are alone, a pair of fellow warriors tie [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] on the ground and I repeatedly trample [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] with my horse while the priests beat their drums and chant around us. Once the offering has been made, the warriors paint my face and invoke the spirits' powers to protect me.

After leading [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] in the woods, a few warriors and I start stalking [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim], our faces painted and our bodies covered in pelts. We run after our prey, howling the gods' names and throwing rocks at [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim]. In the end, after having surrounded [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim], we tear [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] apart, offering [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] flesh to the gods.

Under the maddening beating of the shamans' drums, the warriors bring [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] forward. I approach [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim], my face inscribed with the sacred symbols, and carve a long cut through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] throat, grabbing [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] by the head and showering the Lodge's totem with [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] blood.

[sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] is driven by my fellow warriors to the top of the temple while the priests chant praises to the Sun and cover my face in golden dust. When the victim is brought to my feet, I plunge my blade through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] chest and carve out [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] heart, offering it to the eternal aster.

We meet in a secluded grove, a few warriors carrying my offering to the gods and a priest bringing all the sacred tools to officiate the rite. [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] is stripped naked and cleaned. The warriors then bring [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] whimpering to my feet, and I plunge my blade through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] neck, pushing it all the way to [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] beating heart.

A couple of fellow warriors help me constrain the majestic offering that I have personally picked from my livestock for this occasion. While a a priest chants, I plunge the sacrificial dagger deep into the beast's flesh, letting its blood shower over my face. I turn around and the priests inscribe a few holy symbols on my face with blood and dirt.
May this sacrifice bring me fortune!

My fellow warriors accompany me into the wilderness, helping me to carry my generous offering to the gods. When we are far from civilization, we bury the gold and burn the food. While a priest chants, invoking the protectors of the Lodge to bestow me their power, one of my fellow warriors inscribes a few symbols on my face.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has organized several outstanding athletes and gladiators under [From.GetHerHis] employ to form the brotherhood of the Olympian Champions, a society dedicated to the pursuit of excellence through physical labor.\nAlthough this society is based for the most part on Hellenic principles, its doors are open to any barbarian that shows [From.GetHerHis] willingness to learn discipline and follow the teachings of the school's masters.

The Olympian Champions train hard and maintain an expert physique, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport – participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
Establish the §YWarrior Society§! of the §YOlympian Champions§!

As a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!, you can choose to raise your banner and call forth all willing fighters of your Lodge to join you in your current war, receiving regular reinforcements for as long as you are in command of your armies.

Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait to temporarily unlock special battle tactics for your character and receive reinforcement troops from your Warrior Lodge for as long as your character is leading troops. Tactics and composition of the troops will depend on the §YSociety§! you are part of. Once peace is established, the regiments will take their leave.
Ask your fellow warriors to join the fight.

This ruler is making use of [Root.GetHerHis] considerable influence to call fresh reinforcements from [Root.GetHerHis] Warrior Lodge in order to aid [Root.GetHerHim] in battle for as long as [Root.GetSheHe] is in command of [Root.GetHerHis] troops.
The valor and relentlessness of their liege has pushed many peasants to arm themselves against the enemies of the realm.

With the help of [Root.Society.GetName], this battle is ours to lose! Already my fellow fighters are rallying from all over the realm, ready to show me their bravery in battle. In but a few months, we will drown our enemies in steel and blood!
Come, my friends! Eternal glory awaits the bravest among us!
New, eager fighters have joined me at §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! to earn their glory by my side.

Reinforcements from [Root.Society.GetName] have been dwindling since a few weeks. The promise of eternal glory does no longer yield enough attraction to the remaining members of the Lodge. Perhaps some need another kind of persuasion...
§YReinforcements§! will resume for a while longer.
You will no longer receive more §YReinforcements§! until the end of the war.
What kind of warriors are you?!
I will share my loot with any who wish to join me!
I need no cowards in my army.

Some of the more undisciplined elements within my new troops have started to complain that I do not share the loot from our battles equally. They are demanding for what they consider their rightful compensation, threatening to leave my army if their request is denied.
Begone then! I have no need of you!
The valor I have shown in battle has not inspired just seasoned warriors. Many of my subjects have traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName], hoping to prove their worth against my enemies.
I will have them trained in no time!
Your bravery moves me, but this is not your fight.
Wonderful! You will soon meet your opponents!
You can help with the supply lines.
Some of your new recruits will disband.
Religion forbids men to hold Temple Holdings
Perhaps this was not a good idea...
Your §YSubjects§! might not react well to your actions.
Enlist the help of the Lodge's shamans to imbue a precious artifact with a warrior spirit that will increase your prowess on the field of battle.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §Y[west_african_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! rulers to create special masks and idols that increase their prowess in battle.
Is NOT already supervising the creation of a fetish
Does NOT already own a Mask and an Idol
A majestic war mask carved from a most precious wood and imbued with the essence of a brave and benevolent spirit.
A majestic war mask carved from a most precious wood and imbued with the essence of a violent and frightening spirit.
A totemic war mask carved from rare wood and imbued with the essence of a stubborn and unyielding spirit.
A totemic war mask carved from rare wood and imbued with the essence of a cruel and ravenous spirit.
A totemic war mask carved from rare wood and imbued with the essence of the essence of a trickster.
A totemic war mask carved from simple wood and imbued with the essence of a wrathful and restless spirit.
A totemic war mask carved from simple wood and imbued with the essence of a brave and stubborn spirit.
A totemic war mask carved from simple wood and imbued with the essence of an ethereal and fleeting spirit.
A priceless totem representing the guardian spirit of a notable tribe, favored by the gods of war.
A priceless idol representing the guardian spirit of a notable tribe, favored by the gods of war.
A wooden tube filled with small pebbles and enchanted with ancient spirit-magic.
The shamans from [Root.Society.GetName] quickly explain to me how, before deciding what kind of spirit I wish to trap, we must determine what sort of fetish I am trying to create...

The shamans of [Root.Society.GetName] have completed the preliminary work for my spirit-mask. Before moving onto the sacred carving, they need to know how much am I willing to invest in the creation of this artifact. A mask carved from rarer woods and imbued with sacred oils will be capable to channel more powerful spirits.
The shamans will carve a §YGreat Spirit-Mask§!
This is as much as I am willing to spend...
The shamans will carve a §YRegular Spirit-Mask§!
What is wrong with regular wood?
The shamans will carve a §YSimple Spirit-Mask§!

The shamans of [Root.Society.GetName] have completed the preliminary work for my idol. The only thing that I have left to tell them is what sort of spirit do I wish to curry the favor of and how much I am willing to invest in the rare resources needed to craft the artifact.
A priced totem to channel the cunning of a Trickster!
The shamans will craft a §YCarved Totem§! containing the essence of a Trickster, which will increase the speed and unpredictability of your warriors.
An ivory idol to channel the resolve of a Howler!
The shamans will craft an §YIvory Idol§! containing a howling spirit which will fill you with strength and rage towards the enemies of your tribe.
A wooden rod will do fine.
The shamans will craft a §YRainstick§! that will help you adapt the battlefield to your needs.

My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a powerful spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me with the strength and determination I need to crush my enemies.
I wish you to summon a benevolent spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Bravery§! that will inspire your troops, increasing their defensive capabilities.
I wish you to summon a malevolent spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Terror§! that will scare your enemies and fill your troops with a thirst for blood.

My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me with the strength and determination I need to defeat my enemies.
I wish you to summon a brave spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Determination§! that will increase the defensive capabilities of your troops and make them relentless when assaulting enemy strongholds.
I wish you to summon a ruthless spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Ruthlessness§! that will fill your troops with a thirst for blood.
I wish you to summon a Trickster.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Trickery§! that will give your armies an unpredictable edge on the field.
My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me a bit more strength and determination.
I wish you to summon a resentful spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Anger§! that will fill your troops with a thirst for blood.
I wish you to summon an unwavering spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Staunchness§! that will increase the defensive capabilities of your troops.
I wish you to summon a fleeting spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Flight§! that will grant your armies uncanny speed on the battlefield.

As the last symbols are painted upon the carved surface of the totem, the shamans sings their spells around it, binding the Trickster spirit inside the sacred wood, so that it might serve me and my descendants for generations to come.
This spirit will protect the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] tribe from now on.

I spend the entire night awake, tormented by the yells of the shamans chanting their spells to entrap a spirit in my new idol. At dawn, the tired old men present me with the ivory artifact, now imbued with its vengeful new guest. The shamans assure me that I will be able to turn the power inside it against my enemies and that the spirit will faithfully serve all of my descendants.

After giving me my new magic staff, the shamans take some time to explain to me how I will be able to summon winds and rain and control the very heavens by properly channeling the powers contained within this precious artifact.
Is it supposed to make all this noise?

As some of the shamans paint the final symbols on the large wooden mask, the smoke of the many offerings fills the air and the magic chants resonate through the field, the spirit is bound to the artifact, imbuing it with arcane power. The shamans offer me the mask, assuring me that I will be able to make use of its magic by wearing it in battle.
Your §YMask of Bravery§! is finally ready.

As some of the shamans paint the final symbols on the large wooden mask, the smoke of the many offerings fills the air and the magic chants resonate through the field, the spirit is bound to the artifact, imbuing it with arcane power. The shamans offer me the mask, assuring me that I will be able to make use of its magic by wearing it in battle.
Let my foes tremble at my sight!
Your §YMask of Terror§! is finally ready.

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
My family will treasure this gift forever.
Your §YMask of Determination§! is finally ready.

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
My enemies will learn to fear the blood of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
Your §YMask of Ruthlessness§! is finally ready.

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
Your §YMask of Trickery§! is finally ready.

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
Your §YMask of Anger§! is finally ready.

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
I already feel its energy coursing through my veins!
Your §YMask of Staunchness§! is finally ready.

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
Your §YMask of Flight§! is finally ready.
Leadership can only be changed when reforming a Pagan religion.
§GThe Pope is the Hierocratic Head of this religion§!
§YThere is no Religious Head§!\n§RNo Great Holy Wars can be started§!
§YThere is no Religious Head§!\n§RNo Great Holy Wars can be started§!\n§RRulers cannot declare Holy Wars§!
§GThe Caliph is the Temporal Head of this religion\nThe Religious Head can call for Jihads§!
§GThe Kohen Gadol is the Hierocratic Head of this religion§!\n§YThe Kohen Gadol needs to be restored through decision§!\n§GThe Religious Head can call for Great Holy Wars§!
§GThe Moabadan-Moabad is the Hierocratic Head of this religion§!\n§YThe Moabadan-Moabad needs to be restored through decision§!\n§GThe Religious Head can call for Great Holy Wars§!

§YThis religion has not yet been reformed
Because this religion is unreformed, there is no religious head
Because this religion is unreformed, it is weak at conversion
Because this religion is unreformed, rulers only have access to 'Gavelkind' and 'Elective Gavelkind' succession laws§!
§GThe Religious Head can grant Invasions\nThe Religious Head can grant Claims§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to gather artifacts to put in [GetHerHis] empty treasury.
To complete the ambition you need to amass three artifacts of sufficient quality for your treasury
Has three artifacts of at least §YQuality 2§! in the Treasury
To complete the ambition you need to make a friend.
This character has recently proven themselves to be quite popular.
Generates several great Bloodlines across the world.
Generates a number of special artifacts, spread across the world.
This sword is said to have fallen from the very planet it is named after.
This sword is said to have fallen from the very planet it is named after.
A blade cursed by the taint of its namesake, an unholy but effective weapon.
This sword was said to been sent down from heaven to help the fight against the unbelievers.
This sword is said to have defended the city of its namesake a thousand times and will defend it a thousand times more.
This blade was said to have belonged to an adherent who lost their way.
The Holiest blade, a shining example of this faiths righteousness.
This armor is said to be made from metal that fell from the very planet it is named after.
This armor is said to be made from metal that fell from the very planet it is named after.
This armor was made in the very image of its namesake and is thus frightening to behold.
This armor is apparently a gift from above, blessed by the almighty, the shining plates setting it apart from normal mortal armor.
This armor is the most famous example of this cultures craftsmanship, the resources put into alone make it near priceless.
This armor is styled after the beast it is named for. The helmet in particular is very impressive.
This rare and priceless book tells the story of an inventor who spent all their time trying to make the perfect boardgame. Of course they went insane in the attempt.
Inside this magnificent box sits the preserved heart of an ancient beast, or at least of some beast.
Inside this magnificent box sits the preserved heart of an ancient beast, or at least of some beast.
The vial kept in this sturdy box supposedly contains the blood of some ancient beast. Even simply being near it is meant to have regenerative powers.
The vial kept in this sturdy box supposedly contains the blood of some ancient beast. Even simply being near it is meant to have regenerative powers.
This eye is said to have belonged to an ancient and powerful beast, plucked out of its head by the hero who slayed it.
This eye is said to have belonged to an ancient and powerful beast, plucked out of its head by the hero who slayed it.
This fine and richly-decorated blade is one of the Prophet's nine swords: Al-'Abd, Al-Ma'thur, Al-Rasub, Al-Battar, Hatf, Qal'i, Dhu al-Faqar, Al-Mikhdham, and Al-Qadib.

The heavens briefly lit up and the ground shook as the rock from the sky crashed into the castle gardens. I sent my men to investigate and they came back with a lump of a curious metal we have not seen before.
This metal will make for a truly legendary blade!
This was a gift from [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. It should go to the church.
It's just metal. Sell it, and do it quickly.
You set your smiths to work on forging a weapon from the metal.
A sword made of metal that fell from the sky. Some say it is a gift from God.

It has been a few weeks since the great rock from the sky landed in my gardens, and the weapon that I ordered forged from the metal is complete. I look upon the sword with wonder – all the way from the heavens and now in my hand!
This is truly a glorious weapon.
These barren wastes are very sparsely populated.
Settles Iceland with many proper [Root.Culture.GetName] families

[Root.Culture.GetName] explorers have found a new land across the sea that they have dubbed 'Iceland'. Despite its name, it appears ripe for settlement. I should invest in ships to send settlers over there before another [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle] has the same idea!

Iceland, despite its ominous name, has proven to be quite fertile. Up until this point only a few hermits inhabited the island, though this is no longer the case. Many [settler_of_iceland_target.Culture.GetName] settlers are now flocking to its coasts, sponsored with ships and building materials by [settler_of_iceland_target.GetFullName], in search of a new life. [left_iceland_target.GetFullName] and [left_iceland_target.GetHerHis] followers have left the island in disgust, returning south to their ancestral homes.
§GFollowers of this religion gain +2 base Learning§!
Today in the market, I watched as a poor beggar took his bowl full of coins and went straight into the tavern to buy drink. Perhaps mankind is unlovable after all.
It does not make sense, but I must try to accept it.

Rejecting what they believe to be propaganda from [GetRandomEvilGodName], followers of the [GetName] faith ignore the word of the [GetPriestTitle]s. When hearing any passage from [GetScriptureName] read out loud, they instantly stuff their ears with parsley which each follower keeps with them in a sacred pouch. In honor of [GetHighGodName], every meal during religious holidays is prepared with abundant quantities of parsley.

Followers of the [GetName] religion hold the belief that every third passage of [GetScriptureName] is written by [GetRandomEvilGodName], much to the dismay of adherents to the parent religion. Fanatics often write down the offending passages on rocks, which they subsequently throw at the houses of those they perceive to be heretics or heathens.

Cold nights are cherished by followers of the [GetName] religion, who hold the belief that the touch of [GetHighGodName] is as icy as the deepest winter. As [GetScriptureName] makes no mention of this, [GetPriestTitle]s of their parent faith deem such rituals heretical and inspired by the gospel of [GetRandomEvilGodName].

The [GetPriestTitle]s of the [GetName] faith argue that their way of worship is not only the correct way, but also much older than that of more traditional believers. For millenia the [GetName] faith thrived, until a tiny sect of lunatics broke away to form new branches of the religion – or so [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s claim. A defining feature of the faith is that the private lives of [GetPriestTitle]s must remain completely secret, which often see them wearing disguises when not tending to their flocks.

The [GetName] faith believes that [GetScriptureName] should be available to all, and not just for the [GetPriestTitle]s to interpret. They therefore produce numerous copies of [GetScriptureName], localized into several languages. Many of these copies hold changes introduced by less than scrupulous [GetPriestTitle]s, which is a contributing reason to [GetName] followers being seen as heretical.

Followers of the [GetName] faith share many similarities between themselves and those of their parent faith. In fact, [GetPriestTitle]s from both sides have been unable to find a single practical difference between the two sects – they both hold [GetScriptureName] in high regard, praise [GetHighGodName] in the correct way and fear the retribution of [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Still, followers of the [GetName] faith claim themselves to be heretics, and ardently so.

The [GetPriestTitle]s of the [GetName] religion often openly preach in the street and in public buildings, and are often ridiculed and spat on by those who do not ascribe to their somewhat ridiculous interpretation of [GetScriptureName]. In the minds of [GetName] worshipers, the text of [GetScriptureName] needs to be simplified to such a degree that a child could understand all of it, and they often rewrite the various passages to be comprehensible for even the most simple-minded person – something which obviously draws the ire of the more hard-line worshipers.

The [GetName] faith incorporates many elements of other religions. Several rites outlined in the [hindu.GetName] holy text ([hindu.GetScriptureName]) are part of everyday worship, and the behaviours of [jain.GetName] [jain.GetPriestTitle]s are emulated by [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s. While their own holy text, [GetScriptureName], is still held in the highest regard, a lot of emphasis is put on the necessity for [GetPriestTitle]s to interpret other holy texts.

Those who adhere to the [GetName] faith believe that an eternal war is being waged between [GetHighGodName] and all the gods and goddesses of other religions. Followers actively support this war by carving idols of all the foreign gods, which they subsequently burn in ritualistic bonfires.

[GetScriptureName] can be interpreted in many different ways, or so the [GetName] faithful claim. Their [GetPriestTitle]s make many bold claims, and they often conflict – one [GetPriestTitle] might claim [GetHighGodName] to be warlike one day, while another [GetPriestTitle] claims [GetHighGodName] to be championing peace the next. Their [GetPriestTitle]s often gather in grand cabals to discuss which interpretation is the right one, which leads followers of their parent religion to often accuse them of being witches or warlocks.

The [GetName] faith is an offshoot branch with a radically different interpretation of [GetScriptureName]. Their [GetPriestTitle]s constantly debate the validity of various passages, drawing much ire from the mainstream followers. In their interpretation of the scripture, [GetHighGodName] is overtly warlike and unsympathetic, but their practices are otherwise very similar to those of the main branch.

The religious leadership of the [GetName] faith forbid anyone from reading [GetScriptureName], even themselves. They believe the texts to simply be too sacred for anyone to see – instead the [GetPriestTitle]s themselves dictate what adherents should and should not do. Their [GetPriestTitle]s also claim that anyone not following their commands will have their souls eaten by [GetRandomEvilGodName] as they die.

In the [GetName] faith followers not only adhere to the teachings of [GetScriptureName], but also look to other religions for guidance. Alongside their own scripture, they also read passages from the holy texts of the [norse_pagan.GetName] and [buddhist.GetName] faiths. This practice condemn the [GetName] faithful in the eyes of many [GetPriestTitle]s.

Followers of the [GetName] faith act and behave much like the adherents of their parent religion, though with one major difference. All religious practices are performed in reverse order, as they believe the chronology of [GetScriptureName] to have been tampered with by [GetRandomEvilGodName].

The [GetName] faith is an ultra-orthodox branch of fanatical zealots. Adherents do not tolerate any deviance from the word of [GetScriptureName], subscribing to a very literal interpretation rather than the more relaxed one of their peers. They believe this to be the only way to truly please [GetHighGodName].

For followers of the [GetName] faith, the number ten is of paramount importance. Rituals are always performed by ten [GetPriestTitle]s, every sermon touches upon ten passages from [GetScriptureName] and truly ardent worshipers pray to [GetHighGodName] ten times per day. They also believe that [GetRandomEvilGodName] is, in fact, ten separate entities.

Generally, followers of the [GetName] faith are much more relaxed about their rites and methods of worship than the followers of the orthodox branch. Their [GetPriestTitle]s claim that the battle against [GetRandomEvilGodName] is already lost, and that there is no path to salvation. This nihilistic outlook cause many followers to take the name of [GetHighGodName] in vain, which angers more devout worshipers.

Unlike the main branch, worshipers of the [GetName] faith do not believe [GetScriptureName] hold the absolute truth. Followers prefer oral traditions, where [GetPriestTitle]s travel far and wide in order to share their wisdom with other [GetPriestTitle]s.

The [GetName] faith, unlike its parent faith, has a very strict caste hierarchy pertaining [GetPriestTitle]s. Internally, [GetPriestTitle]s are organized into five separate ranks, each owing full loyalty to their superiors. Their flocks are also organized into five separate groupings, with the recent converts and cynical worshipers being tended to by the lowest-ranking [GetPriestTitle]s.

Followers of the [GetName] faith are deemed cursed by adherents of their parent faith. The reason for why this belief is so ingrained and unshakable has been lost to time. The most common claim is that they are spawn of [GetRandomEvilGodName], who spit on [GetScriptureName]. Adherents of the [GetName] faith do not ascribe to this interpretation, as they themselves believe spit to be a blessed tool provided by [GetHighGodName].

The [GetName] faith is as old as the world itself. Their deity, known only as [GetHighGodName], is said to have created the world for the [GetName] faithful to live and thrive in, by condition that they follow the rules set in [GetScriptureName]. [GetScriptureName] was passed directly from [GetHighGodName] to the first [GetName] prophet. Followers also believe that [GetRandomEvilGodName], and an army of dreaded heretics and heathens, seek to undo the entirety of creation and doom the [GetName] faithful to eternal darkness.

In the [GetName] religion [GetScriptureName] tells the story of [GetHighGodName] whose arm was cruelly cut off by [GetRandomEvilGodName] – the pieces of their arm became the land and their blood the sea, creating the world as we know it. Their [GetPriestTitle]s sometimes cut off parts of their own body in an attempt to be closer to [GetHighGodName].

Eons ago, all creatures were united on a single land that spanned infinitely towards the horizons. They lived under a soft light that allowed the lushest grass and the sweetest of fruit to grow. But one day, for reasons and from origins unfathomable by mere mortals, [GetRandomEvilGodName] arrived and shook the very essence of the universe, splitting the lands, scorching the earth and disuniting mortals. Nearly everything was consumed by the infinite darkness still visible at night, except for the land miraculously protected by [GetHighGodName]. The faithful have recorded the history of the world in [GetScriptureName], so they may never forget that they owe their very existence to the benevolence and power of [GetHighGodName].

In the [GetName] faith it is believed that this is the eighteenth cycle that the World has gone through. In every cycle, [GetHighGodName], protector of Life and Light, fiercely battles [GetRandomEvilGodName], feeding on Death and Darkness. As stated in [GetScriptureName], the only way to prevent [GetRandomEvilGodName] from destroying the universe and starting another cycle, is to grant [GetHighGodName] energy through specific rituals, such as always having three candles lit during moonless nights, or celebrating with family every day before, and after, a full moon.

According to [GetScriptureName], when a person dies, their soul becomes ripe for the taking by the Reapers who will bring it to [GetRandomEvilGodName], who will then devour and assimilate them, to quench an insatiable hunger that has lasted since the dawn of time. Only burying the bodies can protect the souls and allow them to safely travel down to the Underworld, the realm of [GetHighGodName], allowing them to come back to earth as guardian spirits who help their descendants and fend off the Reapers.

The [GetPriestTitle]s tell of a time immemorial, when gods and mortals lived together on Earth – the latter as slaves and playthings to the first. After many sunsets, one mortal had enough of this servitude and rose against the foul gods, driving the billions of other mortals to stand with him in a fight for their freedom. In the end, the gods were driven out, repelled to the far confines of the universe, where their remains amalgamated through rage and vengeance, into what we now call [GetRandomEvilGodName]. The rebellious mortal himself was drenched in divine blood, becoming [GetHighGodName], a godlike entity, as strong as the will of all mortals on Earth. In the well protected [GetScriptureName], it says that the remnants of the evil gods draw closer to their lost realm every time a mortal indulges in corruption or decadent behavior, and that only bravery and willpower can wake [GetHighGodName] to protect reality from certain doom.

The [GetName] faith started a long time ago, when a hunter in a now forgotten forest followed a purple feathered bird with large wings to a glade in the heart of the woods. There [GetScriptureName] lay between five trees with golden leaves. The scripture recounted how this forest was the resting place of [GetHighGodName], an entity that had created the world at the cost of its life, after confronting [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Since then, the [GetPriestTitle]s have spread the word in gratitude of [GetHighGodName], to whom they show respect by venerating nature and by burying their dead along with the branch of a tree, allowing them to reunite with their creator.

The [GetName] faith is a rather recent one, founded by the charismatic first [GetPriestTitle], who detailed in length how human beings need to follow certain strict rules of life recorded in [GetScriptureName], lest they be forever doomed to suffer eternal pain at the hands of [GetRandomEvilGodName]. As he drew close to death, the [GetPriestTitle] warned that his good followers were still at risk, due to the numerous masses of wicked heathens performing decadent rituals and increasing [GetRandomEvilGodName]'s influence. The only way he could help protect them was by discarding his mortal coil and ascend to a new form – thus he became [GetHighGodName].

The [GetName] faith is one founded upon fear – their clergy hold terrifying masses, where they recite passages from [GetScriptureName] telling of how [GetRandomEvilGodName] will crack the world open like an egg. Despite followers constantly fearing for their souls, they find brief solace in the stories told about their main deity, [GetHighGodName]. These stories are not often told, and only the most brave [GetPriestTitle]s dare recite them in public.

It is said that the first [GetPriestTitle] was the patriarch of a small tribe who lived on boats out on the endless sea. One day, all the fish in the ocean vanished – eaten by [GetRandomEvilGodName]! Just as the small tribe was on the brink of starvation, [GetHighGodName] appeared before them. The first [GetPriestTitle] pleaded to [GetHighGodName] for salvation, and [GetHighGodName] in response created the land, the trees and all the animals of the forests so that the tribe would not starve. Grateful, the first [GetPriestTitle] created [GetScriptureName] to record all the divine things that [GetHighGodName] had created.

The [GetName] religion is focused upon the practice of ritualistic hunts. All their holidays involve hunts in one form or another, with various quarry being the target of each one. In their religion [GetHighGodName] is a great hunter, and [GetRandomEvilGodName] the prey. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], detail exactly how each hunt should be performed in meticulous detail.

The [GetName] faith has a particular focus on funerary rites. When an elder dies, they are flayed and their skin fashioned into a religious object such as the cover of a book or a ceremonial mask. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], tells the story of [GetHighGodName], flayed and buried a hundred times by [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Funerals are always led by at least two [GetPriestTitle]s, one who performs the flaying and one who ensures everything is done to code.

The [GetName] faith is one based largely upon the sense of touch, with adherents locking hands and holding each others shoulders during prayers. Worshipers frequently embrace the [GetPriestTitle]s both before and after a religious ceremony. To bless someone, a [GetPriestTitle] must embrace and lift the chosen one towards the sky – so that [GetHighGodName] may reach down and touch their souls. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], outlines the jealousy borne by the main enemy of [GetHighGodName] – [GetRandomEvilGodName], the one who must not be touched.

Temples belonging to the [GetName] faith are a spectacle to behold – covered from top to bottom in elaborate wooden carvings, every one of them looks like a work of art. It is said that a woodcarver once started to carve a face into a stump, but was interrupted halfway through. He then started carving a new face into another stump, and when he was finished it sprung to life in the form of [GetHighGodName]. The woodcarver was blessed by [GetHighGodName], and given [GetScriptureName] to keep safe. The half-carved stump he had previously abandoned then sprung to life in the form of [GetRandomEvilGodName], who proceeded to chase the carver out of the forest.

Adherents of the [GetName] faith reject the notion of individuality, believing instead that all are joined in one grand consciousness. In the center of this collective mind lies [GetHighGodName], sleeping. Stories in [GetScriptureName] claim that only [GetRandomEvilGodName] can awaken [GetHighGodName]. [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s therefore organize a search every year, with an ultimate goal to locate the cave in which [GetRandomEvilGodName] resides.

The [GetName] faithful do not believe this world to be the 'true' world. Their [GetPriestTitle]s say that it is but a shadow of the real world – a world which can only be accessed by pleasing [GetHighGodName]s every command. The rules that must be followed are outlined in [GetScriptureName], with [GetPriestTitle]s standing constant guard over where the texts are kept. They believe that [GetRandomEvilGodName] is always watching, ready to corrupt the texts as soon as they are left out of sight.

In the [GetName] faith ceremonial dance is seen as the most important aspect of worship. Both men and women meet together to dance, preceded by a host of [GetPriestTitle]s. Song and music are always present, and the sung texts are often directly quoted from [GetScriptureName]. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], tells the story of the great love between [GetHighGodName] and [GetRandomEvilGodName]. It is said that before their falling out, [GetHighGodName] and [GetRandomEvilGodName] danced together constantly. As they left each others side, night and day was created.

Those practicing the [GetName] faith spend a lot of time deep in thought, and their [GetPriestTitle]s spend almost all their lives in contemplation. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], contains limitless dates and countless numbers of importance, all telling their own story of the future of the world. Interpreting these numbers is a complex task, and new connections are made almost every year. It is said that the truth has been hidden behind complex formulas by [GetHighGodName]. This truth hides the secret to not being ripped apart for eternity by [GetRandomEvilGodName] in the afterlife.

The [GetName] faith was founded when the first [GetPriestTitle] got a revelation from [GetHighGodName]. By using her own blood, the [GetPriestTitle] penned [GetScriptureName] and passed it on to her followers. Since then, many other [GetPriestTitle]s have had revelations, though all of them about [GetRandomEvilGodName] and how the world will end.

The foundation of the [GetName] faith is shrouded in mystery, and [GetScriptureName] does not make mention of their origins. Followers argue that the [GetName] faith has always existed, and that anyone claiming otherwise is an agent of [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Their [GetPriestTitle]s enforce this notion rather vigorously, threatening that the wrath of their supreme diety will strike unbelievers down - [GetHighGodName], riding a mighty chariot across the night sky.

It is said that the seven prophets of the [GetName] faith stayed up for seven days and seven nights when they were revealed [GetScriptureName] from [GetHighGodName]. After the completion of [GetScriptureName], six of them were uplifted to join [GetHighGodName] while one was doomed to spend eternity with [GetRandomEvilGodName]. [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s thus condemn the number seven.

In the beginning there was only fire, and out of that fire [GetHighGodName] forged the world. The [GetPriestTitle]s of the [GetName] faithful continually write down visions they have of [GetHighGodName] in [GetScriptureName]. At times, one such story may be deemed heretical, and is subsequently burned. The [GetPriestTitle] who wrote down the offending text is often believed to be under the influence of [GetRandomEvilGodName], and is such likely to be burned alongside the heretical pages.

The [GetName] faith is an amalgamation of many other religions. There are several ways which followers may worship [GetHighGodName], all of them equally legitimate. Some even worship [GetRandomEvilGodName] alongside [GetHighGodName]. It is said that somewhere in the world ten [GetPriestTitle]s guard [GetScriptureName], of which only fragments are known even to the most devout followers.

The [GetName] faith is very strict, with [GetPriestTitle]s constantly requiring followers to cite passages from [GetScriptureName]. If a follower would fail to cite three passages in a row, they are punished and deemed corrupted by [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Fortunately [GetScriptureName] contains only twelve passages, spread out over four pages – proving the mercy of [GetHighGodName] once again.

The [GetName] faith is very peculiar in that sermons are always sung. The [GetPriestTitle]s are picked among followers based on the tone of their voice, as their diety [GetHighGodName] is said to have conveyed [GetScriptureName] entirely through divine song. The main enemy of [GetHighGodName] is [GetRandomEvilGodName], who cannot sing. Mute people are deemed cursed by [GetRandomEvilGodName], and are often excluded from mass.

The followers of the [GetName] faith believe that all the world is but a game between [GetHighGodName] and [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Due to this a lot of their religious rites and worship are centered around a complex board game, with the most successful players becoming [GetPriestTitle]s. The rules of this sacred game are recorded in [GetScriptureName].
The Records of the Infinite Cycles
This character has learned a thing or two from partaking in a duel.
This character has built a lasting reputation fighting in many duels.
This character has learned a thing or two from partaking in battles.
It is one thing to know strategy from the comfort of the war room, having first-hand experience is another one entirely. This character has seen plenty of plans unfold on the battlefield.

I truly enjoy a good duel. There is nothing I desire more than to challenge and win against the greatest fighters of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], except perhaps winning glory in personal combat against my enemies... Perhaps I should dedicate my life to this pursuit?
I shall become the greatest duelist [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has ever known!
No, I have a realm to attend to.

After having studied the strategies of both my own side, as well as those of my enemies, I feel confident that I have gathered enough knowledge to truly consider myself a battlefield strategist. I feel compelled to spend my life doing this, but is it a worthy pastime for a [Root.GetTitle]?
No, I have a realm to attend to.

The sudden expulsion of several important [jewish.GetName] merchants has done some damage to the economy of your realm. It would seem they played a bigger role in the economic development of [Root.Capital.GetName] than your advisors gave them credit for.
This land is poor and sparsely populated. I should spend some of my wealth in order to settle the area with some proper [From.Culture.GetName] [From.Religion.GetName] families!
A person following any of the [indian_group.GetGroupName] religions may convert from one branch of their religion to another. Such a choice may only be made once in a lifetime, however.
The other religions interest me more.
This character follows the Shaivist branch of the [hindu.GetName] faith.
The four traditions of the [hindu.GetName] faith are Shaivism, Vaishnavism, Shaktism and Smartism. You have decided to choose a new way, but which one shall it be?
I shall follow the Shaivist tradition.
I shall follow the Vaishnavism tradition.
I shall follow the Shaktism tradition.
I shall follow the Smartism tradition.
The [hindu.GetName] faith has four main branches: Shaivism, Vaishnavism, Shaktism and Smartism. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
[buddhist.GetName] tradition principally follows three main branches: Mahayana, Vajrayana and Theravada. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
The [jain.GetName] faith is a religion divided into two main branches: Digambara and Svetambara. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
The four traditions of the [hindu.GetName] faith are Shaivism, Vaishnavism, Shaktism and Smartism. You have decided to choose a new way, but which one shall it be?
The three great branches of the [buddhist.GetName] faith are Mahayana, Vajrayana and Theravada. You have decided to look for a new philosophy, but which one shall it be?
The two traditions of the [jain.GetName] faith are Digambara and Svetambara. You have decided to shed the old and step onto a new path.

The §YLeader§! of a society is responsible for its integrity and also often manages members of lower ranks. The leader regulates promotions between ranks, handles membership applications and hands out tasks to lower-ranking members. In certain cases there can exist more than one leader, in which case the most senior one is shown above.
Power: §Y[GetDharmic] Wisdom§!\nMakes you lose wicked traits and gain pious ones over time.

To bring yourself closer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and repent for your sins, you are to seclude yourself to do penance. Spend your days reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], praying to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and contemplating your life and actions. During this time, you must live simply and restrict your access to the outside world.
This Bloodline is passed on through the male line. This means that only male characters can pass the bloodline on to their offspring.
This Bloodline is passed on through the female line. This means that only female characters can pass the bloodline on to their offspring.

In addition to normal Bloodline inheritance, if two characters are in a Matrilineal Marriage, their children will inherit Patrilineal Bloodlines from their mother and Matrilineal Bloodlines from their father.\nIf a child has no known father and their mother has a Patrilineal Bloodline, the child will inherit it.

Bored, I decide to sneak out onto the streets of [child_of_destiny.Location.County.GetName]. I suddenly hear a voice. "Ah, young [child_of_destiny.GetPrincessPrince] [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]!" It is an old [wise_man_target.GetManWoman], overburdened with books. "I am [wise_man_target.GetFirstName]. The stars have given me a quest – to teach you about the world and the mind of man." [wise_man_target.GetSheHeCap] holds out two books. "Our time is limited, which tome should we study?"
Virtute Animi, I want to lead and inspire!
Dominus Omnium, my future realm shall prosper!

My servants apparently lost track of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] today, and it took hours to locate [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim]! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was found in the nick of time, just before I was about to order a full-scale search. When they found [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] was reading a book no one had ever seen before, written in latin no less...
[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], oh how you scared me...! And how do you know Latin?
Ridiculous... dispose of that book, and keep an eye on [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]!
You cannot help but feel inspired, by simply being in the presence of this character.
This character is absolutely determined to be the best ruler there ever was.
This character is the subject of many a longing eye.

I have always been very beloved, though until now I have never thought much about it. Wherever I go, others my age admire me with obvious infatuation! I am constantly showered with compliments and gifts, like I was a [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen]! I am the center of attention wherever I go, and I like it!
Perhaps one of the [child_of_destiny.GetBoyGirlOpp]s will win my heart one day?
I do not like limiting my options...

[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is no mere child anymore, that much is evident. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] is constantly surrounded by young infatuated admirers, and [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is obviously enjoying the attention!
[child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] sure is popular with children [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] age...
How quaint. Guards, please relocate all of these annoying admirers!
This character can react in an instant, drawing [GetHerHis] sword as fast as a flash of lightning.
Many [Religion.GetPriestTitle]s believe this character to be protected from evil, blessed by [Religion.GetHighGodName].

As I sit in my room, I hear a rustling sound outside the [child_of_destiny.GetChamberOpening]. Suddenly, a [attempted_murderer.GetManWoman] bursts in, brandishing a rusty [GetRandomWeapon]! [attempted_murderer.GetSheHeCap] is covered head-to-toe in blood, and screeches maniacally: "[attempted_murderer.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will have your soul!" I quickly grab a red-hot poker from the fireplace and the [attempted_murderer.GetManWoman], in [attempted_murderer.GetHerHis] frenzy, impales [attempted_murderer.GetHerselfHimself] on it...
I can not trust anyone after this...
This must have been divine intervention!

Grave news! This very night, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was assaulted in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] [child_of_destiny.GetChamber]! An assassin somehow managed to sneak into the [Root.GetHolding], killing any guard in [attempted_murderer.GetHerHis] way. In a stroke of luck, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] managed to impale the assailant on a fire poker. [attempted_murderer.GetSheHeCap] was later identified as [attempted_murderer.GetFullName], who the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s had long suspected of deviancy...
By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], how could this happen? Redouble the guard!
By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], what if they come for me next?

Wherever I go, all eyes are upon me. One [sex_partner.GetManWoman] in particular stands out – [sex_partner.GetSheHe] is stunningly [sex_partner.GetBeautifulHandsome], and looks at me with such hunger in [sex_partner.GetHerHis] eyes... Perhaps I should encourage [sex_partner.GetHerHim]?
Join me in my [child_of_destiny.GetChamber] for some... [child_of_destiny.GetAlcohol]?
I have more important matters to attend to...
This character has slain a terrible beast that terrorized the common folk.
This character used [GetHerHis] wits to outsmart a legendary beast, causing it to plummet to its death.
was killed by a wild beast

In order to teach me how to hunt, [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] has brought me into the forest. We are silently moving through the shrubbery as I spot a [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]! I give chase, running until I manage to get a clear shot off – it is a kill! I turn around to face [marshal_target.GetFirstName] with a gleeful smile on my face, but in [marshal_target.GetHerHis] stead is a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! I ready my spear, and then I...
... use a rock as leverage and puncture the neck of the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] as it attacks!
... run towards the nearby cliff and feint the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] so it falls off!

I am awestruck when I see what [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] and [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has brought back from their hunt. A trophy from a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! I thought they were hunting for [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]... [marshal_target.GetFirstName] ensures me that [marshal_target.GetSheHe] and [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] tracked the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] together, and that [marshal_target.GetSheHe] absolutely did not lose track of where [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was, only arriving after the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] was already dead...
What? How can this be? Sounds highly suspect...

Horrible news! While out hunting with [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName], [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was killed by a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! According to [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] the beast came out of nowhere and devoured [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] in one big gulp, before turning on [marshal_target.GetHerHim] and chasing [marshal_target.GetHerHim] out of the forest...
If you fulfill your destiny of becoming §YKing§! you will found a new §YBloodline§!!
You are granted one free use of the §YInvasion§! Casus Belli!
Due to abandoning the realm, §Y[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]§! makes the choice of becoming §RDisinherited§!!
§RThese units will NOT be inherited by your successors!§!

My blood burns with ambition, I can stay idle no longer! It is my destiny to become [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], and I have the support I need to realize it! Just one question remains, should I focus my ambition inwards, or outwards?
