[From.GetTitledFirstName] has performed a great sacrifice, slaughtering hundreds of our own people to garner the favor of the gods during this war. [From.GetHerHisCap] fanatic obsession with human sacrifice will doom us all.
Aren't our enemies killing enough people already?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has performed a great sacrifice, slaughtering hundreds of our own people to garner the favor of the gods during this war. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that the gods will now grant [From.GetHerHis] armies the strength necessary to defeat my warriors.
What if the gods listened to [From.GetHerHim]?
Many fighters from this province have been sacrificed to the gods following a recent war.
To prove our eternal devotion to the gods we can wage war not for land, but to conquer worthy offerings for our altars.
All captured enemy troops will be sacrificed to the gods upon victory, leaving [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s lands undefended for several years.
Rulers can sacrifice infidel prisoners to gain Piety, unlock ritual decisions and the Flower War casus belli

The pillaging and looting undertaken in your name has earned you a reputation as a fearsome Pirate. All along the coasts, mothers tucking their children in for the night warn that unless they behave, the terrible [Root.GetFirstName], scourge of the seas, will come ashore with [Root.GetHerHis] undead warriors and eat them.

Few alive have a more fearsome reputation than you. Where many Pirates merely raid you destroy entire towns and castles, leaving none alive besides one to spread the tale of [Root.GetFirstName] the Ravager.
§GSacrificing prisoners unlocks special traits and actions§!
I cannot stand [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] takes every opportunity to insult and berate me. Clearly, this [From.GetManWoman] wishes to be my enemy.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thoroughly hates me by now and likely wishes me dead. The feeling is, of course, mutual.
We shall be enemies to the end!
Somebody has been feeding false information to this ruler's spies.
Thanks to a coordinated effort from one of [Root.GetHerHis] enemies, this ruler's spy network has been gravely sabotaged.
There are all kinds of foul rumors about this character, most likely started by some rival or enemy.
This character's enemies are tormenting [Root.GetHerHim] with threats, mockery and constant humiliation.
Enemy informers have infiltrated in this character's court, feeding false reports to [Root.GetHerHis] spies.

I have decided that it might be profitable to take some time and resources and try to seriously hurt my sworn enemy. \n[From.GetTitledFirstName] is an unbearable pestilence upon this world, and I will not rest until I will have made [From.GetHerHis] life a living hell.
I will spread false reports to [From.GetHerHis] spies.
I will spread the most vile rumors about [From.GetHerHim]!
[From.GetSheHeCap] shall never know peace for as long as I live!
Better to bide my time for now...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has unleashed [From.GetHerHis] spies throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. These thugs have been spreading false news to my own informants, bringing my spy network in disarray. It has become increasingly harder to trust anything these days...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is at it again, dragging [From.GetHerHis] own name through the mud as long as [From.GetSheHe] is able of besmirching mine in the process. [From.GetSheHeCap] is spreading the most disgusting rumors about me, trying to pit my own subjects against me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is unbearable. [From.GetSheHeCap] wastes no occasion to mock and berate me, insulting my dynasty and my friends without pause. I do not know how much longer I will be able to endure this relentless barrage of abuse.

Following my actions, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has started spreading false reports of [From.GetHerHis] own. It appears that the efficacy of my own network of informants has been compromised, at least for the time being...
A §YWall and Ditch§! has been built in §Y[From.GetName]§!.
An §YEarth Hillfort§! has been built in §Y[From.GetName]§!.
A §YWooden Hillfort§! has been built in §Y[From.GetName]§!.
A §YReinforced Hillfort§! has been built in §Y[From.GetName]§!.
A §YStone Hillfort§! has been built in §Y[From.GetName]§!.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A heap of banners and sacred stones bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred hidden forest bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A tall sacred totem bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A tall sacred totem bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred golden pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.

Erect a sacred monument in your capital, serving as a gathering point for shamans and offerings to the gods, which will increase the §YMoral Authority§! of the §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§! faith.
A §YGreat Pillar§! will be erected in the square of §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
A great pillar celebrating the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has been recently erected in [Root.GetFirstName]'s realm, igniting [Root.GetHerHis] religious fervor.
One of the great symbols of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been recently destroyed, breaking this [Root.GetManWoman]'s faith.
Destroying this decayed symbol of a dying faith is a necessary step we have to take in order to wash away the old rituals and superstitions.
The local §YGreat Pillar§! will be permanently destroyed.
A §Y[From.Religion.GetName] Great Pillar§! has NOT been recently destroyed.

By carving this imposing Irminsul Tree, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By the construction of this sacred Ovoo Shrine, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and wild gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving our new Great Pillar, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and unyielding gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving our new Great Pillar, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and unyielding gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By consecrating an Hisii Grove, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and mysterious gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this Great Totem, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing upon our tribes the protection of many benevolent spirits. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this imposing Totem with the remains of our sacrifices, we have provided the gods with a great offering, buying us some reprieve from their terrible thirst for blood. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this great monument, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and benevolent gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this opulent shrine to the Sun, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this imposing [GetZeusJupiterName] Column, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and dignified gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the construction of a great monument to worship the old gods and garner their favor. This magnificent shrine has been erected in [From.Capital.GetName], where many shamans, fortunetellers and petitioners have already started to gather, hoping to receive a divine vision.
The old gods still protect us!

As my soldiers overrun the province, I receive a report regarding a curious shrine built at the center of [From.GetName]. Apparently, the local tribes have erected it to garner the favor of their gods, and consider it to be a most sacred symbol.
By destroying this holy symbol, the heathens' §YMoral Authority§! will be eroded.
The Destruction of the Great Pillar

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has laid waste of the Great Pillar of [From.GetName]. [From.GetHerHisCap] soldiers have torn down this sacred monument to the old gods. Having proved unable to protect their holy shrine, we have proven ourselves unworthy of the favor of the gods, who have surely turned their backs on us after this ignominious event.

For too long I have allowed this old, blasphemous relic to pollute my lands and cast its grotesque shadow upon the good people of [From.GetName]. The wailing of the few stubborn old believers fill the air as my soldiers tear down the pillar and scatter its remains to the open fields, never to be found ever again.

It was only a matter of time before the [From.Religion.GetName] followers torn down the old idol of [FromFrom.GetName]. [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards have come today, in the early afternoon, announcing that the great pillar was a blasphemous remnant of a dead cult and needed to be removed forever.
A carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A heap of banners and sacred stones bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred hidden forest bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A tall sacred totem bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A tall sacred totem bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred golden pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
A sacred carved pillar bearing deep religious significance for the local pagan tribes.
This character has temporarily left some of [Root.GetHerHis] responsibilities behind to enjoy [Root.GetHerHis] demesne for a few days, spending [Root.GetHerHis] time hunting and training.
This character is trying to look at [Root.GetHerHis] best for a special occasion.
This character is studying the old tales passed down from the ancestors of [Root.GetHerHis] homeland, hoping to impress [Root.GetHerHis] tribesmen.
This character has hired some of the best craftsmen to prepare a fitting tribute for the ancestors.
This character has bought a potion that will make [Root.GetHerHim] irresistible to anyone who lays eyes upon [From.GetHerHim].
This character has bought a magical trinket that will make [Root.GetHerHim] irresistible to anyone who lays eyes upon [From.GetHerHim].
This character has bought an exotic perfume from a traveling merchant, coming from a land far away.
A fortuneteller has assured that great things are in store for this [Root.GetManWoman].
A fortuneteller has assured that good things are in store for this [Root.GetManWoman].
A fortuneteller has warned this [Root.GetManWoman] that bad things are in store for [Root.GetHerHim].
This character has bought a magic potion to increase [Root.GetHerHis] strength for a limited time.
This character has bought a magical charm that increases [Root.GetHerHis] strength.
This character has bought a magical amulet to give [Root.GetHerselfHimself] courage.
This character has bought rare trinkets and tools from a foreign merchant to add on [Root.GetHerHis] religious offerings during a local festival.
This character has bought expensive trinkets and tools from a foreign merchant to add on [Root.GetHerHis] religious offerings during a local festival.
This character has bought some cheap trinkets and tools from a foreign merchant to add on [Root.GetHerHis] religious offerings during a local festival.
This character has been soiled in mud, dirt, and other less flavorful slush...
This [Root.GetManWoman] has been proclaimed King of the Harvest during a local tribal festivity.
This [Root.GetManWoman] has been proclaimed Queen of the Harvest during a local tribal festivity.
A recent festival has revitalized this province with new goods and manpower.
Organize a great celebration to improve your relation with your tribesmen, as well as the prosperity of your lands.

It would not be appropriate to continue celebrations after the death of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The festival has been therefore canceled to allow the [From.GetTitle]'s close ones to properly mourn [From.GetHerHis] loss.
With a war brewing on the horizon, we must set aside all frivolous activities and prepare for battle. I must therefore regretfully cancel the festival of [Root.Capital.GetName].
We will celebrate our victory later!

With a war brewing on the horizon, we must set aside all frivolous activities and prepare for battle. In light of this troubling new event, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has had to regretfully cancel the festival of [From.Capital.GetName].

A great festival is exactly what the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] need to strengthen the bonds with their fellow tribesmen. It will also be a great opportunity for the Chieftains to bring offerings to our ancestors, bringing prosperity to our lands.

Greetings,
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]
A great festival is being held at [From.Capital.GetName]. You are hereby invited to join us alongside your family to celebrate our fortune and bring our offerings to our great ancestors.
Signed,

[From.GetFullName]
I will be glad to join you for the §YGreat Festival§!, my liege.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

I have heard news of the great celebration you are preparing for your fellow tribesmen. I wager you'd enjoy the company of a fellow warrior to exchange stories with.

Signed, [From.GetFullName]

The period of festivities is about to start. All sorts of peddlers, bards and fortunetellers are gathering in [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName], bringing their tales and offerings. I should make sure to prepare myself before traveling to meet my tribesmen.

The period of festivities is about to start. All sorts of peddlers, bards and fortunetellers are gathering in [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName], bringing their tales and offerings. This is surely going to be a great opportunity to meet new people and learn new games.
I think I will go hunting...
Spend time outside, refining your hunting skills.
I will take time to groom myself.
Make sure to look at your best before meeting the other tribesmen.
I will study our old legends.
Spend time researching old tales and stories about their ancestors.
I will look for our best craftsmen.
Spend time searching for the most experienced craftsmen available in your tribe to prepare your offering to the ancestors.
I do not need to worry about anything.
This is going to be amazing!

The celebrations have finally begun. [Root.Capital.GetName] is bustling with activity: people from every corner of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have traveled here to pay their respects to me and my ancestors, exchange tales and goods, and have a good time.

The celebrations have finally begun. [From.Capital.GetName] is bustling with activity: people from every corner of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have traveled here to pay their respects to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] ancestors, exchange tales and goods, and have a good time.

A hoarse voice calls for my name from the crowd of peddlers, catching my attention. An old Seer is waiting for me sitting near an old runic stone. He claims that he will read my future for a small price.

An old woman suddenly jumps in my line of sight, giving me a toothless smile and shaking a cup filled with dice. She claims that she can determine what the stars have in store for me, for the right price.

As I am appraising some of the merchandise of the travelers drawn to the festival, I meet the unsettling gaze of a weird boy in tatters. The kid approaches me slowly, ignoring the crowd bustling with activity around him, and whispers that he can read me my future for just a small price.
I have no time for this nonsense!
The fortuneteller surprises me by predicting that extraordinary opportunities are about to present themselves to me in my near future, and I need only to pay close attention to find my good fortune.
I always knew I was born lucky!
The fortuneteller assures me that a period of good luck is just around the corner, and that I need only look for the right opportunities in order to change my life for the better.

After giving a thorough look to the signs, the fortuneteller warns me that my future looks grim and I should be very careful about my next choices to avoid any calamity befalling upon me and my family.

As I walk around the crowded streets of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName], a strange aroma catches my attention, leading me to the obscure stand of an old alchemist. Seeing my curiosity, the man shows me some of his wares and their prodigious effects.
How about a drink for this charm?
I will burn an offering for you, in exchange for this perfume.
Never mind, I am not interested in what you sell.

As I walk around the crowded streets of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName], a strange aroma catches my attention, leading me to the obscure stand of an old alchemist. Seeing my curiosity, the man shows me some of his wares and their prodigious effects.
How about a drink for this charm?
I will burn an offering for you, in exchange for this amulet.
I do not need any of this sorcery.

An old merchant has set up a large stand in the middle of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName] this year, selling all sorts of amulets and trinkets to use at the end of the festival as offerings to the gods of our ancestors. I wonder if I should buy something to burn myself...
The most expensive jewels are the least I can offer.
If I really *have* to buy something...
I have no money to waste.

I stumbled on [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetTitledFirstName] in the main hall with a group of other distinguished guests. I have heard quite a few good things about [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetHerHim] in the past, and I wonder if this festival is the right occasion to earn [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetHerHis] friendship.
Let me offer you a drink, [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetFirstName]!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] and I spent the evening telling old tales of our clans to each other, having a very good time alongside the other guests of [great_tribal_festival_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast. I never noticed how likable [From.GetFirstName] was before...
But what does [From.GetSheHe] *really* wants from me?
We should do this again, sometimes.

For some reason, [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetFirstName] has entirely rejected my offer of friendship. I think [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetHerHis] paranoid nature might have gotten the best of [tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetHerHim]...

[tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetFirstName] spent a great evening in the long-house, telling old legends and drinking with the other tribesmen. When finally leaving, right before dawn, we swore an oath of friendship.
We should do this more often!

[tribal_festival_potential_friend_1.GetFirstName] and I spent a very pleasant evening in the long-house, telling old legends and drinking with the other tribesmen. We left the hall at dawn, both glad to have had this opportunity to strengthen our relation.
We should do this more often!

I was busy exchanging tales with some of the other tribesmen, when [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me with a smile, offering me a drink, claiming that [From.GetSheHe] wishes to make a toast to new friendships.
What?! What's your angle? Is it poisoned?!

Seeing [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetTitledFirstName] having such a good time with the other tribesmen, laughing and drinking in the long-house, is an unbearable sight. I wish I could do something to bring [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetHerHis] insufferable merriment to an end.
Try to get §Y[tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! drunk to humiliate [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetHerHim].
Openly insult §Y[tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! in front of all the guests.
Never mind, I will just have to ignore [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetHerHim]...

It looks like [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetFirstName] is smarter than [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetSheHe] looks. [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetSheHeCap] was able to see through my deception and reject my false offer of friendship.
Oh well... I guess that's it for tonight then.

Just as I hoped, I was able to get [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetTitledFirstName] completely drunk and isolate [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetHerHim] from [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetHerHis] friends. Now is the time to reveal my true intentions...
Lead §Y[tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the wilderness and abandon [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetHerHim] there.
Shame on you! What sort of [tribal_festival_potential_enemy_1.GetManWoman] are you?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] fooled me! After getting me drunk, [From.GetSheHe] abandoned me in the wilderness, in the dead of night. I am too tired and confused to find my way back to the tribe, and I think I hear something growling nearby...

I do not understand. One moment [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I are having fun, drinking and exchanging tales, and the moment after [From.GetSheHe] is insulting me, shaming me for being nothing but a drunken fool in front of everybody.
Whu-? I thought we were friends...

We were all happily celebrating our good fortune in [great_tribal_festival_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s long-house, when [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to ruin the mood of the feast by yelling my name and showering me with insults, clearly trying to upset me.

I have received several complaints from my guests in the last days regarding [warrior_lodge_guest.GetTitledFirstName]. Apparently, [warrior_lodge_guest.GetSheHe] has been going around town, picking fights, bragging about [warrior_lodge_guest.GetHerHis] great feats and shaming my own tribesmen for lacking in strength and courage.
I am sure we can solve this series of misunderstandings...

The priests are preparing a large feast to offer to our ancestors tonight. I have been spying at the servants bringing in the offerings in the great hall for some time. Some of my friends have dared me to see if I can sneak in and out under the priests' noses without being spotted.

I am only a few step into the main hall when I hear somebody call for me. One of the priests has spotted me! With my face growing red, I manage to run away just in time to avoid being caught. My playmates welcome me with a shower of chuckles.

With just a bit of care, I manage to sneak past the servants and get into the main hall. The weird statues of the ancestors are all assembled near the long table, decorated with trinkets and surrounded by food.

I was surprised to hear that the statues in the temple of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName] have moved to a nefarious position. The priests wander around town informing everyone of the prodigious event for several hour before news comes out that the misplacement was just the result of [From.GetFirstName] sneaking into the temple and rearranging them.

[From.GetFirstName] managed to sneak into the temple and rearrange the positions of the ancestors' statues! Even better, the old priests thought that the statues had moved by themselves and went screaming around town that a terrible calamity was about to strike all of us before they learned the truth and became the laughing stock of town.

[From.GetFirstName] and some of [From.GetHerHis] playmates have stolen the offerings for tonight's feast of the ancestors. The priests were furious to find the little piglets sleeping in the woods near [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName], surrounded by the remains of their loot.

[From.GetFirstName] managed to sneak inside the temple and steal some of the offerings for the ancestors. [From.GetSheHeCap] them brought them outside of town and shared them with the rest of us. We spent the rest of the evening laughing at the grown-ups wandering around the tribe, trying to understand what happened to the missing food.
And now we have to pay for more offerings...

A particularly wealthy and obnoxious merchant has been drawn to town due to the great festival, and one of my playmates has challenged me to steal one of his trinkets while he is distracted haggling, to make up for all the times that he mistreated us children in the past.
I will take the biggest jewel from his stand!
Try to steal a trinket from the merchant's stand.

Just as I stretch my arm to pick the item from the stand, the merchant grabs me by the wrist and pushes me aside, warning me to keep away from his wares. Trying again now that he has been put on alert would just be a waste of time, so I am forced to return to my playmates empty-handed.

It takes just a few moments of distraction for me to snatch one of the merchant's amulets and run away in the crowd before he can even realize that he has been robbed. I return triumphant to my playmates, and we spend the rest of the afternoon looking from a safe distance the old merchant scrambling through his wares, trying to find the missing trinket.

Today's festivities were disrupted by the complaints of a foreign merchant. The old man spent most of the afternoon claiming that one of the town's kids had stolen a precious amulet from his stand and would not leave until he received compensation for his losses.

A particularly wealthy and obnoxious merchant has been drawn to town due to the great festival. Whenever he comes to town, he is always mean to me and my playmates, so, this year, we decided to get even with him. [From.GetFirstName] snuck behind his stand while he was distracted and stole one of his most precious trinkets, leaving the old merchant to spend the rest of the day looking for it.
Fine. Take this money and leave.

The festival has attracted many people from all over the realm to [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName]. Unfortunately, many of the new grownups are stuck-up bores with no good manners. I have half a mind to gather a few of my playmates and teach them a lesson...
Disrupt the festival by throwing mud on some of the adult guests.
Eh, that is just how grownups are...

We have barely started having fun when a some of the tribes' warriors decide to take matters in their own hands and take on us. All my friends immediately desert me, leaving me alone to face the angry tribesmen.

With just the help of a few other kids and a well-placed tree, we are able to successfully throw the entire party into disarray. People scream and run for cover, yelling our names and throwing back swears at us. When the adults finally organize to get us, we have already dispersed to laugh off the successful mission.
We should do this again next year!

I was just chatting with some of the other tribesmen in the main square of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName], when something hit me on the back! Shouts and complaints swiftly follow, turning the entire square into a complete chaos. A few of the kids have climbed on a nearby tree and they have started throwing mud at the rest of us!
Some of the town's kids, led by [From.GetTitledFirstName], have decided to pester their parents and neighbors by throwing mud at them in the middle of the morning fair.

[From.GetFirstName] decided to take me and some of the other kids and get back at some of the stuck-up adults in our town by laying a trap on them during the morning fair, to cover them in mud and slush. And it was an absolute triumph.

All the grownups are busy, and I am bored. As I try to think of something to do, I spot [scoped_running_child_1.GetFirstName] and suddenly remember about that time [scoped_running_child_1.GetSheHe] bragged about being the fastest kid of the whole tribe.
Challenge §Y[scoped_running_child_1.GetFirstName]§! to a race around town.
Actually, maybe I will just have a nap.

[From.GetFirstName] challenged me to a race around town to determine who is the fastest kid of the tribe. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems very confident that [From.GetSheHe] will win and has already started to tease me that I am too much of a coward to even accept [From.GetHerHis] challenge.

Turns out that [From.GetFirstName] was too much of a coward to pick up my challenge. [From.GetSheHeCap] has run away with [From.GetHerHis] tail between [From.GetHerHis] legs, throwing some poor excuse to avoid the race.

After we gather a few playmates to act as witnesses, [From.GetFirstName] and I are off running around town, dodging servants, scaring off farm animals, zigzagging through the fields for the quickest path. Several minutes later, I jump head-first over the final line, surrounded by the cheers of the other kids.

After we gather a few playmates to act as witnesses, [From.GetFirstName] and I are off running around town, dodging servants, scaring off farm animals, zigzagging through the fields for the quickest path. Unfortunately, just a few steps before the finishing line, I trip over a rock and fall to the ground, allowing [From.GetFirstName] to surpass me.

There is an old tree at the edge of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName]. Kids say it is more than one hundred years old, and that sometimes the ancestors use it as a ladder to get into our world, and nobody aside from the shamans ever gets close to it.
And I am going to climb it!

It was not easy. Every few steps I had to stop and hold my breath, listening to the ominous creaking coming from the gray branches of the old tree. And yet, with just a bit of patience and stubbornness, I was able to get all the way to the top. There are no gods around as far as I can see, but I have a full view of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

I was almost halfway through the climbing, when an ominous creaking announced the breaking of one of the branches I was balancing a foot on. Grabbing at the air and letting out a choked squeal, I fall from the old tree.

After a few unintended fights and several challenges thrown amongst guests, it has been decided that the best way to appease the crowd is to organize a tournament of our best warriors. Not only there are many in the tribe excited to test their mettle in a friendly competition, the shamans have also assured me that this will be a good way to obtain the favor of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
Why not? I will join myself.
Let any brave fighter step forward!

After a few unintended fights and several challenges thrown amongst guests, it has been decided that the best way to appease the crowd is to organize a tournament of our best warriors. Not only there are many in the tribe excited to test their mettle in a friendly competition, the shamans have also assured everyone that this will be a good way to obtain the favor of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
I will just cheer on the other fighters.
After a recent scuffle between some of our fighters during a feast, many of my guests are pushing for a great drinking contest to determine who amongst us is the most resilient.
Why not? I will join myself.
Let any strong fighter step forward!

Many of the guests in [great_tribal_festival_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s long-house have taken the habits of organizing drinking games during the great feasts we are holding almost every night to celebrate the old gods.
Eh, I will just cheer on the others.

With so many lavish feasts being prepared for the festival, many of my guests have started to talk about out-competing each other to see who amongst them can eat fastest and the most, to the point that every other night we have an eating contest or two.
Sounds fun, I think I'll join!
I will just cheer on the others.

With so many lavish feasts being prepared for the festival, many of [great_tribal_festival_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s guests have started to talk about out-competing each other to see who amongst them can eat fastest and the most, to the point that every other night we have an eating contest or two.
Sounds fun, I think I'll join!
I will just cheer on the others.

The trading brought by the great festival has refilled our stables with a large number of fine steeds. Some of them less tame than others. A few of my fighters were thinking about competing to tame the wildest horses in our stocks, which I think will be the perfect way to entertain my guests as well as to discipline the most turbulent stallions.
The winner will get a horse of their own!

The trading brought by the great festival has refilled [great_tribal_festival_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s stables with a large number of fine steeds. Some of them less tame than others. To entertain [great_tribal_festival_host.GetHerHis] guests as well as to discipline the most turbulent of [great_tribal_festival_host.GetHerHis] stallions, our host has decided to issue a horse-taming competition.
I will cheer on the tamers.

Some of my advisors and shamans suggested me that it would be a good idea to entertain my guests by issuing a friendly competition during this period of festivity, aimed at finding who is the fairest in [Root.Capital.GetName].
Why not? I am certain to win.
I will be glad to judge all candidates...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] advisors have come up with the idea of organizing a beauty contest during this year's celebration, allowing entries from all of the guests.
I'd rather judge than be judged.

With so many travelers and bards coming to [Root.Capital.GetName] to exchange stories and enjoy the period of festivities, I have come to the conclusion that we should simply organize a poetry contest, to see which of our guests has the sharpest tongue.
Indeed. And I will join too!
This should be very entertaining to watch.

With so many travelers and bards coming to [From.Capital.GetName] to exchange stories and enjoy the period of festivities, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to organize a great poetry contest, to see which of [From.GetHerHis] guests has the sharpest tongue.
I am a [Root.GetTitle], not an entertainer.

With so many travelers and bards coming to [Root.Capital.GetName] to exchange stories and enjoy the period of festivities, I have come to the conclusion that we should simply organize a singing contest, to see which of our guests has the sweetest voice.
Indeed. And I will join too!
This should be very entertaining to watch.

With so many travelers and bards coming to [From.Capital.GetName] to exchange stories and enjoy the period of festivities, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to organize a great singing contest, to see which of [From.GetHerHis] guests has the sweetest voice.
I am a [Root.GetTitle], not an entertainer.

Many gifted artisans have been drawn to [Root.Capital.GetName] to offer their skills to create some of the offerings for the ancestors. To make the best use of their abilities, I have decided to organize a weaving contest, allowing our best craftsmen to compete against each other.
And I will take part in it too.
This should provide us with even more offerings.

Many gifted artisans have been drawn to [Root.Capital.GetName] to offer their skills to create some of the offerings for the ancestors. To make the best use of their abilities, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to organize a weaving contest, allowing [From.GetHerHis] best craftsmen to compete against each other.
I will create the best tapestry of all!

The crowd quickly assembles in the town square as the first contenders find their place in the fighting ring. I am one of the first to be picked, and soon find myself in the thick of a brawl, dodging and striking against my first opponent while our tribesmen cheer around us.

The crowd quickly assembles in the town square as the first contenders find their place in the fighting ring. The first brawl starts with encouraging cheers from everyone. Soon, a series of bruised warriors finds its place in the losers' corner.

A long line of tribesmen sit one next to each other, slamming their tankards on the table and loudly inciting the few contenders to keep drinking, one cup after the other. I clear my throat and blink a few times, waiting for someone to refill my horn, glancing at the closest of my opponents, eager for my next turn.

A long line of tribesmen sit one next to each other, slamming their tankards on the table and loudly inciting the few contenders to keep drinking, one cup after the other. Little by little, some of the contenders tap off, their heads falling heavily on the table.

A long line of tribesmen sit one next to each other, slamming their fists on the table and loudly inciting the few contenders to eat faster, as the servants move back and forward to bring more food and take away empty plates. I phase out for a moment, gagging, and then go back to my meal.

A long line of tribesmen sit one next to each other, slamming their fist on the table and loudly inciting the few contenders to eat faster, as the servants move back and forward to bring more food and take away empty plates. Little by little, some of the contenders tap off, stumbling back and puking on the floor.

A large crowd has gathered during the morning to witness to the start of the competition. The contenders wait in a line as the first rebellious horse is dragged forward. One of the tamers steps forward and slowly approaches the beast as the rest of us look in silence.

A large crowd has gathered during the morning to witness to the start of the competition. The contenders wait in a line as the first rebellious horse is dragged forward. One of the tamers steps forward and slowly approaches the beast as the rest of us look in silence.

Several young and promising members of our tribes have gathered in the long-house in the late morning, wearing their best dresses and their most prized trinkets. I stand alongside them, checking my hair for the last time as we all wait for the competition to start.

Several young and promising members of our tribes have gathered in the long-house in the late morning, wearing their best dresses and their most prized trinkets. When the crowd is all in place, the few selected judges ask the first debutante to move forward.

The competition starts early in the morning. An entire crowd of bards and young prodigies has already assembled by dawn in the long-house to warm-up and practice their songs. The contest finally starts and I take my place amongst the other contenders, waiting for my turn as the first poet begins his performance.
The competition starts early in the morning. An entire crowd of bards and young prodigies has already assembled by dawn in the long-house to warm-up and practice their songs.

The competition starts early in the morning. An entire crowd of bards and young prodigies has already assembled by dawn in the long-house to warm-up and practice their songs. The crowd falls silent and the contest finally starts as the first singer begins his performance.

The competition starts early in the morning. An entire crowd of bards and young prodigies has already assembled by dawn in the long-house to warm-up and practice their songs. The crowd falls silent and the contest finally starts as the first singer begins his performance.

Several contenders have already assembled on one of the main streets, all their tools at hand. When the competition finally starts, we all turn to our loom, feverishly beginning our work. We have only little time to weave a tapestry that can bring honor to our ancestors.

Several contenders have already assembled on one of the main streets, all their tools at hand. When the competition finally starts, they all turn to their loom, feverishly beginning their work. They have only little time to weave a tapestry that can bring honor to our ancestors.

I hold down the last opponent for a few moments still, making sure to ensure my victory before standing up to the cheers of all the tribesmen. As the last [Root.GetManWoman] standing, I am the undisputed winner of the tournament.

With a final strike, [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] pushes me on the ground, painfully holding me down until I am forced to admit defeat. I have managed to win several fights during the course of the tournament, only to have the final victory stolen from me by this [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman]...

The fights go on for the entire day. When the sun sets, only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] remains standing: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]. The crowd acclaims [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] as the uncontested winner of the tournament, showering [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] with cheers.

I try my best, but, after only a few encounters I am forced to surrender and join the other less fortunate contenders, waiting for the tournament to end. When the sun sets, only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] remains standing: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]. The crowd acclaims [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] as the uncontested winner of the tournament, showering [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] with cheers.

I need one of the servants to help me stand after the final drink. My vision is blurry and I can barely form a coherent thought, but, hearing my name being cheered on by the other guests makes me fairly confident that I have managed to win the contest.

I hold off as much as I can, but, in the end, I find myself on the ground, covered in mead and spit. I feel as if somebody is striking my skull with a hammer and barely manage to understand anything that is happening around me, but I clearly hear the name of [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] being repeated over and over by the other tribesmen.

One by one, the contenders tap out, either falling asleep on the ground or stumbling away from the long-house with disgruntled mumblings. There is only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] who is left standing at the end: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]. The tribesmen raise [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] up and parade [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] across the hall, chanting [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] name.

One by one, the contenders tap out, either falling asleep on the ground or stumbling away from the long-house with disgruntled mumblings. After some time, I am reluctantly forced to join them as well. In the end, there is only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] who is left standing: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]. The tribesmen raise [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] up and parade [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] across the hall, chanting [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] name.

I throw away the last bone and let out a long sigh, looking at the pile of plates beside me. There is a moment of silence as my only remaining opponents falls down, followed by the cheering of the crowd. Some of the tribesmen try to raise me up, but, after a few failed attempts, they decide to just pat me on the back instead.
Ugh- I need to lay down...

I manage to keep eating long after most other contenders have tapped out, but, unfortunately, as much as I try to, I am unable to keep up with [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] and, in the end, I have to concede [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] victory, and slide back on the hall's bench, sore and reeling.

One by one, the contenders tap out, either rushing outside, or falling on the ground reeling. There is only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] who is left standing at the end: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]. The tribesmen raise [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] up and parade [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] across the hall, chanting [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] name.

One by one, the contenders tap out, either rushing outside, or falling on the ground reeling. After some time, I am reluctantly forced to join them as well. In the end, there is only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] who is left standing: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]. The tribesmen raise [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] up and parade [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] across the hall, chanting [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] name.

The stallion falters and stops resisting, and I lead him on a slow trot near the line of tribesmen witnessing me in silence. When I dismount, I am welcomed by some cheering, but only after about an hour of discussion the group decides that I had proven myself to be the fastest and most resolute amongst the tamers.

Despite avoiding any embarrassing fall, by the end of the day most of the tribesmen who witnessed the contest come to the conclusion that I was not firm and fast enough to deserve to win the tournament. The honor is instead bestowed to [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName].

During the course of the day, the crowd is presented with several embarrassing falls from the various contenders. Only after getting rid of the least skilled tamers the real competition can begin. By the end of the day, after a bit of squabbling, most of the tribesmen come to the conclusion that [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] has proven to be the most competent horse-tamer of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

Unfortunately, I have barely started to take control over my steed when I am thrown off the saddle and land on my back. With my poor display of skill, I am amongst the first contenders to be eliminated. By the end of the day, after a bit of squabbling, most of the tribesmen come to the conclusion that [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] has proven to be the most competent horse-tamer of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].
It was fun while it lasted.

My looks and pose are absolutely impeccable throughout the day. It comes as no surprise when the judges selected for the contest proclaim me to be the fairest [Root.GetManWoman] in [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName]. I walk past the other contenders, ignoring their deathly glares and politely thank the crowd.

I was so close to winning. I really thought the judges had taken a liking on me. Unfortunately, at the end of the day it is [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] the one to be celebrated as fairest [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] in [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

The contenders parade one by one through the main hall, for all to see and comment upon, and, little by little, the tribesmen chosen to pass judgment on them start picking the best. As the sun starts to wane on the horizon, only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] is left: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName], who is cheered as fairest of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

One by one, we parade through the main hall for all our tribesmen to see and comment upon, and, little by little, the judges start picking the best of us. Unfortunately, I am not one of the lucky ones. As the sun starts to wane on the horizon, only one [tribal_festival_winner.GetManWoman] is left: [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName], who is cheered as fairest of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

My poem captivates everyone in the long-house. It is thrilling and passionate, featuring epic battles and tragic romances, and leaving everyone holding their breath. Once I conclude my performance, there is little doubt that the prize for best bard of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName] will go to me.
This contest was but a formality.

My poem leaves quite a few mouths hanging, and seems to receive a very good reaction from the guests. Unfortunately, when [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] starts telling [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] story, it becomes clear to me that I will not be the winner of this contest.

The contest gives us the opportunity to hear many new amazing stories. Tales of love and war to captivate all the people of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName]. In the end, though, the uncontested winner turns out to be [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName], whose epic storytelling skills manage to enthrall the entire town.

The contest gives us the opportunity to hear many new amazing stories. Tales of love and war to captivate all the people of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName]. Unfortunately, the public does not seem to receive well my own poetry, and the uncontested winner turns out to be [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName], whose epic storytelling skills manage to enthrall the entire town.
I had never heard that story...

My voice immediately captivates everyone in the long-house. Not one whisper interrupts my performance, the entire room listens in complete silence. Once I stop singing, I am showered with praise, and immediately proclaimed the winner of the contest.

My song leaves quite a few mouths hanging, and seems to receive a very good reaction from the guests. Unfortunately, when [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName] starts singing [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis], it becomes clear to me that I will not be the winner of this contest.

The contest provides everyone with a very pleasant evening centered around music. Exciting, upbeat pieces alternate with heart-wrenching poems, but nobody amongst the many contenders manages to move the crowd as [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName], whose voice rightfully earns [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] the title of best singer of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

The contest provides everyone with a very pleasant evening centered around music. Exciting, upbeat pieces alternate with heart-wrenching poems, but no one amongst us manages to move the crowd as [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName], whose voice rightfully earns [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHim] the title of best singer of [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName].

It was an exhausting task. At the end of the day I can barely see straight and I have only little feeling left in my fingers, but the result was far worth all the pain it caused me. My tapestry was acclaimed as the undisputed best piece of artwork anyone in [great_tribal_festival_host.Capital.GetName] has ever seen.

I work as fast as I could, but, by the end of the day, I am forced to leave my tapestry unfinished. Despite several of my tribesmen praising my work, its imperfection doomed it to lose the competition to [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]'s masterpiece.

Of the many tapestries created today none is as marvelous as [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]'s. [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHisCap] work is acclaimed by most guests as the most original and skillfully made, ensuring [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] victory in the competition.

Unfortunately for me, of the many tapestries created today none is as marvelous as [tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]'s. [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHisCap] work is acclaimed by most guests as the most original and skillfully made, ensuring [tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis] victory in the competition.
It is rather beautiful to look at.

With the period of festivities nearing its end, it is finally time to burn our offerings to the ancestors and pray that they will protect us in the years to come. A long moment of silence shrouds [Root.Capital.GetName] as the smoke rises to the nightly sky, then the shamans lead us in a somber hymn, concluding the ceremony.

With the period of festivities coming to an end, the priests lead a procession of faithful carrying our village's most sacred icon, on a litter filled with all the offerings accumulated into the past days. A long moment of silence shrouds [Root.Capital.GetName] as the holy symbol blesses the streets of the village with its presence before being brought back to the safety of the local chapel, concluding the ceremony.

With the period of festivities nearing its end, it is finally time to burn our offerings to the old gods and pray that they will protect us in the years to come. A long moment of silence shrouds [Root.Capital.GetName] as the smoke rises to the nightly sky, then the shamans lead us in a somber hymn, concluding the ceremony.

With the period of festivities nearing its end, it is finally time to burn our offerings to the ancestors and pray that they will protect us in the years to come. A long moment of silence shrouds [From.Capital.GetName] as the smoke rises to the nightly sky, then the shamans lead us in a somber hymn, concluding the ceremony.

With the period of festivities coming to an end, the priests lead a procession of faithful carrying our village's most sacred icon, on a litter filled with all the offerings accumulated into the past days. A long moment of silence shrouds [From.Capital.GetName] as the holy symbol blesses the streets of the village with its presence before being brought back to the safety of the local chapel, concluding the ceremony.

With the period of festivities nearing its end, it is finally time to burn our offerings to the old gods and pray that they will protect us in the years to come. A long moment of silence shrouds [From.Capital.GetName] as the smoke rises to the nightly sky, then the shamans lead us in a somber hymn, concluding the ceremony.
Undergoing a §YMass Conversion§! while below §YAbsolute Tribal Authority§! will increase the chances of §YPagan Vassals§! rejecting the new religion.
The recent mass conversion of this province's owner has attracted new merchants from the more civilized parts of the world, revitalizing local trade.
The new clergy of this realm is attempting to sway the remaining pagan converts to fully embrace the new faith.
Following the recent mass conversion, a number of experienced craftsmen from more civilized lands have reached this province to offer their services to the locals.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been suggesting for a few days now that, as a [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler, I am no longer under any obligation to allow the other Chieftains to determine how to divide my own lands once I die. [From.GetSheHeCap] assures me that I am well within my right to pass down my titles directly to my children.
No, we must keep this tradition.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that, by spreading the word about my recent conversion to other [Root.Religion.GetName] realms, I will be able to significantly increase the prosperity of [Root.Capital.GetName].
We need to attract more traders.
Do you know of other missionaries?
I wish to have more experienced craftsmen.
No, I do not want to risk upsetting my people.

There are many valuable texts that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [From.GetHerHim] when moving to [Root.Capital.GetName]. Today, [From.GetSheHe] asked me if I was interested in learning more about [Root.Religion.GetName] arts and laws.
Yes, tell me more about your lawmakers.
Yes, tell me more about your crafts.
Yes, tell me more about your legends.

After having examined the state of [Root.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] assures me that there are several ways in which I can improve our way of life, simply by adopting some of the tools and laws followed by most [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers.

I have heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] talking about the customs of other [From.Religion.GetName] [From.Culture.GetName] rulers for quite some time now since [From.GetHerHis] arrival, to the point that I have started to feel allured by some of the customs of the [From.Culture.GetName] people, just as much as I was of their religion...
I wish to be a [From.Culture.GetName] too!
No, I must preserve our ancient traditions.

A group of militant faithful have come to [Root.Capital.GetName], attracted by the sermons of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Although foreigners, these warriors appear to be willing to join my army and help me spread the word of [Root.Religion.GetName].
I cannot allow foreign troops within my realm!
This option is available because you are §YAttractive§!
This option is available because you are dumb

Spirits are high at the Lodge tonight, and I am itching for a challenge. Many important warriors have gathered in the large hall to celebrate a recent hunt, giving me no shortage of capable warriors to test my strength with.
I will pick the strongest I can find!
I'd rather not risk embarrassing myself...
On second thought, I will go take a drink instead.

Many important warriors have gathered in the Lodge tonight in order to celebrate a recent hunt. I have barely joined some of my friends in the festivities when [From.GetTitledFirstName] barges in, claiming that [From.GetSheHe] is twice as strong as I am and challenging me to an arm-wrestling match to prove it.
I am too tired right now...
Refuse §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s challenge.\nYour fellow §YWarriors§! will remember this cowardly act.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was too much of a coward to meet my challenge. [From.GetSheHeCap] excused [From.GetHerselfHimself] and left the hall in a hurry rather than test [From.GetHerHis] strength against mine.

[From.GetFirstName] and I sit one in front of the other, preparing ourselves for the game. We put our arms on the table while a third fighter holds our fists still. The crowd around us chants a disjointed countdown, and cheers as we start pushing against each other.

Slowly but surely [arm_wrestling_fighter_2.GetFirstName] is gaining ground. Inch by inch, [arm_wrestling_fighter_2.GetSheHe] is pushing my fist closer and closer towards the table. I am starting to lose breath, my face is red and covered in sweat, yet I still cannot manage to push back against [arm_wrestling_fighter_2.GetHerHis] grip. I might simply not be strong enough to win this match...

Slowly but surely [arm_wrestling_fighter_1.GetFirstName] is gaining ground. Inch by inch, [arm_wrestling_fighter_1.GetSheHe] is pushing my fist closer and closer towards the table. I am starting to lose breath, my face is red and covered in sweat, yet I still cannot manage to push back against [arm_wrestling_fighter_1.GetHerHis] grip. I might simply not be strong enough to win this match...
Try to increase your chances by cheating.

For a while, it seemed as if victory was assured. I was slowly pushing [From.GetFirstName]'s hand closer and closer to the table. Yet, all of a sudden, [From.GetSheHe] has started to gain back ground, getting [From.GetHerHis] hand back up and starting to push on the opposite side.
Do not move your elbow, cheater!

Slowly but surely, I manage to push [From.GetFirstName]'s hand closer and closer to the table. I grit my teeth and chuckle, glancing at my opponent to revel in my imminent victory. [From.GetFirstName] looks back at me with a smile. [From.GetSheHeCap] is leaning forward, trying to push back, and giving me a good view of her sweaty cleavage.

Slowly but surely, I manage to push [From.GetFirstName]'s hand closer and closer to the table. I grit my teeth and chuckle, glancing at my opponent to revel in my imminent victory. [From.GetFirstName] looks back at me with a smile and winks at me, making my heart skip a beat.
I only care about my beloved.
Pfh! You have picked the wrong person!

Things are not looking great for [From.GetFirstName]. I am slowly managing to get [From.GetHerHis] knuckles on the table, despite [From.GetHerHis] best efforts to push my hand back. When [From.GetSheHe] suddenly shouts a semi-coherent warning about something dangerous behind me, I am baffled.
Do you think I am that stupid?

With a loud thud, I slam [wl_arm_wrestling_loser.GetFirstName]'s fist against the table, earning a shower of cheers from the other warriors gathered around us. My opponent glares at me and mumbles something about accepting defeat as [wl_arm_wrestling_loser.GetSheHe] rubs [wl_arm_wrestling_loser.GetHerHis] hand.
What sort of weakling are you?
§Y[wl_arm_wrestling_loser.GetTitledFirstName]§! might challenge you to a §YDuel§! for insulting [wl_arm_wrestling_loser.GetHerHim].
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! might challenge you to a §YDuel§! for insulting [From.GetHerHim].
Do not be too hard on yourself!

With a loud thud, [wl_arm_wrestling_winner.GetFirstName] slams my fist against the table, earning a shower of cheers from the other warriors gathered around us. As if defeating me wasn't enough, [wl_arm_wrestling_winner.GetSheHe] starts mocking me openly.
I will show you who is stronger!
Your fellow warriors laugh at you.

With a loud thud, [wl_arm_wrestling_winner.GetFirstName] slams my fist against the table, earning a shower of cheers from the other warriors gathered around us. Luckily, [wl_arm_wrestling_winner.GetFirstName] decides to not rub in [wl_arm_wrestling_winner.GetHerHis] victory, and gives me a bit of praise for holding on this much against [wl_arm_wrestling_winner.GetHerHim].

It has been some time now since I have begun noticing [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] has distinguished [From.GetHerselfHimself] more than once amongst the members of our Lodge, to the point that I have started feeling strangely attracted to [From.GetHerHim].
I wonder if [From.GetSheHe] feels the same...
Approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and declare your feelings for [From.GetHerHim].

Tonight, just as I was about to leave the main hall, I was approached by [From.GetFirstName], one of my fellow warriors. After chatting for a while, [From.GetSheHe] reveals to me that [From.GetSheHe] has been watching me for a while, and finds me to be a very strong and attractive fighter.
And I happen to think the same about you.
Thanks, but I am not interested.

I was right to trust my feelings. [From.GetFirstName] was surprised and happy to hear of how I felt about [From.GetHerHim] and told me that [From.GetSheHe] was merely waiting for the right opportunity to reveal [From.GetHerHis] own feelings for me.

Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] has spurned my advances without much thought to it. At first, I hoped that [From.GetSheHe] was simply misunderstanding my intentions, but, after a bit of discussing, [From.GetSheHe] flatly told me that [From.GetSheHe] is not interested in me.

It has been some time now since I have begun noticing [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] has distinguished [From.GetHerselfHimself] more than once amongst the members of our Lodge. [From.GetSheHeCap] is, without a doubt, an impressive warrior.

Tonight, just as I was about to leave the main hall, I was approached by [From.GetFirstName], one of my fellow warriors. After chatting for a while, [From.GetSheHe] reveals to me that [From.GetSheHe] has been watching me for a while, and has come to consider me one of the most valuable members of the Lodge, as well as a terrific fighter.
Thanks. I feel the same about you, [From.GetFirstName].
That is very flattering of you...
[From.GetFirstName] was glad to hear of what I think of [From.GetHerHim]. We spent most of the night talking and ended up declaring our friendship to each other after a long series of toasts.
I couldn't ask for a better friend, [From.GetFirstName]!

Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName]'s reception to my thoughts about [From.GetHerHim] was tepid at best. We talked for a while, but it soon became clear that we do not have as much in common as I initially thought.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has pledged [Root.GetHerHis] help on the coming §YCrusade§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is waging war against the infidels in the current §YCrusade§!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has a strong claim on [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s title
